Change of account owner restrictions,USSFA-6824,204663,,Bug,fix prepared,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,,mrozycki,ELeodi,ELeodi,20/Jan/22 1:56 PM,04/Feb/22 12:29 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,,,,0,GR,GRProd,,,,,,,"Hello,
In uat we found Salesforce does not allow us to set as account owner any user that has Tele appointment profile and that should not happen. We should be able to set any user as an account owner
we don't face the same problem with users with other profiles (e.g. Sales profile)
When sytem admin tries to change account owner in Salesforce and select a user with tele appointment profile he gets the following error message
we tried changing account owner in our legacy and publishing it on Salesforce.
for account with external id SF-05326083 we set as account owner user Glykeria Tzampatzi in our legacy
but it does not appear in salesforce and it caused a synchronization issue to that account

column1: Object Store key gets stuck (GR),USSFA-6774,201472,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Done/Fixed,mgiannat,Gabor.Fal,Gabor.Fal,05/Jan/22 11:59 AM,10/Jan/22 5:27 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,10/Jan/22 5:26 PM,,,,0,PRODGR,,,,,,,,"It seems like in some cases even after succesful retry, the OS key is not cleared from the Object Store.

If you search the attached log there will be some strange error on event failed (no log of the actual failure) to be processed, Object store key being logged then retry. Retry succeeds but OS key is not cleared.
I have cleared the OS now as I don't see any recurrance of the ID in the log (attached).
A fix has been deployed to the UAT environment and was tested internally. As per agreement with Michalis, we are waiting for a green light to deploy to PROD.
","07/Jan/22 1:17 PM;mgiannat;Hi [~msadowski]. Thank you for the fix.
Let's monitor this for the next couple of days in UAT.
My proposal is to deploy this at prod +on Monday at 17.00 GR time+. Are you ok with this?
Sure thing, Monday 17 GR works well. ","10/Jan/22 5:22 PM;msadowski;[~mgiannat]

Please take respective access into account in SF package.

Account Status for Fix and Status for Mobile,USSFA-6728,195354,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Done/Fixed,ELeodi,ELeodi,ELeodi,30/Nov/21 9:09 AM,02/Dec/21 8:55 AM,01/Dec/21 9:34 AM,02/Dec/21 8:55 AM,,,,0,GR,GRProd,incident,,,,,,"In Productionaccount PRIME ΤΕΧΝΟΛ. ΕΝΕΡΓΕΙΑΣ & ΠΕΡΙΒΑΛΛΟΝΤΟΣ external id SF-ONE-SRV-101042356 has Status for Fix and Status for Mobile Active
i run a report and there are 104.000 Accounts with status Active.
in console in status query fields values active , inactive and blocked appeared while EXISTING status is no longer there.
according to confluence [https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/2.2.1.1.+Account+Picklist+Values+for+HAL+WIP] GR values are EXISTING , ONCE_EXISTED and NEVER_EXISTED.

column2: i0ejaf:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,30/Nov/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,ELeodi,F.Prentas,jkomorowska,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"30/Nov/21 10:31 AM;jkomorowska;The reason is that the deployment was aborted, part of the changes – the core ones – were deployed, but the GR local ones were not – the local ones override the core picklist values.

column1: You need to deploy all the changes.","30/Nov/21 10:43 AM;ELeodi;[~ampoura] when deploy is completed let me know to check this again so i can close the bug","02/Dec/21 8:55 AM;ELeodi;status is ok both in accounts and in console . Active status no longer exist

column2: i0ecyn:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,24/Nov/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,ELeodi,F.Prentas,jkomorowska,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"24/Nov/21 3:14 PM;jkomorowska;[~ELeodi] it looks like you're taking the wrong field in the report. You should use ""Number of Open Opportunities = 0"" and not ""Has No Open Lead Opp = TRUE""","24/Nov/21 3:27 PM;ELeodi;[~jkomorowska]  , i removed the ""has no open leads"" and used ""Number of Open Opportunities = 0""

column1: it returned 252 records which still has a big difference from console results

!image-2021-11-24-15-26-27-596.png!","24/Nov/21 4:14 PM;ELeodi;[~jkomorowska] , can you please clarify what field Has No Open Lead Opp in reporting is used for? i assumed that i could use it to fetch accounts that have no open leads or opportunities and since the same rule applies for accounts exclusion from console i considered it safe to use","24/Nov/21 6:02 PM;jkomorowska;[~ELeodi] on which environment are you running those tests? On Situat there are no accounts that fulfill all criteria, so I removed zip code and I get the same amount in report and console.
Has No Open Lead opp is used to know which Account can be anonymized, it is not used in the console search","25/Nov/21 7:48 AM;ELeodi;hi [~jkomorowska],

as i mention on this bug and on my e mail this occurs in production. in uat i found one account that had an open opportunity and built a query around him to verify if accounts with open opportunities come to console

this  bug was reported by tele appointment manager [~F.Prentas] that tries to get a report but results are wrong","25/Nov/21 12:59 PM;jkomorowska;[~ELeodi] I'm confused now. Yesterday in a n email you wrote it does not happen on production.. Can we please keep the conversations in Jira and not half Jira half email. because it's hard to follow.

The console should not show Accounts with open opportunities, that was the requirement. When I run query you gave in the beginning in console UAT and in report there are no results on both, because there are no Accounts with the zip codes you mention in UAT. When I remove the zip code from both console and report I get the same results in both, which is correct.

You need to use Number of Open Opportunitiess field on Account to see if there are open opportunities assigned. If Number of Open Opportunities = 0 this Account should be displayed in the console, otherwise it should not ","25/Nov/21 1:48 PM;ELeodi;hi [~jkomorowska],
let's not talk about the e mails then. on this bug i mention that it is a production problem and all data mentioned is from prod.
i never found a bug on uat and i can't recreate the issue there.
in prod on my report i include Number of Open Opportunities = 0 but i still get a number than is much different form the same query run in console.
i mention exact numbers and queries on bug description.

i propose we have a quick call on Monday or on any day that works for you and we can look at the issue together. let me know if you are ok with this :)","29/Nov/21 11:56 AM;jkomorowska;We had a call with Eleni and Fotis and it turned out the problem was in prod regarding data entered in Shipping Postal Code. In the report the query included Shipping Zip Code in format ""82200"" but in reality some records had format ""822 00"". The console query fetched all the results, both 82200 and 822 00 because it uses a field called PostalCodeDigitsOnly, which does not care about extra spaces.
Closing the bug as related to data quality

GR - Improvements on adding related contacts to an event,USSFA-6648,190617,,Story,US Blocked,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,,tkiritsi,dfrancina,dfrancina,05/Nov/21 7:03 PM,13/Dec/21 1:50 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,,,,0,GR,NewDemand,,,,,,,"When creating an event, Related Name field is a global search field and if the Contact has a common Greek Last Name it is difficult to find the correct Contact related to their Account, especially when Event is created from the Calendar view, where the Account is not visible.
Also, while searching, there isn’t a scroll down option so user has to press ""Enter"" and search through the entire list.

There should be an easy way to see and choose from Contacts that are related to the specific Account that the event was created for (for events that are either related to an Account or an Opportunity).

column2: i0dqbr:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,05/Nov/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,dfrancina,jkomorowska,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"10/Dec/21 2:21 PM;jkomorowska;[~ELeodi] The standard field for Name can be both related to Lead and Contact. It is not possible to add a filter to this field, so that it shows only Contacts for a specific Account.

column1: We have some possibilities of workarounds - either a custom component, that would display all Contacts related to account, and from that component person would create the Event or additional fields on the Event. The first solution is quite time consuming, the second is not a good user experience - potentially 4 additional fields for Contact and Lead separately both on Account and Opportunity.

The easiest way to create event for the right Contact is to open this Contact and create the Event from Contact screen. However in this case, user will need to fill in Account manually. It does not solve the problem of creating Events from the Calendar though.
None of the suggestions of Joanna seem to work for us.

Lets block it for now , and when someone is ready to take up on that user story , lets evaluate if there is at least a way to enhance the search results of the contact on the as is functionality with his/her ""role"" .",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

column1: CPQ users cannot close SFA Opportunities,USSFA-6636,190389,,Story,NATCO APPROVAL,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,,ampoura,ampoura,ampoura,04/Nov/21 11:56 AM,30/Nov/21 4:31 PM,01/Dec/21 11:54 AM,,,,,0,CPQR1UAT,GR,SFR3S21,,,,,,"Additional details on top of Short Description field.

vlocity_cmt.TelcoOpportunity: execution of AfterUpdate caused by: System.DmlException: Update failed. First exception on row 0 with id 00k5I00000FOA0VQAX; first error: FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION, A validation rule is preventing the record from being processed. This could be from this record, or a related record being updated. VALIDATION MESSAGE: You can't modify record after Closed Stage: [] (System Code)
This is due to a custom SFA validation that is being executed upon Opportunity gets closed that interferes with a standard Vlocity trigger.

The CPQ team is evaluating the option of deactivating that trigger, awaiting a confirmation from the vendor as well, otherwise a change will be probably required in that SFA customization. To be confirmed.

Opportunity Total Amount field not calculated properly in CPQ Opportunities,USSFA-6635,190388,,Story,NATCO APPROVAL,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,,ampoura,ampoura,ampoura,04/Nov/21 11:55 AM,06/Dec/21 5:17 PM,07/Jan/22 12:45 PM,,,,,0,CPQR1UAT,GR,SFR3S21,,,,,,"Additional info on top of Short Description:

The system calculates the total Opportunity amount based on the roll-up summary of the respective line items. This is impacted by parallel execution/updates of SFA and CPQ processes. On top of that, we also need to review and re-evaluate a NatCo-specific customization that relates to contract duration, one-time and recurring fees and other aspects that were created as customizations before starting the CPQ implementation. Now, these aspects are being handled by CPQ.

As part of the applied SFA customizations, each Line Item Total Price is calculated as follows: (Quantity * Recurring Fee * Number Of Periods) + One Time fee. This is an SFA customization that alters the standard Amount calculation.

In order to facilitate consolidated reporting, the Total Price custom calculation should be modified as following in order to properly calculate Amount for both SFA and CPQ Opportunities, as CPQ has own standard fields that replace the SFA custom ones.
Total Price = (Quantity * Recurring Total * number Of Periods) + One Time Total
Total Price = (Quantity * Recurring Fee * Number Of Periods) + One Time fee

column2: i0doy7:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,144.0,,,,,"Opportunity Total Amount field not calculated properly in CPQ Opportunities, resulting in Total Amount = 0, impacting consolidated reporting.

column1: More details in the Description field.
# Implement new field in the custom setting coredt__AutomationConfiguration__c called 'Opportunity Amount Calculation Bypass', field should be unchecked by default
# Flow 'coredt__OpportunityProductFlow' should be adjusted to skip amount calculation when 'Opportunity Amount Calculation Bypass' is checked
# Adjust local apex script to setup 'Opportunity Amount Calculation Bypass' as active
# New field on the Opportunity Line Item 'Recurring Total' should be created. Currency(16, 2)
# New field on the Opportunity Line Item 'One Time Total' should be created. Currency(16, 2)
# Profile on HQ needs to be adjusted to see and edit new fields.
# New calculation of total price for OLI needs to be created. Flow
# Adjust local apex script to setup 'Opportunity Amount Calculation Bypass' as active
{     Total Price = Recurring Total + One Time Total }

{    Total Price = (Quantity * Recurring Fee * Number Of Periods) + One Time fee  }",,,,,04/Nov/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,159.0,,,,,,,aanagnostopoulos,abatziaka,ampoura,atanas.bombov,damkowalski,enidelkou,ipasialis,mchojnacki,mtzouma,tlaiszner,,,,,,,,,,,,,"08/Nov/21 5:58 PM;damkowalski;[~ampoura],
I was thinking about this calculation a bit. From my perspective We are very limited here looking on the order of execution in SF.
Due to the fact that this mechanism is implemented in SF via flow we can't inject any logic into it, considering this We need:

1. Build feature switch which allows You to switch off SFA calculation. Here We need to remember about HQ integration, so fields which are sent still needs to be filled. In this scenario We switch off SF Core part
2. Build in core extension for GR Local logic to put calculation here, to keep consistent CPQ and SF
3. Implement calculation in Apex code and allow to overwrite logic in the extension class in GR Local. It needs to be done together with feature switch to change implementation country by country.
The cleanest and preferred option is 3. [~aanagnostopoulos], [~abatziaka] Please still introduce this topic to discuss it during architecture call.","08/Nov/21 8:39 PM;aanagnostopoulos;[~damkowalski]
the main concern is that adding more Apex logic could cause additional consumption of the already extremely limited resources, causing other performance issues.

Maybe the restructuring of the formula is the more (system) cost-effective approach. In any case, Nansy will introduce that tomorrow.","10/Nov/21 2:28 PM;damkowalski;[~aanagnostopoulos], [~abatziaka],
I tried to map fields between CPQ and SF, can You take a look on that and confirm that this is what We want to map in the integration:
we confirm that these are the fields. Regarding API names there is one '_' missing for the Vlocity fields. Let me correct above table with the exact API name of the fields
Which option did you decide to implement  ?","10/Nov/21 6:19 PM;mchojnacki;Hi [~ipasialis],
I would like to make sure that we are on the same page to avoid any problem.
From Salesforce to Legacy we should send the following values:
there should be taken values for CPQ column (vlocity_cmt__RecurringTotal__c, coredt__NumberOfPeriods__c, vlocity_cmt__OneTimeTotal__c)
these from SF column (coredt__RecurringFee__c, coredt__NumberOfPeriods__c, coredt__OneTimeFee__c).

Above-mentioned values should be returned as Recurring Fee, No. of Periods, One-time Fee respectively in line with Interface Agreement ([https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/EDA_Opportunity_v1.0.0)]
For example, it is supposed to be returned value for vlocity_cmt__RecurringTotal__c then it will be returned under:
Please let me know if our understanding is correct.
CC [~abatziaka], [~damkowalski], [~mczarnecki]","11/Nov/21 12:45 PM;ipasialis;[~abatziaka] please confirm ( or correct ) the above issue.","12/Nov/21 10:48 AM;abatziaka;Hi all,

Business stakeholders has verified that Recurring Total includes the Quantity and Number Of Periods calculated. So the values that should be taken into consideration if the PricebookEntry.Name = 'OTE CPQ B2B Price Book' are the vlocity_cmt_RecurringTotal_c and vlocity_cmt_OneTimeTotal_c. Also, as there would be a feature to switch off the flow for Greek NatCo we will create an automation only for Greek NatCo to fill the Total Price of Opportunity Line Items which will include below logic:
{  Total Price = Recurring Total + One Time Total }
{ Total Price = (Quantity * Recurring Fee * Number Of Periods) + One Time fee }

To make sure that we understood, fields that are synchronised with GR system are Recurring Fee, One-time Fee, so if PricebookEntry.Name = 'OTE CPQ B2B Price Book' then under these fields (_Recurring Fee, One-time Fee_) should be taken values from vlocity_cmt_RecurringTotal_c and vlocity_cmt_OneTimeTotal_c otherwise values should be taken from _coredt___RecurringFee___c and_ _coredt___OneTimeFee___c._
I cannot confirm mappings integrations between local and HQ orgs but with regards to the value that should be calculated on Opportunity line item the values should be as mentioned above:
If PricebookEntry.Name is 'OTE CPQ B2B Price Book' then
Total Price = Recurring Total + One Time Total
Total Price = (Quantity * Recurring Fee * Number Of Periods) + One Time fee
[~damkowalski] can you help with the mapping?
I got info from [~abatziaka] about processing Opportunity record which is created in SF in CPQ.
Opportunity can be converted from SF -> CPQ only in this direction.
CPQ Opportunity can't be moved from CPQ -> SF.
Due to that fact i suggest to build calculation based on the condition:
Total Price = Recurring Total + One Time Total
Total Price = (Quantity * Recurring Fee * Number Of Periods) + One Time fee
Opportunities can be converted from SF to CPQ and only to that direction.
CPQ opportunities will not change to SF.
Just to be fully clear in most situations and what have been discussed so far the Opportunities will be converted from SF to CPQ.

As the first phase of CPQ contains MVP products, there might be a chance for the user to create a CPQ Opportunity and realizing that not all products needed are CPQ configured, so he/she will switch to SF Opportunity. Meaning that will change Price Book, the CPQ Opportunities Products will be deleted and he/she will select the standard Price Book and select the products again from the sf way. In such scenario the Recurring Total will be blank for each Opportunity Product so the condition mentioned above is correct:
{     Total Price = Recurring Total + One Time Total }
{    Total Price = (Quantity * Recurring Fee * Number Of Periods) + One Time fee  }
Can you please confirm for which profiles do we need to turn off the standard calculation?
the profiles that the calculation should be turned off are the below:
In order to fetch the necessary fields (vlocity_cmt__RecurringTotal__c, vlocity_cmt__OneTimeTotal__c) the integration user will need a package license on production.
Please confirm this license can be provisioned.
There was created new ticket USSFA-6731 covering issue with missing access to new fields for integration user.
Integration solution has been deployed on UAT EDA GR and UAT EDA HQ. It can be tested on GR Salesforce SITUAT.
The following fields are available under below structure:
if I understood correctly everything has been delivered to UAT. Can You please share with us results of testing or some other actions are required from DTT side?

thank You very much for immediate feedback :)

I was just wondering what is the status. If something is needed from DTT side, but we are not aware of it. If tests are being performed and nothing is blocking You from DTT side, then I am looking forward to further steps.

Account anonymization,USSFA-6632,190385,,Story,NATCO APPROVAL,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,,ipasialis,ampoura,ampoura,04/Nov/21 11:51 AM,28/Nov/21 4:33 PM,06/Feb/22 10:33 PM,,,,,0,CPQR1UAT,GR,SFR3S20,,,,,,"Additional details on top of Short Description field.

CPQ Cart in Opportunity can handle approx. 60-90 line items of ICT and Mass products whilst in Quote Cart the threshold is ~150-180 line items, as a result of the CPQ custom pricing optimizations we applied in combination with asynchronous execution approach. Depending on the solution mix, there are cases we have managed to go beyond 200 lines.

This issue is related to the performance issue Vlocity will review but it is also due to the implicit execution of the SFA customizations in the background. In addition, the standard Vlocity Cart execution is by definition heavy, executing a large number of DML actions and therefore consuming system resources as well.
Impact on: Creation and update of large-scale offerings (with more than 60-90 elements)

Status: Partial cause is identified, We increased number of OLI which can be added in 1 transaction. Further investigation required for further improvement.",,aanagnostopoulos,ampoura,damkowalski,enidelkou,ipasialis,mtzouma,pdlugosz,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-4579,,,,,,,,,,,,,CPQ-2219,CPQ-2226,CPQ-2090,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"10/Nov/21 4:28 PM;ampoura;Lead last 4 months-2021-11-10-16-25-40.xlsx;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/159825/Lead+last+4+months-2021-11-10-16-25-40.xlsx","10/Nov/21 4:28 PM;ampoura;Opps created updated last 4months-2021-11-10-16-22-47.xlsx;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/159826/Opps+created+updated+last+4months-2021-11-10-16-22-47.xlsx","18/Nov/21 4:07 PM;damkowalski;image-2021-11-18-15-07-24-449.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/162158/image-2021-11-18-15-07-24-449.png","18/Nov/21 4:07 PM;damkowalski;image-2021-11-18-15-07-44-364.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/162159/image-2021-11-18-15-07-44-364.png",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,NA,,,,,,,,,,04/Nov/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,40.0,,,v0.54.0-1,,,v0.52.0-1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2

","10/Nov/21 4:15 PM;ipasialis;[~damkowalski]  Let me give you some feedback on this.

Once in a week ( every Monday evening) there is an internal process that we decide which accounts should be anonymized in legacy .This anonymization is propagated to Salesforce through standard integration.
Also, Salesforce side, you have a delivered a job that is scheduled once a day , that actually sets the right flags to account level in order for our legacy process to decide properly.

column1: Do I understand correctly that this is the problem with the report?

Maybe there is some other US, that I am not aware of, where it is explicitly stated, but according to USSFA-4579 value ""anonymized"" was added as part of the solution, to indicate that account is anonymized, so it makes sense that this is the value of the Status field. If you would like to see something else, that would be a change request.
this is not a report problem. accounts that exist on file , have an account overall status = anonymized.
in GR we have status for fixed, mobile and ICT and according to those statuses, account overall status is populated as well.
for example account SF-02732656 has Status for Fix : ONCE_EXISTED and status for mobile: EXISTING. so i would expect account status to be EXISTING.
instead it has status: anonymized. according to confluence [https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/2.2.1.1.+Account+Picklist+Values+for+HAL+WIP] anonymized is not an acceptable value.
USSFA-4579 refers to account anonymization process but there isn't a problem with the process instead the problem exists on an account field

According to discussion under USSFA-4579 the Status = anonymized is set by interation from legacy: ""Status will be used in HAL model to propagate status of Account from Legacy (Anonimized)"". This approach was agreed. If you want to change it, please create a new User Story with description of what do you expect to happen for anonymized accounts. This status is important because we base additional logic on this Status","04/Nov/21 1:48 PM;ELeodi;hi [~jkomorowska] ,

CC [~mgiannat], [~Gabor.Fal], [~mczarnecki]","19/Oct/21 10:51 AM;mgiannat;Hi [~mchojnacki] [~Gabor.Fal] [~mczarnecki] could you please share the target date of the mulesoft ticket ?","19/Oct/21 3:07 PM;mchojnacki;Hi [~mgiannat],
please be informed, that the issue is being analysed by Mulesoft support and as soon as we get some information we will provide target date.
Mulesoft team was asked about status of investigation. Awaiting a feedback.","05/Nov/21 12:26 PM;mchojnacki;+*STATUS*+:

_*ROOT CAUSE*_: It was triggered by a Runtime issue which caused the source listener to use an invalid connection (with an old, invalid token) upon reconnecting. This happened in a looping fashion which matches the behaviour you have observed.

_*SOLUTION*_: The issue has now been resolved as of the November Runtime release - 4.4.0. However, we are currently operating within 4.3. Upgrading to 4.4.0 would require to perform comprehensive regression testing therefore we have requested to add respective changes to 4.3. We are waiting for a response.
+I would like to emphasize that it was problem connected to Mulesoft, not to application prepared by DTT.+
Adjustments covering issue raised in this ticket are also included in 4.3 version from November 1, 2021 release.

Today, at night, we are going to update UAT EDA GR to the newest version within 4.3 (_released November 8, 2021_) that included all previous changes. If for next few days no issues are observed, PROD EDA GR will be also updated.
It is worth mentioning, for the present, on UAT version from November 1 is running. Differences between version from November 1 and November 8 are really slight.

!image-2021-10-08-08-18-24-963.png!","08/Oct/21 8:22 AM;ELeodi;the user can't manually change consent status from rejected to not yet received and verified it again today as a logged in as the specific user
After investigation, I have an assumption what happened here.
* ""Process for oral - rejected"" is asynchronous, which means that it will be invoked not immediately, but some time in future.

* While you can't change the status manually as demonstrated by the screenshot, the user very much can set the status to ""Not yet received"" by clicking ""Acquire consents"".  In fact, this is the only place where such assignment happens.

My assumption is that user clicked ""Reject"". The process is not invoked immediately, giving him time to go to the Contact and click ""Acquire consents"", for whatever reason. On SF side, after clicking ""Acquire consents"", there will be an error thrown only if the status is already ""Not yet received"" and no error for any other status value, giving the condition that request made to Legacy was successful. I'll try to check logs with my colleagues from Mulesoft to confirm that theory.
Meanwhile please explain to me Consent Status Lifecycle. From which value it is allowed to switch to ""Not yet received"" from business point of view?","11/Oct/21 8:51 AM;ELeodi;Hi [~mreznyk],
once the user saves oral - consent / oral - rejected the not yet received status is shown for a few seconds until this information reaches our legacy.
the status is automatically changed to consent given / rejected. on rejected after some time the contact becomes anonymized.

in any case no user can set this status. it is a system status that exists until contact receives consent link and registers his preferences (sales process ) or in oral consent cases until information is sent to our legacy (tele appointment process)
to test your theory i pressed the acquire consent button on a contact that had consent status "" rejected"" and , the user is able to do this.
but how can statuses change by data integration user and the actual user on the same time?
i find it unlikely that the specific user pressed the button twice because he has to go through a pop up message to complete process through acquire consent button.
he would have noticed it and not done it by mistake as he is an experienced salesforce user
Thank you for testing and clarifications.

I've double checked the code and ""Acquire Consents"" is indeed the only place where change of status by non admin or integration user would work. Maybe the user had a few different working tabs open and in one of them the form was already prepopulated. There is a chance, that this change didn't happen immediately (at the same time). You can see, that history tracking doesn't show seconds. I assume there could be 30-40 seconds difference. But to confirm it, I'll need to see logs. Could you please share External Id of the Consent itself?
Anyway, regardless of how exactly that happened, we have identified the problem. I propose such a solution:

* To add additional validation during ""Acquire Consents"" process execution, which (for all users) would prevent sending of the request and the change of status to ""Not yet received"", in case of current status already being ""Rejected"" or 'Consent given"" .

Please confirm if that would be a correct behavior from business point of view.","12/Oct/21 8:14 AM;ELeodi;[~mreznyk] yes this validation rule will solve our problem and it is the expected behavior business wise!
[~ampoura]can you provide consent external id for contact 1-59DU-2222 ? i don't see it on my ui","12/Oct/21 1:34 PM;ampoura;[~mreznyk] [~ELeodi]

column1: This issue is marked as high, but is it blocking, can we decrease it to medium? ","04/Oct/21 1:42 PM;ELeodi;Hi [~jwszolkowski] ,
USSFA-1135 is the consent process for sales and the contact accepts or rejects consent through a link sent to him so email / mobile is mandatory and this is normal
tele appointment acquire consent mostly through console and gets oral consent from contact.
if contact consents then an informative message is sent to him and no actions from contact are required.
when it is rejected, contact receives no informative sms/e mail so fields e mail and mobile are not mandatory when agent selects oral - rejected.
this is correct as mentioned on USSFA-3161
problem is that in prod, when email/mobile are not filled in, consent status remains oral-rejected (when it should turn to rejected) and contact never gets anonymized
this is high because there were 175 contacts for who anonymization process never started and there will be more until this is solved.
for now users do manual steps , like filling in dummy e mail / mobile phones in contact and restart the process for the process to be completed","04/Oct/21 2:22 PM;jwszolkowski;[~ELeodi],

So to sum up if Consent Status is oral rejected then validation on communication channel should not be triggered?","04/Oct/21 2:28 PM;ELeodi;[~jwszolkowski] correct. but anonymization process should start regardless","06/Oct/21 2:55 PM;jwszolkowski;[~ELeodi],

I need logs with Operation FutureHandler. We may do it on a call togeter if preferred

I identified one issue and second potential issue.

1) Not synchronized contacts can be displayed in telesales app. That's what most likely occured in our test - as a result Id in RelatedParties was not filled with ContactExternalId. How we should address that? I'm proposing on of following approaches:
* not displaying not synchronized contacts to telesales user on telesales console
* displaying error message when user want to accept/rejest such a contact in telesals console

2) contactMedium and contactMediumType is not send in a structure when communication channel information is not filled in. Mappings says that it's not required on HAL side ([https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/REST_ConsentAcquisition_v1.0.0),] but can we double-check if there's any validation on this properties? As it was mentioned in discussions - it should not be required on consent rejection.

so if I understand well you say that our problem is that we try to get a consent to a contact that is not yet synchronized with our legacy ( dirty flag) is on ? This is the outcome of point 1 ?  If yes , [~ELeodi] can we try to check what Jakub says? Can we try to reproduce the issue to a synchronized contact?
If synchronization is the problem , then we can think of a solution. But we need to be sure.

message that prompts me to fill in communication channel appears and process does not start

wrong totals in reporting,USSFA-6480,182062,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Done/Fixed,ELeodi,ELeodi,ELeodi,24/Sep/21 9:17 AM,24/Sep/21 2:52 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,24/Sep/21 2:52 PM,,,,0,GRProd,incident,,,,,,,"in prod and on report Revenues per Product Family 2 (Tony) the user has set the following filters
unfortunately when we run the query some subtotals are wrong and we get wrong results.
can you please check? we are getting wrong sums and it is very important for reporting
i did the math and have green boxes for the correct sums and red boxes for the wrong ones
This problem is caused by the feature which is called ""smart totaling"" that Salesforce implemented in Reports.
Please take a read: [https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000325082&type=1]  - this is similar case that we are facing here.

column2: i0c7jr:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,22/Sep/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,ampoura,ipasialis,mczarnecki,mgiannat,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"22/Sep/21 6:23 PM;mczarnecki;I have took a look and have some very serious concerns.

column1: # sf-> legacy, timeout on enrichment DID NOT stop the processing flow, leading to a possible publication of not complete event
# legacy->sf, timeout on enrichment DID NOT stop the processing flow, leading to a possible publication of not complete event
It looks like runtime handled the connection exception - I need to run some more detailed analysis, but at the first glance it looks like Mulesoft defect (errors should stop the processing flow)

CC [~Gabor.Fal]","22/Sep/21 8:36 PM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat] Mulesoft support case was created (00306129), We are awaiting for Mulesoft to confirm, that in scenario above no enrichment query was skipped.
Deeper analysis suggests, that reconnection strategy silently reconnects and the flow commences - but I need clear statement on that.

","23/Sep/21 3:01 PM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat]: In the meanwhile, I think that it is worth to open a case with Salesforce support pointing out mentioned timeouts (reauests taking longer than 15 seconds).
Could You please ask SF support why those request took so much time?
","23/Sep/21 3:04 PM;mgiannat;[~ipasialis] [~ampoura] please check the above","23/Sep/21 3:17 PM;ampoura;Case created with number  #41405904
CC [~mgiannat] [~ipasialis] [~mczarnecki]","01/Oct/21 3:58 PM;mgiannat;Hi [~mczarnecki] any update on the mulesoft ticket pls?
I have checked the ticket - unfortunately there is no progress from the mule side.","01/Oct/21 8:14 PM;mgiannat;[~Gabor.Fal] could you please help here in order for Mulesoft to speed up?
CC [~edimaki]","19/Oct/21 10:52 AM;mgiannat;Hi [~Gabor.Fal] [~mczarnecki] [~krolf] could you please share any update on this?","19/Oct/21 2:32 PM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat]:

Hi Team, After discussing with engineering, you should not be concerned about any errors being silently forgotten. - The connector handles the exceptions internally - The warning is logged and the request is retried in line with the reconnection strategy defined - If a non connectivity related exception occurs an error will be thrown - If reconnections are exhausted a SALESFORCE:CONNECTIVITY error will be thrown - If no error is thrown then the exception has been successfully handled internally. - Flow execution should therefore not continue without the query completing - an error would be thrown. I hope the above has helped clarify the behaviour. Of course in the event you observe any behaviour different to the description above please raise a case so we can investigate further. Kind regards, James MuleSoft Support

product level on opportunity does not show GR Values,USSFA-6446,180536,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Done/Fixed,ELeodi,ELeodi,ELeodi,17/Sep/21 2:48 PM,04/Oct/21 8:56 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,04/Oct/21 8:56 AM,,,,0,GRProd,incident,,,,,,,"in production on opportunity O-331135 , when i add product ip vpn while i add it i see GR level 1 and GR level 2
but after i add it and i drill in to it i see Harmonized level 1 while according to USSFA-5099
i would expect to see GR Product Family (Level 2) & GR Product Area (Level 1) there as well.
can you please fix this because it creates a big issue with our reporting

Your request is relevant. We use to have similiar functionality for Product Area and Product Family - it was copied from product and stored on opportunity product. I would just like to clarify, as it may be implemented in 2 ways.
1) We can store GR Family information as a formula field and on opportunity product we will have always the same GR Family as on product, even if it would be updated

2) We can store GR Family information as a regular field and on opportunity product we will have original value from moment of creation of opportunity product. If family information of product will change with time, old value on opportunity product will remain.
Which approach do you expect to be implemented?

we will go with option 1 (formula field)","21/Sep/21 5:13 PM;jwszolkowski;Just for your information - as I implemented field as local, if you are using harmonized report type then new fields won't be added to those reports. In order to make it work you need to clone harmonized report types, create local ones and add GR Family fields there. ","22/Sep/21 10:35 AM;ipasialis;Hi Jakub  ,
I think recently I was reading an article sayning that custom fields are automatically included in custom report types, so that you dont need to bother manually to add them.

PS : I think it was part of Salesforce’s “Summer 21” release.  Can you please verify? If this is the case then we dont need to clone the existing report types","22/Sep/21 1:12 PM;jwszolkowski;[~ipasialis],
I believe that you mean this: [https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=release-notes.rn_rd_reports_auto_add_custom_fields.htm&type=5&release=232]
It would apply to custom report types which are local, but it wouldn't apply to core custom report types","22/Sep/21 1:56 PM;ipasialis;Ok ,
so if we need a new field we should create a local report type and add it.
Thanks for the advice","23/Sep/21 5:17 PM;mcylwik;Tested on : [https://ote--grotsptest.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/OpportunityLineItem/00k9E0000082FxEQAU/view]

After changes when adding product to the opportunity there are fields GR Product Area (Level 1) and GR Product Family (Level 2). After saving fields are visible on layout and show info from product that was added.  It works on creating and updating.
Fields GR Product Area (Level 1) and GR Product Family (Level 2) are also available when creating/updating report for opportunities.

please correct me if I am mistaken. Our understanding is as follows:

In GR system, some changes were made within Account object. They should be synchronised with Salesforce. Field Account Division was sent as null, but after synchronisation, there is other value than expected in Salesforce.
value for Account Division should be sent under the following field:

Can You please provide request that was sent to allow me to checking the structure? I am asking, because from Mulesoft perspective, there is active mapping for Account Division that is in line with specification.
Besides, does this problem appear also on UAT environment?
CC [~mczarnecki]","29/Sep/21 1:12 PM;christos.daskalakis;The characteristic accountDevision is created only when SalesDivision is not empty and not null.
In the specific request the SalesDivision element was null so it was not sent to SF at all.
In this specific case, the value sent by bus should be   ""-"" in order for us to sent a null value for the characteristic accountDivision to SF.
[~hkaragioka] can you investigate from your side?","29/Sep/21 1:58 PM;hkaragioka;The field SalesDivision is mapped through CCDI mapping and below you may find the corresponding values:
Value '-' doesn't exist and as a result OSB has sent a null value to HAL.

Otherwise let's wait the email reply since Collections team is not in JIRA.","29/Sep/21 3:17 PM;ELeodi;[~tkiritsi] would you like to open a PBI for this?

column1: Following the feedback we received from Collection OTE team in email, it seems there is no issue on our side.
[~ELeodi] sorry for the confusion, could you please also share a fresh screenshot?
[~pdlugosz] attached [^new 3]is the response of GR HAL service that is consumed from Mulesoft.
It seems that either Mulesoft or Salesforce sums the amounts. [~pdlugosz] please check
Is this the only value which is wrongly calculated?
Are the others balance values correct in both rows?
this account only had one balance showing so i tried it with other accounts.

for mobile open balance i checked account Π ΚΑΛΦΑΣ Κ ΣΙΑ Ε. Ε vat 800472668 external id SF-FBEE2DFB-C4AC-11e9-9B0A-000C00000000 and open balance 41.80 shown in Salesforce for customer code 6.302779 is correct according to our legacy
another account with an open fixed balance is account vat external id that for customer code 1-7G9-2186  it shows balance 450.00 and open balance 225.00 and past due amount 165.00
in our legacy this customer code has 2 billing accounts
13237800 balance = 165.00 , open balance = 165.00 and past due amount = 165.00
15002775 balance = 60 , open balance = 60 and past due amount = 0.
so i would expect to see balance = 225.00 but open balance and past due amount seem to be correct

The aggregation happens on SF side. We receive the list of values from Mulesoft and then we sum them up. I've run locally the script, which is responsible for aggregation, with the values that you've provided and it calculated it correctly. I highly doubt the root cause is in the code, especially, since other balances are okay. Which means, that most likely there is some additional value in the list or the list itself is not as you expect.

I would like to see the logs of what is being returned from Mulesoft to SF. [~mchojnacki]  and I discussed it. Unfortunately on Prod, Mulesoft do not log the actual data being transferred, for security reasons I guess. That's why I would like to ask you to find for me an Account in SITUAT, with some balances, which are not calculated correctly. If there is no such Account, please try to find an account with some balances in general, even if they are calculated correctly. I would be able to check SF logs that's way.

The reason I want to do it on SITUAT first is that I would be able to check it myself and I would be able to experiment with logs, since in SF they are often truncated, which doesn't help us much, so I'll need to see how logs look like and what can be done with them in case truncation.

cc: [~mchojnacki] [~ipasialis] [~ampoura]","30/Sep/21 11:58 AM;mgiannat;Hi [~mreznyk], in order to speed up please enable increased logging in PROD and assign back to [~ELeodi] to reload the aforementioned problematic case. Increased logging is supported and can be opened to investigate production issues.","30/Sep/21 12:24 PM;mreznyk;Hi [~mgiannat]
[~mchojnacki] can we do that in Mulesoft?
Logs have been turned on. Please open the Account with incorrect balances and refresh the page, so the request could be processed. After that, please paste the External Id of the Account you used.
i also refreshed the initial account that has this problem external id for that SF-FAE45D53-025F-11ea-A8A0-000C00000000","30/Sep/21 4:42 PM;mreznyk;Hi [~ELeodi]
Can you please repeat the same thing right now?
Open Balance and past due amount are correct according to our legacy
balance still seems to be incorrect.
15002775 with an open balance 60 and nothing else
13237800 with an open balance 55 and past due amount also 55.
for this customer code on salesforce i see balance 230 but numbers just don't add up to this amount","01/Oct/21 11:31 AM;mreznyk;Hi [~ELeodi]
So we finally got the logs. As I was expecting values are being calculated correctly. It is the list itself is not what you are expecting to see. Let's take for example 1-7G9-2186:
Here is the response from Mulesoft to SF
As you said it has 2 billing accounts.
* second with an open balance 55 and past due amount also 55.
But, you can see, that in both of them ""balance"" is 115 which adds up to 230, exactly what you see. So calculations are correct.
This is also not a fault of Mulesoft during response structure modification. They receive those values from Siebel. Here is the response from Legacy to Mulesoft
So, please check with Legacy guys, why they sent this list of values, if you expect to see something else.

So, is this normal? This happened for all Account, I don't know if it a bug or not. There is a 5 minute delay, in the meantime the value is shown as null. [~ipasialis] is this acceptable IT wise?

I have reviewed the mapping both directions - it is done as in IA.
I have also run series of tests with my own kafka cluster and example events - also in both directions - customer segment was always mapped properly.
At this point I see three possibilities:
# SF might not push customer segment
# Event from legacy is very ""special"" and is revealing unknown bug in DataWeave processor
# There is event processor on NatCo side, which maps value wrongly
[~mgiannat]: the payload that You have attached is having different eventType, it is contact (not account), it's not related to the case.

customerSynchRequestTopicSF topic (it looks like the event attached in Your previous comment is actually not the same as mule integration sends)

cc:[~F.Prentas]","30/Aug/21 1:24 PM;jwszolkowski;It's okay to do that together on meeting ","31/Aug/21 3:53 PM;jwszolkowski;[~ELeodi], this issue is most likely related with LIMIT 2000 in query, in a while I will provide you couple of queries I would like you to execute so you can give me amount of returned accounts to confirm that. In meanwhile I'm checking with developer of this story if we can remove/change this limitation or find other solution for that","31/Aug/21 3:58 PM;ELeodi;hi [~jwszolkowski] ,
since the limit is 2000 , shouldn't it just show 2000 results ? i find it strange that i just get zero results because of this limitation but of course you know better :)
so please send me the queries you want me to run and we'll go on from there!","01/Sep/21 1:01 PM;jwszolkowski;[~ELeodi],

Let me explain it. Based on search conditions query is built. The query retrieves accounts and children (like leads, tasks, and competitors). This query is limited to 2000 accounts, as this is a compromise between:
* fact that maximum generated list is 300 call list items

* 50000 of total return records in single query limitation - please notice that even if we limited accounts to a maximum 2000 of records, we are querying for children and that counts towards this limit as well
After this query results are filtered out
* Accounts with at least one open lead should be excluded
* Accounts with at least one planned call back should be excluded
* When the criteria list is not empty, at least one account competitor product must exist
* There are also filters based on the last opportunity and event

That's why even when a query returns 2000 records user may have an empty list as a result. The problem may exist when conditions are not restrictive and apply to more than 2000 Accounts. Queries are sorted by Last Response Date ascending and Amount Of Responses ascending. First 2k of accounts based on that sort are taken and others are not used and with each condition, we are adding, we have different 2000 of accounts retrieved and then filtered and that's the reason for the unexpected list size returned to the user.

In terms of a solution - we can't remove this limit, as each time more than 50k of records would be returned we would see an error. We may consider increasing this LIMIT from 2000 to a bit more, but that would affect the performance of queries and it wouldn't resolve issue, as you can see that currently, one query we used returned 8k of records, and that kind of LIMIT is too high to avoid exceptions.

What would you on approach to display information for a user, that search conditions applies to too many accounts (if applies for more than 2k accounts) and returned call list items may not be complete, so the user should add more conditions?
To confirm this could you execute those queries and provide me the amount of returned records per each?
(SELECT Id FROM coredt___AssociatedLeads___r WHERE NOT Status LIKE 'Closed%' LIMIT 1),
(SELECT Id FROM Tasks WHERE CallBackDate__c != null AND Status != 'Completed' LIMIT 1),
AND NumberOfOpenOpportunities___c = 0 ORDER BY LastResponseDate____c ASC NULLS FIRST, AmountOfResponses___c ASC
(SELECT Id FROM coredt___AssociatedLeads___r WHERE NOT Status LIKE 'Closed%' LIMIT 1),
(SELECT Id FROM Tasks WHERE CallBackDate__c != null AND Status != 'Completed' LIMIT 1),
AND NumberOfOpenOpportunities___c = 0 ORDER BY LastResponseDate____c ASC NULLS FIRST, AmountOfResponses___c ASC
(SELECT Id FROM coredt___AssociatedLeads___r WHERE NOT Status LIKE 'Closed%' LIMIT 1),
(SELECT Id FROM Tasks WHERE CallBackDate__c != null AND Status != 'Completed' LIMIT 1),
AND NumberOfOpenOpportunities___c = 0 ORDER BY LastResponseDate____c ASC NULLS FIRST, AmountOfResponses___c ASC
(SELECT Id FROM coredt___AssociatedLeads___r WHERE NOT Status LIKE 'Closed%' LIMIT 1),
(SELECT Id FROM Tasks WHERE CallBackDate__c != null AND Status != 'Completed' LIMIT 1),
AND NumberOfOpenOpportunities___c = 0 ORDER BY LastResponseDate____c ASC NULLS FIRST, AmountOfResponses___c ASC","01/Sep/21 1:35 PM;ELeodi;Hi [~jwszolkowski]

for ""What would you on approach to display information for a user, that search conditions applies to too many accounts (if applies for more than 2k accounts) and returned call list items may not be complete, so the user should add more conditions? ""  , that you mentioned maybe we could display the message ""too many results are returned. please add more search criteria"" if [~tkiritsi] agrees to display this message. we will have to get back to you on this one as Filio is out of office this week
regarding the queries, i tried to run them and i get the same error in all 4 of them

Didn't understand relationship 'coredt_AssociatedLeads_r' in FROM part of query call. If you are attempting to use a custom relationship, be sure to append the '__r' after the custom relationship name. Please reference your WSDL or the describe call for the appropriate names.

sorry for that. Could you please try again, I edited queries to be correct - I forget that Jira format messages to bypass some underscores ;)","01/Sep/21 1:50 PM;ELeodi;[~jwszolkowski]

fourth query : 443478 results","01/Sep/21 3:55 PM;jwszolkowski;As we can see, each query returns a way more records. If most records are rejected because of limit before filtering, then it's not a surprise that we results acts in this way. [~ELeodi], should we assign it Filio and wait for a decision till Friday?
Could we lower priority as functionality works, users just need to use more detailed filters?","02/Sep/21 8:19 AM;ELeodi;Hi [~jwszolkowski],

once we spoke with Joanna about the same thing (we had a mismatch between reports and console results then)  , and she told us that when the console returns for example 4000 results , we will first see 2000 results and if the user miraculously works through the 2000 accounts and reruns the query the next 2000 will appear.
so this is not correct then? if the results are more than 2000 then the console will return no results?
i am sorry to ask again , i am just trying to make sure that we won't come across the same problem again...
i wasn't able to contact Fillio but since we found the problem you can assign it to her and she will let you know about the message when she returns form holiday!
in the meantime i changed prio to medium .

results are ordered by _LastResponseDate____c ASC NULLS FIRST and AmountOfResponses___c ASC. On the beginning there are Account without answer and at the end are Accounts recently with recent response. That means that if there was an account with no response and it was processed, it will change its place on next search and may be out of range of 2k accounts which are retrieved, as Joanna mentioned. ","06/Sep/21 11:38 AM;ELeodi;hi [~jwszolkowski]  ,
we are ok with displaying the message ""too many results are returned. please add more search criteria""

should this message be a warning displayed to user, so he can proceed with the generation of call list items, or rather should it be blocking error message which don't allow him to proceed with generation?","06/Sep/21 12:51 PM;ELeodi;[~jwszolkowski],
After tests with Jakub looks like everything works properly.
When searching results are over the limit You can see the message ""too many results are returned. please add more search criteria"" and it blocks user from generating list.

Add total accounts on "Accounts with account competitor products" report type ,USSFA-6231,170986,,Story,US Blocked,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,,,tkiritsi,tkiritsi,29/Jul/21 12:02 PM,28/Sep/21 10:48 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,,,,0,GR,NewDemand,,,,,,,"This tasks refers to  Kostas Kolovakis email .What Kostas is trying to accomplish is to combine on the same report the following:
a)Total of Accounts in a specific Account division
b)Which of the above have related account competitor products
c)Which of the above have related account competitor products with expiry date filled in
He can find b & c when using report type “Accounts with Account competitor products” but he misses *a)* which is total accounts regardless if the have related competitor products or not

Accounts with Account Competitor Product report type (which contains Account with or without related Account Competitor Products) and grouping by Account Division would address that?","30/Aug/21 11:28 AM;kkolovakis;hi cuba
as discribed by filio in the ""description"" section i would like to join ""a"" with ""b"" - ""c"".
i use report type “Accounts with Account competitor products”  for ""b"" and  ""c""
can you please take a look at this? it was created on 29/Jul/21 but it was not assigned to you by mistake
I see that when adding information to report then all account without competitors are filtered out, so maybe this kind of report would work for you?

It's joined report, both blocks are Accounts with Account Competitor Products. Those blocks are grouped by Account Division. First blocks display all accounts, second blocks only the ones with account competitor product with expiry date information.
If you expect something more sophisticated then dashboard grouping this information should address it.
For the below report i would like to calculate ""how many unique accounts have at least one expiry date""
Specifically in the attached picture i would like the subtotal to  show 6 (number)
Is there a way to do this on the below report ?

column2: i0a9wv:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,26/Jul/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,ampoura,ELeodi,F.Prentas,jwszolkowski,kwojtczak,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"26/Jul/21 12:15 PM;ELeodi;users clarified that they have this problem when event is related to an opportunity , while when it is related to an account they have no problem editing it

column1: !image-2021-07-26-12-14-32-216.png!","26/Jul/21 2:31 PM;jwszolkowski;[~ELeodi], [~amitkou] I found root cause, before I will deal with could you clarify what kind of access is expected for Teleappointment users to events - do we expect that each teleappointment user can edit others events, or only managers/people above in hierarchy should be able to do that?","26/Jul/21 2:37 PM;ELeodi;hi [~jwszolkowski] ,
every user that has  GROTE Teleappointment Agent profile should be able to edit any event
so both users and managers should have this capability
As mentioned in first reference, in order to edit event:
You have the “Edit Tasks” and “Edit Events” permissions
AND You’re assigned to the activity (Your personal sharing setting doesn’t apply)
OR You’re above the user assigned to the activity in the role hierarchy (Your personal sharing setting doesn’t apply)
AND *You have edit or delete access to Name(Who) record (any 1 Contact if Shared Activities is enabled) AND the Related To (What) record.*
OR You have the “Modify All” object-level permission to the Name(Who) record (any 1 Contact if Shared Activities is enabled) AND the Related To (What) record.
OR You have the “Modify All Data” user permission (Your personal sharing setting doesn’t apply)

Problem is that when the event is connected with a record which is not editable by the users f.e Read-only Opportunities. It cannot be bypassed by sharing rule as it's not available on the Activity object. Because of Salesforce limitations, we need to address that issue in a different manner.

1) As you can see events can be edited by assignees or people above in the role hierarchy, one option is to use Chatter functionality on Opportunity object to communicate on that and ask people with permission to perform necessary changes
2) Another idea is to link events to records that are editable (Related Account to the read-only opportunity in that case) and adding information about related Opportunity in a description.
Is one of this option satisfying to you?
It is true that as a a baseline the opportunities must be edited by their owners and the hirerchy above them.

However Teleappointments team have a different need because they do things for/on behalf of the accouunt manager , thats why they often have to move events on behalf of them . This user story was trying to solve this problem since the begining (there was no indication from our side that we need it only for events related to accounts)  , so impelementing something that works only for some kind of events (e.g.related to accounts)  will not cover the business requirement.
Options 1 & 2 about chatter or linking events to editable records only don't work for us.

Therefore please advice what is the best solution to cover the business need-  maybe the “Modify All” object-level permission ? I realize that this would meen that a TS agent would  be able to edit all objects that are assigned to an Account manager (leads/opps/events/tasks) but we are ok with that.","28/Jul/21 7:09 PM;kwojtczak;Hello,

Modify All solution is a really strong one therefore we do not recommend giving it to the users. It would mean that the user with this permission can Read, Create, Edit, Delete, View All objects where it was given.
I wanted also to check with you since we had a bug like that already - USSFA-5967 and it was closed. Did something change from that moment with the requirement?
bug USSFA-5967 was created in June but user story USSFA-4554 was not yet in Natco Approval, so we just closed the bug since nothing could be done about it at that time.
If ""modify all"" is too strong and not recomended , please provide another solution.

In any case the business requirement was the same all along and it refers to the TS users being able to edit all events on behalf or the account managers .","03/Aug/21 12:07 PM;ampoura;Hello [~kwojtczak] ,
I talked to [~jkomorowska] and the initial agreement was that events will be created only in relationship to Accounts and Contacts.
In this case, event is related to an Opportunity to which Teleappointement user does not have edit permission.

1) So in this case we would need to add Sharing rule that will give access to Accounts (which are not confidential) and therefore Read/Write permission to child Opportunities to all Teleappointements users (that would be a CR)
2) Users make sure that events are connected to Accounts and not other objects.
In case of scenario 1 you would need to think if there are other objects to which events should be connected and appropriate sharing of the event should be provided.
none of the above solutions work for us so we will try to work around it by creating new events and deleting the old ones.
if we decide to come back to this we will open a us.

","22/Jul/21 8:56 PM;ipasialis;Let me repeat the issue. The issue here is that Account with SF Ext Acc ID: SF-ONE-SRV-200577740 , does not synchronize from Legacy to Salesforce. Your investigation yesterday showed that the problem was the account owners SF_Compound_Unique id , did not match with the actual value of the user.  And you were right.

Natassa made the update on the user , she put the right value on this field  (matching the one of the account record ) . And we tried to send again the Account from Legacy to Salesforce. But the error in Mulesoft is the same . So either we did the fix but not in the proper way ( we double checked it) , or there is another error - maybe another field.
So please check in Mulesoft if you received anything for the specific account , today in the morning
","23/Jul/21 1:43 AM;mjodlowski;I miss one puzzle, on which environment, initially it was prod, then we retested on UAT... now we come back to prod :)
Foreign key external ID: gr-ote~xnpagorop@central-domain.root.ote.gr not found for field coredt__SFCompoundUniqueId__c in entity User{code}
It's really important for us to understand, what action was done in system, which env, when, when business configuration was changed, etc :(...
In SIT/UAT those fields where empty. It is now fixed in both environments.

column1: No the FALSE value must still be available
* Account creation on SF :the Decision flag must be pre populated to True  , giving ability to the User to change it to False if needed
* Lead conversion : the Decision flag must be pre populated to True- in case the user wants to set it to False he will have to navigate to the account and edit it

* Integration : if the integration sends TRUE/FALSE ,SF must accept it , if integration send nulls , SF  must set it to True",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

TS console configuration screen,USSFA-6158,167158,,Story,US Blocked,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,,,oana.ene,oana.ene,13/Jul/21 6:46 PM,13/Jul/21 6:46 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,Release 4,,,0,NewDemand,,,,,,,,"A business admin and a TS manager must be able to configure what set of accounts should be available for the 2 TS team (corex/direct) to call , by generating call lists with a specific label and status (active /inactive)
The user must be able to assign each list to specific TS user roles or users
The lists must be added as query field on the TS Console for the agents
The purpose of this requirement is :
-make sure that 2 agents of different TS teams don't call the same account by mistake in their query
-minimize the eligible accounts they should contact according to CRM decisions.
-prioritize / highlight accounts e.g. as eligible for specific products
The generation of a list must be possible with the following mechanisms:

-Use of Specific fields ,such as account segment , account division , potential value , status , status fixed , status mobile , annual revenue , occupation , number of employees ,zip code range ,must be available for the admin user in order to assign the accounts to a specific Call
-bulk assignment mechanism with ability to upload excel of accounts
The call lists must be available for reporting in a report type that combines Accounts & call lists.
An account can be part of more than one lists.

Assignment of customers in one system,USSFA-6150,166833,,Story,New,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,,ipasialis,ELeodi,ELeodi,12/Jul/21 2:19 PM,12/Jul/21 2:47 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,Release 4,,,0,GR,,,,,,,,"Since Salesforce is in Production and it is the system where Direct Sales reference to create Leads and Opportunities, in replacement of Siebel, there is a need to re-define the process of assigning customers in CRM systems. Therefore, there should be a simplification of the assignment process to assure: • The assignment of the Sales Division, Account Manager, Customer Care Agent, Service Level, Group tag per customer is created in one system and the information is correctly distributed in the edge systems • The reconciliation of any discrepancies between systems should be considered either in Operational or Reporting level. Since there is a process of Data Analysis and Data Mining from DWH to conclude to the customers assigned, the present spec covers the process of assigning the customers and not the decision-making process.",prod,ELeodi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,12/Jul/21 11:59 PM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2

today we removed description and it synced without a problem
i recreated it on UAT for contact ΑΛΙΚΗ ΛΥΚΙΣΣΑ external id 1-31WB1N2 that belongs to account ΙΝΤΕΡΝΑΣΙΟΝΑΛ ΗΛΙΟΣ ΚΟΤΑΧΕΜ Α.Ε.Β.Ε. vat 094145434 external id SF-ONE-SRV-201364190.

i changed role and added description on 12/7/2021, 10:55 AM and it has not synced",prod,dmyriounis,ELeodi,mchojnacki,mgiannat,mjodlowski,oberraj,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-6184,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"21/Jul/21 2:52 AM;mchojnacki;Request.json;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/136027/Request.json","21/Jul/21 2:53 AM;mchojnacki;Specification.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/136028/Specification.png",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,12/Jul/21 11:59 PM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2
column2: i09r9b:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,12/Jul/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,dmyriounis,ELeodi,mchojnacki,mgiannat,mjodlowski,oberraj,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"12/Jul/21 3:57 PM;dmyriounis;[~ELeodi] [~mjodlowski] the problem occurs when the user adds Description under the Contact(using an existing Contact or a one created via Contact view). When the Contact is synced with Legacy, Description message disappears.

column1: The main issue here is the Lead Conversion. When the Sales Agent creates a new Contact via Lead Conversion and adds text under Description, the Contact won't sync unless we delete what is filled inside Description text box.
","13/Jul/21 10:19 AM;mjodlowski;Please check first from SF side.","19/Jul/21 5:57 PM;oberraj;Hi [~mjodlowski],
Here is the event log generated from SF, the description field is filled and sent correctly but after the contact record is synced, the description field is emptied.
can you please have a look from your side ?, thanks!
I would like to ask for Your assistance on this. On SF SITUAT there was created new contact (_contact ext id = 1-323K0YY_).
In this request body/Party/*description* is populated, so from integration perspective it seems to be fine. Can You please assign somebody who can check it in GR system.
CC [~ELeodi], [~dmyriounis], [~mjodlowski]","21/Jul/21 9:22 AM;mgiannat;Hi the issue is not applicable for SITUAT, only in PROD","21/Jul/21 12:33 PM;mchojnacki;[~mgiannat],
thank You for Your remarks, but referring to second part of ticket description:
_i recreated it on UAT for contact ΑΛΙΚΗ ΛΥΚΙΣΣΑ external id 1-31WB1N2 that belongs to account ΙΝΤΕΡΝΑΣΙΟΝΑΛ ΗΛΙΟΣ ΚΟΤΑΧΕΜ Α.Ε.Β.Ε. vat 094145434 external id SF-ONE-SRV-201364190_.""
problem also appears on UAT where the same mapping is applied as on PROD. We have also managed to replicate it and provided details. As You can see, field description is populated.
Taking above into account, from integration perspective everything seems to be fine, therefore I would like to ask for verification in GR system.

CC [~ELeodi], [~dmyriounis], [~mjodlowski]","21/Jul/21 12:38 PM;mgiannat;Hi [~mchojnacki] could you please clarify what verification is expected from GR side?","22/Jul/21 2:08 AM;mjodlowski;Please check what happened in Legacy with that event.
Problem is being reproduced on UAT, description change is sent to Legacy, we need to understand if possibly Legacy sends the same or empty description.
Marek","22/Jul/21 10:56 AM;ELeodi;contacts in production seem to have synced.

column1: account came to teleappointment console when it shouldn't,USSFA-6137,166082,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Won't Do/Dropped,ELeodi,ELeodi,ELeodi,07/Jul/21 12:09 PM,09/Jul/21 9:27 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,09/Jul/21 9:27 AM,,,,0,GRProd,incident,,,,,,,"in production account PET SUPERMARKET OE vat 099005149 external id SF-02382162 has an open opportunity with id O-326768.

according to user story USSFA-3050 when an account has an open opportunity it is excluded from console but when user set a call back task, account appeared in console eventhough it had an open opportunity",prod,ELeodi,milipinski,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,07/Jul/21 11:59 PM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2
Can you check creation dates of the Opportunity and Callback?
Can you please check callback date as well?","08/Jul/21 7:45 AM;ELeodi;Hi [~milipinski]
Opportunity was created 16/6/2021, 12:54 PM and call back task was created 7/7/2021, 11:41 AM, with call back date 7/7/2021, 11:45 AM

user created a call back task on account because he wanted to create an event through console but since the account has an open opportunity, call back should not come to the user in console since account is excluded from console until opportunity closes.
this should call back should remain pending and pop up to the user as a call back when account is eligible to appear in console","08/Jul/21 7:29 PM;milipinski;[~ELeodi]
I believe that this is a border case that has never been considered.
USSFA-3050 is about search engine for Teleapointment, the issue described relates to USSFA-3051 that requires callback to appear whenever callback datetime has passed (without any exceptions)

IDM clarifications - email,USSFA-6127,165820,,Story,US Blocked,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,,tkiritsi,mgiannat,amitkou,06/Jul/21 12:05 PM,07/Sep/21 9:02 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,Release 4,,,0,GRProd,NewDemand,PostR3,,,,,,"# In our current IDM implementation , upon user creation , Salesforce does not send the welcome email with the respective link - so the newly created user is basically blind on how to go to Salesforce.  How can we achieve this , is there such a field/option in the HAL API?[~ipasialis] [~mgiannat] [~adounias] [~anastasios.georgoulias]",,amitkou,ampoura,Bartosz.Lamparski,damkowalski,Gabor.Fal,george.menikidis,ipasialis,kwojtczak,mgiannat,milipinski,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,HSD-1677,USSFA-6129,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"27/Jul/21 12:19 AM;damkowalski;image-2021-07-26-23-19-58-865.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/137244/image-2021-07-26-23-19-58-865.png","27/Jul/21 1:00 PM;damkowalski;image-2021-07-27-12-00-58-573.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/137372/image-2021-07-27-12-00-58-573.png","02/Sep/21 4:58 PM;damkowalski;image-2021-09-02-15-58-38-438.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/144378/image-2021-09-02-15-58-38-438.png",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,06/Oct/20 11:59 PM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2
# Add new field to the User entity 'coredt__sendWelcomeEmail__c'
# Add new field to the User entity 'coredt__resetPassword__c'
a) handle function for sending Welcome Email to the user
b) work on the before insert, before update
c) set User.coredt__SendWelcomeEmail__c field to false when User is marked as a record which should receive a 'Welcome Email'
d) handle function for resetting password of the User
e) set User.coredt__resetPassword__c field to false when User is marked as a record which should has reset password
# Implement apex test class to cover DMN_User
# new Trigger Handler on the User entity called 'TRH_User'.
coredt__SendWelcomeEmail__c is equal to true AND coredt__SendWelcomeEmail__c is changed
coredt__resetPassword__c  _is equal to true AND coredt___resetPassword___c_  is changed
b) be switched off by default
# Implement apex text class to cover Trigger Handler for User
# Profile of System Admin, User Integration Profile should be adjusted to has access to newly created field User.coredt__SendWelcomeEmail__c and User._coredt___resetPassword___c_

# TDTM Configuration to activate 'TRH_User'",,,,,06/Oct/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,amitkou,ampoura,Bartosz.Lamparski,damkowalski,Gabor.Fal,george.menikidis,ipasialis,kwojtczak,mgiannat,milipinski,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,"06/Jul/21 3:31 PM;kwojtczak;Hello, the functionality that you are mentioning above (trigerring a Welcome to Salesforce email to a user)  might require a custom API. This is not possible to achieve it with rest API.
I was thinking if the option here might be an email triggered by additional automation whenever a new user is received by Salesforce.
[~damkowalski] what is your point of view?

CC: [~damkowalski]","07/Jul/21 2:17 PM;damkowalski;I see that demand is about adding two possibilities when We are making users in SF. First of all You want to send welcome email when user is created and second of all You want to have possibility to reset password via IDM. From my point of view We are limited to the custom implementation because SF does not support those operations in the REST API. Below I am describing both ways how I see solving this challenge. I suggest to make *Implementation Custom Fields* way, it keeps complexity in SF, there is one API call Mule->SF.
Can You please check this out and tell what is Your opinion on it ?
SF can make an custom API which Mulesoft can trigger when needed. It would be like:

in this case it will require a bit of the extension of the user creation in the Mulesoft implementation, and at the end cost 2 api calls against SF instead of one. Also complexity of the process is moved to the Mulesoft implementation.
1. Mulesoft is sending communicate to create user
2. Mulesoft is sending communicate to sendWelcomeEmail
SF will add 2 additional fields on the User object:

Based on those two fields Mulesoft will execute additional processes which will happen after user creation in Salesforce. Entire Logic and complexity is kept in SF and We have 1 call Mulesoft->Salesforce.","19/Jul/21 11:03 AM;amitkou;[~Gabor.Fal] [~pdlugosz] any news on delivery date?","19/Jul/21 1:24 PM;Gabor.Fal;Hello,
[~damkowalski] I would like to understand the basics here.
First if a user is created thru API welcomeEmail should be sent. Why does this need extra integration?
Reset Password: I believe SSO is being used. In case SSO is being used password reset is Not Applicable in SalesForce as password and login is handled thru SSO system and not directly in SalesForce.
When User is created via REST API there is no email notification to the newly created user.
In the UI it works because You have checked 'Generate new password and notify user immediately' which is not existing for the REST API.
There is an idea to make it:
[User Field API ""generate new password and notify user immediately"" - Ideas - Salesforce Trailblazer Community
but still it hasn't been done and We need to implement something to fulfill requirement.

When only SSO is used then reset password part is not needed at all, but I validated with [~ipasialis] this yesterday, and for GR login password flow in some cases is used.","21/Jul/21 3:17 PM;Gabor.Fal;[~damkowalski] Thanks.
With the change we discussed on the proposed option 2, I support that solution. See below:
SF will add 2 additional fields on the User object:

Based on those two fields -Mulesof-t- *SalesForce* -- will execute additional processes which will happen after user creation in Salesforce. Entire Logic and complexity is kept in SF and We have 1 call Mulesoft>Salesforce.
Might have small impact on HAL to add new characteristic  (or field) for the two fields.","27/Jul/21 12:21 AM;damkowalski;[~ipasialis],
We discovered how to make this story happen. Now I am wondering now about requirement for 'welcome email'. Does it mean that You want to send standard message for user like:
or You want to implement some email message to the end users just with the link to Salesforce organization ?","27/Jul/21 10:42 AM;ampoura;Hello [~damkowalski] ,
We want to send the standard message.
I did a mistake, Out of the box email would see like:
I can send it for both cases, for welcome email and reset password. Sorry for the confusion, but it seems that i can't invoke this 'Welcome Email' from previous comment.

We can also investigate to make this a bit better looking but it will be for sure more complicated in the implementation, can you please let me know which option is ok for You ?","27/Jul/21 4:29 PM;ampoura;Hello [~damkowalski]  ,
I think the ""Reset Email"" for both cases will work just fine . Although [~tkiritsi]  we need your input on this ?
I think the standard message is a bit confusing for the new user , i would prefer something simpler like :
_In order to set/reset your Salesforce password , please follow the link below_
_If you didn’t ask to set/reset your password please contact your Salesforce administrator******_
I cannot imagin that this can be too complicated , right ? ","19/Aug/21 11:12 AM;Gabor.Fal;[~tkiritsi] [~mgiannat] HAL delivery was done.  please review and accept if ok.
Is this solution (the 2 new fields , trigger , etc )gonna be a harmonized one ?

cc [~tkiritsi], [~ampoura] , [~mgiannat]","20/Aug/21 11:02 AM;Gabor.Fal;[~ipasialis] The fields themselves are characteristics on the integration and as far as I understand there was no other request for this functionality but Greece so in my opinion so far this is GR specific. [~oana.ene] Let me know if you heard different. ","27/Aug/21 10:10 AM;Bartosz.Lamparski;Hi, [~oana.ene] and [~Gabor.Fal] - how easily would this user story be adaptable for PL?
Many users will still be onbaording here and that seems mas not only nice but usefull feature.

cc: [~Sebastian.Trzeciak]","27/Aug/21 1:00 PM;Gabor.Fal;[~Bartosz.Lamparski] I believe it depends on what you want. If exactly the same (e.g.: two new boolean attributes to indicate whether to reset password / send onboarding email) then proably impact is small. If something else then it will have to be analyzed. ","02/Sep/21 4:59 PM;damkowalski;[~tkiritsi], [~ampoura],

I was checking if I am able to update anyhow email template which We are sending during resetting password. Unfortunately Salesforce is not allowing me to make it. If We are going to make it the only possibility is to send email with content like:
