column1: Do you send both permissions sets or expect 'additive' logic?
Please provied also scrambled requests sent to Mulesoft for permission reassignment.","29/Jun/21 12:20 PM;anastasios.georgoulias;Below requests are from production env.

column2: mailto:ebagia@central-domain.root.ote.gr] is assigned to permission set 0PS5I000000MdTxWAK successfully.
mailto:ebagia@central-domain.root.ote.gr] is assigned to permission set 0PS5I000000h8zqWAA successfully, but 0PS5I000000MdTxWAK  is automatically removed. The revocation is not triggered by IDM side.

column1: We do not send both permissions sets in the same request because this is not feasible, but in separate requests.
Below you can find the two xml requests ,
{code}","29/Jun/21 6:17 PM;mjodlowski;Mariusz, please veriy if we are doing patch or post operation

[~damkowalski] - can you give your to cents from SF PoV, Permission set assignment is additive?","30/Jun/21 10:40 AM;mkropisz;According to these confluence pages, we are doing a post operation to create/update a permission object:
[SalesForce #04.06 Maintain Roles, Profiles Permissions Sets Sequence Diagram - HAL - Confluence (telekom.net)
and a put and a post to modify a permission set:
[SalesForce #04.06 User provisioning Sequence Diagram - HAL - Confluence (telekom.net)

","06/Jul/21 11:02 AM;mkropisz;According to the design page, the used method is PUT, which changes the values of the object and does not create a new one. The fact, that ""Permission A"" is not left after the operation is not a bug","07/Jul/21 3:42 PM;ipasialis;[~mkropisz] , [~mjodlowski]
this means that there is a limitation that a user can have only one permission set ?
This is not a Salesforce limitation if I am not mistaken.

The design says we are supposed to use the PUT operation, which will change the values in SF. If we want to keep the values of all permission sets, you can try changing the requests on your side to include all necessary permission sets, i.e. make the request with both permission set A and permission set B

Account anonymization - Tele-appointment,USSFA-6066,162286,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Done/Fixed,ELeodi,damkowalski,damkowalski,21/Jun/21 9:07 AM,04/Oct/21 9:05 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,04/Oct/21 9:05 AM,,,,0,GRProd,incident,,,,,,,"On the Tele-appointment app after generation of the call list Accounts which are 'anonimized' are take into the list. It is blocking me tele-appointment.
You are right , the anonymized accounts must be excluded from the TS console , so that the agent does not get stuck there .","08/Sep/21 12:20 PM;mreznyk;Hi [~tkiritsi]

From what I see there is a working automation for Accounts with Status ""anonymized"" which sets IsDelisted__c to TRUE.  And Accounts with ""IsDelisted__c = true"" are not included in the results of search.
Could you please check if this issue still persists? If it does, could you please invoke this SOQL and tell me if there any records returned?
_SELECT coredt\_\_Status\_\_c, IsDelisted\_\_c FROM Account WHERE coredt\_\_Status\_\_c = 'anonymized' AND IsDelisted\_\_c = false_
Are you sure that the anonymized are excluded? ","08/Sep/21 1:36 PM;mreznyk;Hi [~ipasialis]
Yes, it should be. Accounts with _IsDelisted__c = true, are excluded. And there is automation to set this field if account is anonymized.
Could you also try this query:

SELECT coredt\_\_Status\_\_c, IsDelisted\_\_c, RecordType.Name FROM Account WHERE RecordType.Name = 'Anonimized' AND IsDelisted\_\_c = false","08/Sep/21 2:02 PM;ipasialis;I also checked this query. No results.
So there are no anonymized accounts which are not delisted.
But the problem is still there? You still get this error?","08/Sep/21 2:13 PM;ipasialis;We do not have an error right now which seems to be related to the anonymized accounts.
Damian opened this bug, I don't know if he observed something that we miss in our analysis.","08/Sep/21 2:52 PM;mreznyk;[~ipasialis]
I've just discussed it with Damian. I know what is the problem. The issue is not consistent (for example now you don't have it) but can appear sometimes.
Will start working on the fix for that.","08/Sep/21 3:00 PM;ipasialis;Ok , can you please describe the problem and what fix do you intent to apply ?","08/Sep/21 6:02 PM;mreznyk;Hi [~ipasialis]

So the ""Search"" works as expected and doesn't include anonymized Accounts. The Call List is generated and the user starts working on it. But then during the work, someone could anonymize some accounts from this list. So now you have account in the Call List which was included there, since back then it was not anonymized, but now it is. So when the user reaches this account, he is not allowed to do anything with it anymore.
The proposed solution would be to update the TS component, so whenever a new Call List Item is loaded, it would check it beforehand and if it is anonymized now - skip it and go to the next Account.

cc: [~damkowalski] [~milipinski]","09/Sep/21 9:25 AM;ipasialis;Thanks a lot Mykhailo for this explanation.","09/Sep/21 11:24 AM;ipasialis;Is there going to be any delay on this , for the agent? What is your estimation?","09/Sep/21 12:11 PM;mreznyk;[~ipasialis]
Do you mean delay before loading next call item? ","09/Sep/21 12:19 PM;ipasialis;Yes. Do you think that there will an issue on their daily work?
I am asking because anonymization process is once every 1 ( or 2) weeks.  So we need to evaluate if it is the right move , especially if there are going to be delays.

Of course if you are so unlucky to have, for example, 10 anonymized accounts in a row then the waiting time would sum up and it can take a few seconds, but in general, checking Status field value and then loading the next item should be the matter of milliseconds.","10/Sep/21 10:39 AM;mreznyk;Hi [~ipasialis]
As I was working on it, a new question popped up. What to do with the Call Backs?
From what I see in the code of TS app component, when user works with a Call List, there are also today's Call Backs loaded and added to the List as Call Items. So, there are few questions then:
# Is it possible at all, that account which still has some pending Call Backs will be anonymized?

# If it is, should we just ignore (skip) those callback accounts just like any other account from the list which got anonymized ? Since we won't able to do anything with that account, just like others, because it is anonymized now.
what you describe here is possible to happen , but it is not a highly probable scenario.
So,  the right approach would be to ignore-skip these callbacks.
Do you think that you can provide a solution on this, in terms of this issue?","14/Sep/21 12:42 PM;mreznyk;Hi [~ipasialis]

Yes, the fix takes care of callbacks as well.","14/Sep/21 5:27 PM;mcylwik;All fixed with tele-appointments. No more issues with anonymized accounts. ","16/Sep/21 9:04 AM;ELeodi;please anonymize the following accounts
ΑΝΥΨΩΤΙΚΗ ΜΕΤΑΦΟΡΕΣ ΑΕ vat 999307526 external id SF-00583727

when i go to console changes appear when i select the specific contact and oral consent status is stuck to oral - consent
but when i go to contact object on the same contact no changes are shown in contact details and consent status
plus i logged a call ""call again"" and it is not shown on account related tab

I tried to verify it, but in my case data is in sync. Synchronization of the data between tabs and applications is out of our control. There might be a solution to make a hard refresh after some actions on the tele-appointment, but It is not recommended. It will have huge impact on the performance of the app and make tele-appointment much slower.

if a meeting is still needed please let me know your available slots for today","18/Jun/21 10:23 AM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat] ,[~ELeodi], [~damkowalski]: I would propose a meeting, because with current knowledge We do not know where the problem exists.
To move on, few things can be done:
* provide us exact time, when the change was performed in salesforce
* provide us with the event from topic, to which We are publishing (customerSynchRequestTopicSF)
* provide us with the ""response"" event input topic (customerSynchRequestTopicNatCo)
Above will let us check time differences between publish and retrieval operations.
If for some reason it is not feasible to perform, I suggest a live session to replicate the issue and perform the analysis on the fly.
After an hour someone modified same record in sf, which triggered an event:
This event was synchronised and we received a callback around 4 seconds later:
You may find below the associated logs from HAL Api :
Conact Event received from mulesoft at Jun 17, 2021 @ 15:01:55.7
Contact Event received from mulesoft at Jun 17, 2021 @ 16:06:09.288
Callback from Bus to mulesoft at Jun 17, 2021 @ 16:06:13.879 (success)

Based on our logs we can see that both callbacks were send at an average of 4 seconds from the received request.","23/Jun/21 5:13 PM;edimaki;Please arrange a call to try to reproduce. from the tmstamps on loca side we also do not see the issue...","24/Jun/21 9:45 AM;mczarnecki;[~edimaki]: The problem is not related to timestamps, but in fact to event types.
Legacy responded fast, but first callback is not a valid event ""confirmation"" - it is an error notification, while We were expecting contact event.
I would suggest to focus on what went wrong, so that legacy sent empty error-notification instead of contact event.

column2: mailto:hkaragioka@cognity.gr] feedback the error response that was received is an expected behaviour from the business perspective.

column1: @Alexandra: please arrange call in order to align with the business + CRM .
*Subject:* RE: [External] : RE: SFA USSFA-6053 Critical::Performance issue
The first update customer request was trying to create a new SFA Sales contact and we received a failed callback with description ‘There are already Salesforce active contacts(SBL-BPR-00131)’.
It is already stated by UCM that there can be only *one active contact per contact type*.
The second update customer request was trying to create a new Information Security Officer contact and we received a successful callback.","24/Jun/21 3:17 PM;mczarnecki;Hi,
as discussed, We have identified an contact update event sent to Kafka at (UTC):
Could You please check whether it was processed by legacy (and if possible what was the contents of the event)","24/Jun/21 3:35 PM;christos.daskalakis;Hello [~mczarnecki] ,

column2: https://dtsf.partner.yo-digital.com/job/SF-GR-PROD-installFromTag/38/]","24/Jun/21 4:29 PM;mczarnecki;I have analysed the logs and I have following observations:

column1: * Mulesoft app was deployed on 17th 10:00 CEST

* There are multiple events (contacts) triggered from salesforce - but We are not able to see what are masterIds of such, due to a bug USSFA-6040 (it is a part of release candidate 1.3.1, which is currently on GR UAT under load testing)

* GR side is not able to access kafka to see what events were published, but is able to see logs on kibana from the service consuming those events - in the mentioned logs there is no event related to contact status change, meaning that event possibly was not produced by sf or not consumed by mule or not consumed by the GR service
* I suggest to deploy PROD version with USSFA-6040 hotfix in order to properly track what is sent from SF and monitor the app waiting for the issue to reoccur
* During online session with GR team We were not able to reproduce lack of synchronisation for contact status change - it worked properly
* We do not know the exact time when the contact was updated (status change) - thus it makes analysis even harder
","24/Jun/21 4:46 PM;mczarnecki;Another important note - such scenario (error) is possible if You are using multiple consumers.
Please note that kafka is able to maintain order of the messages only within single partition - thus if You are using multiple consumers, You may consume messages out of order.

We can implement message keying for such user story, if needed (so to enforce messages related to same master id to end up in same partition)","25/Jun/21 12:12 PM;milipinski;Deployment of SF has been done at 2:40:06 - utc that day.
It does not contain anything that would impact/fix the issue","30/Jun/21 9:44 AM;ipasialis;Hello ,
after Mondays session on this , we found out that changing the contact role , does not trigger synchronization. Have you fixed this part , are we going to receive a Salesforce package on this ?

[~pdlugosz] said that it will be moved to UAT today or tomorrow ","01/Jul/21 2:06 PM;dmyriounis;Same comment as USSFA-6050
We noticed that for Migrated Accounts sync process is not working at all.

For example for account 1Ο ΔΗΜΟΤΙΚΟ ΣΧΟΛΕΙΟ ΣΧΗΜΑΤΑΡΙΟΥ vat 997597671 external id SF-00002243 we changed contact ΚΟΣ ΑΝΑΣΤΑΣΙΟΥ with external id 1-5753-231 from SFA to Finance. There is no process triggered nor event sent to Legacy in order to update the record, dirty flag message does not appear either. We even changed the phone number of the Contact, but last modified by remains the name of the user that made the change.

What we noticed is that for Accounts  created on Salesforce, both Change of Contact Role & Phone are working perfectly. column2: i08uun:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,16/Jun/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,amitkou,damkowalski,ELeodi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"16/Jun/21 1:23 PM;ELeodi;please raise this bug to critical as users can't convert lead when relating it to an existing account/ contact

column1: As validation is saying, You can't modify contact record which is not yet synchronized with the Legacy System. Lead conversion process is like a merge operation Lead->Existing Contact and executes actual update. It is not really a bug but works as design. Contact should be synchronized in couple of seconds/minutes and after that You should be able to convert Lead into it. If contacts remains 'Dirty' for a long period then this is different issue and We need to take care of it case by case. System wise this error on the Lead Conversion Process is not a bug.

We have the following services towards Salesforce:
* Get Count (to get the count for all leads, opportunities & events)
As per the design, the following inputs were *mandatory* per service:
* Get Count --> Tax Ref & Salesforce Id
* Get Opportunities --> Tax Ref & Salesforce Id
* Get Events --> Tax Ref & Salesforce Id
We have identified the following issue and *in case the customer doesn't exist yet in Salesforce*:
# The user creates a lead successfully from myCOSMOView towards Salesforce.
# He is navigated to the customer’s dashboard and “Get Count” is invoked (input: Tax Ref & Salesforce Id).
# Since the customer is not created in Salesforce yet, the salesforce id doesn’t exist and the call doesn’t continue to Salesforce. In result, we display count: 0 for all entities (1st screenshot).

# Then, then user presses on the Leads entity (with count 0) and “Get Leads” service is invoked (input: only Tax Ref). The created lead is successfully returned from Salesforce and it is displayed in the list (2nd screenshot).
The expected behavior is to retrieve the count of Leads, even though the Salesforce Id doesn't exist yet (meaning that the customer is not created in Salesforce yet).
Please check from your side and let us know what is required in order to retrieve the count of leads only with the Tax Ref.
Our proposed solution is the following:
# In case the Salesforce Id is not found, Integration should continue to Salesforce only with the Tax Ref.
# If “Get Count” is invoked only with Tax Ref, then Salesforce should return the count of leads, and 0 for the entities: Opportunities and Events.
Please let us know your availability in order to schedule a meeting and discuss the approach.
We are trying to invoke Metrics service, in order to retrieve the count of Leads/Events/Opportunities entities, with +only+ *input* the elements *vatId* & *createdAfterDate.*
By invocation of the service with vatId=051854251 we receive the attached response (Metrics_051854251_Response.json).
We have proceeded with the invocation of the service with vatId=051 as input and the same response is returned  (Metrics_051_Response.json).
Can you please check it, and kindly also inform us if the param CustomerAccountId ,which contains the salesforce Id, is mandatory input for the metrics service?
","30/Jun/21 9:37 AM;mjodlowski;AFAIR parameters are mandatory. use invalid AccountId to search just by VAT.","07/Jul/21 9:15 AM;grigorios.stamellos;Hello Fani, :)
We have proceeded with the respective change and the service is ready for testing in the UAT domain.
In case of any concern kindly let me know.
We verify that the fix for the specific issue is OK.
Could this be verified also by business users in UAT?

[~ipasialis], [~ampoura] Can this be due to some kind of anonymization?","16/Jun/21 1:05 PM;vchristopoulos;The last Publish Ids are:

According to logs from BUS, for the 1st publish request we received a blank value in the PostalCode field, for the 2nd publish we received two --, for the 3rd four ---- and for the 4th five -----, resulting in the corresponding values being sent to Salesforce.
However, in the updateCustomer requests we received from Salesforce, we notice that there were no dashes in this field.
After further investigation we notice that the corresponding updateCustomer requests we received from Siebel Mobile add dashes to the PostalCode field of the SFA Sales Address.
Can you please check it?","17/Jun/21 9:58 AM;tmichalislis;Please check if Siebel Mobile adds dashes in zipcode if it is empty","17/Jun/21 3:02 PM;vchristopoulos;Hello,

A publish left from UCM to Mobile on 7/6/2021 04:52:21 PM with Publish Id *1CF44C2F-C78D-11eb-8D7A-000C29797C08.* The postal code was empty in this publish. When the publish reached in Siebel Mobile on 7/6/2021 04:52:47 PM, the postal code had dash.
If we receive an empty postal code field from UCM, we are adding a dash to this field in the request we are sending to Siebel Mobile.","22/Jun/21 3:50 PM;vchristopoulos;Hello,
This issue is due to incorrect data. This problem has been fixed.
Please check again.","23/Jun/21 8:18 AM;ELeodi;address on specific account is ok now. this bug will close and if someone reports something similar i will open a new one

notes copied to library,USSFA-6016,160387,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Done,ELeodi,ELeodi,ELeodi,11/Jun/21 3:22 PM,14/Jun/21 8:13 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,14/Jun/21 8:13 AM,,,,0,GRProd,incident,,,,,,,"in production as user Athina Syrou (xasirou@ote.gr) , when i add a note in an opportunity or an event, notes are copied in library.
and when she tries to delete them from library she gets a message that they will be deleted from everywhere.
so she does not delete them as they should not be deleted from opportunity, event etc

Library which You are showing is 'Owned By Me', it is native SF functionality that all notes which You are making in Salesforce are added to this one, on the other hand they are still shared within the object under which You've done some note. This is not a copy of the note, it is just another view on which You can see all notes created by particular User. It's not really a bug.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

column2: i08nuf:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,11/Jun/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,amitkou,ampoura,dmyriounis,ethanopoulou,hkaragioka,ipasialis,milipinski,tmichalislis,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"11/Jun/21 10:50 AM;ethanopoulou;Can you please give us some feedback on what this error message means?

column1: Message is returned by validation rule that checks the format of the phone on the account.
That means that some of the data is considered as dirty in production. We had a similar discussion under USSFA-5877.
I suggested to create a technical user for the job in order to disable those validations only for this particular user.
Link to the original comment ([USSFA-5877] Anonymization - HasNoOpenLeadApp updated as true but on UCM we reached false (N) - DT One app Jira (telekom.net))
Link to the Joanna suggestion how to disable validations ([USSFA-5877] Anonymization - HasNoOpenLeadApp updated as true but on UCM we reached false (N) - DT One app Jira (telekom.net))

","11/Jun/21 3:28 PM;ipasialis;[~milipinski] , can we use the already in place Integration user , as [~jkomorowska] has as an example here , [17. Bypass mechanism - Sales Force Lead and Opportunity Management - Confluence (telekom.net)
We cannot reuse integration User because:
1. It will be hard to detect those changes in future (as all record will be marked by Integration User for integration purpose and for business process (marking the records for anonimization))
2. It is true that integration user omits some validations, but we've got different validations in place for that user (for instance MasterVersionId validation) and this will cause the error
3. We limit EDA platform event publication when the change is made by integration user","14/Jun/21 5:43 PM;ampoura;[~ipasialis] [~milipinski] [~ethanopoulou] [~damkowalski]

I enable the bypass rule ""IsValidPhoneFormatBypass"" for my user ""Mpoura,Natassa"" . I am the user who scheduled the apex job for Anonymization , so i expect no failures tomorrow . I will keep you updated for any changes
Please be aware of the consequences of the decision:
You cannot change bypasses for your user - it will cause the fail of the job
You cannot deactivate your user - you cannot leave the company :D - it will stop the job
You will always be the user who ""last modified"" the record in case of the records proposed to anonimization
It will make sense to run ALL future batch jobs using your user
Can you kindly elaborate why we cannot simply create Technical User for those kind of jobs?","15/Jun/21 9:45 AM;ipasialis;Hi Michal ,

personNumber is returned null in getLeadsHistory Output,USSFA-5997,159923,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Done/Fixed,theofani.ntamsa,theofani.ntamsa,theofani.ntamsa,09/Jun/21 7:56 PM,16/Jun/21 12:18 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,16/Jun/21 12:18 PM,,,,0,GRProd,myCOSMOView,,,,,,,Please find attached the respective communication,,grigorios.stamellos,mchojnacki,theofani.ntamsa,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"09/Jun/21 7:58 PM;theofani.ntamsa;MCV - Field personNumber was sent as null in the getLeadsHistoryInfo response.msg;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/128178/MCV+-+Field+personNumber+was+sent+as+null+in+the+getLeadsHistoryInfo+response.msg",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,09/Jun/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2

Please correct me if I am mistaken, but if I remember correctly specification for getLeads (/id) service is located here: [https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/REST_GetLeads_v1.0.0] and it seems that unfortunately personNumber does not exist. Can You please point it out as maybe mentioned field is under other name? Then we will check why this is not populated.

Otherwise, if this field does not appear in specification, I am afraid that it will not be taken into account in the request. Everything was developed in line with that spec. The only known, missing field is Description that was added yesterday (USSFA-5964), but it will be updated accordingly.","10/Jun/21 11:00 AM;theofani.ntamsa;GR team provided feedback regarding the missing field.

Regarding the below, the element “personNumber” is mapped from element “number(16.1.2.1.2.1)” which exists in the following Interface Agreement [https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/REST_GetLeads_v1.0.0
this is exactly what I wanted to receive! Thank You! :-)
As I see, for Lead there are two fields connected to phone number:
# Mobile Phone – _in line with specification, mapping is set for this field_

Can You please tell me from which field You expect to retrieve data? I am asking, because there might be a mismatch as the rest of things seem to be fine.","10/Jun/21 11:19 PM;grigorios.stamellos;Hello [~mchojnacki],
Regarding the above, during the Lead Creation operation, the value of Phone number is propagated towards Mulesoft, so as to store it in the respective Salesforce field.
The stored value should be returned in the response of /leads/\{id} (GET) operation.
In the following link, you will find the respective issue as well:
Can you please check it from your side?
great! So specification for GetLead ([https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/REST_GetLeads_v1.0.0]) must be updated and accordingly mapping also. This will be done today.
please retest this issue on PROD environment and let me know what is the result.

Thank you.","17/Jun/21 9:32 AM;ELeodi;for account COCO - MAT SERIFOS Μ. Ι. Κ. Ε. vat 800463451 external id SF-A2F6A4F5-981B-11e4-840A-000000000000 has active assets and it is shown in salesforce on desktop.
on app 360 asset option now exists but it does not load account assets.
From 360Assets side, we can see that the page is correctly rendered on small screens (see attachement).
Could you please check from Salesforce side why the 360iFrame seems not to load at all?

I've conducted a few tests in SITUAT. From what I see, 360 Assets (which render content from https://paguat.ote.gr:5577/assetView/<vatId> ) doesn't get any response from the server or it takes to long for the response to arrive. For all Accounts. It is the case for both desktop and mobile. If you wait 10 seconds (default HTTP timeout in SF) on mobile, just as on desktop, you will see ""took too long to respond"" or ""address unreachable "".
So please check what is the response time since this is the reason of the issue.

Giving that, I would propose to close this bug as fixed, since the original issue (tabs absence) is resolved and in case of need of further investigation of timeout of 360 Assets we can create a new bug.
Is there a chance this is related to missing network access?
Are mobile phones used able to access our SPA? [https://paguat.ote.gr:5577/assetView/]<vatId>
Could you please help us investigate this?
Could you please try accessing the following through your *mobile browser* (i.e. Chrome) endpoint and share a screenshot?
i can't access this page through chrome in my mobile
i don't have forticlient but  i downloaded salesforce through mdm and 360 view is ok on app
We are not sure how corporate mobile phones have access to Cosmote's internal network.
The SPA (pag.ote.gr, port: 577) is only accessible through VPN. Are user's mobile phones connected to the VPN somehow?

Μπορείς να κάνεις hard refresh τη σελίδα δοκιμάζοντας τους παρακάτω συνδυασμού και έπειτα να δοκμιάσεις ξανά;

άνοιξα και Incognito αλλά εκεί για κάποιο λόγο δεν δέχεται τα credentials του outlook","08/Jun/21 12:10 PM;irene.kampouraki;Ευχαριστούμε, [~ELeodi]

Καταφέραμε και το κάναμε reproduce, οπότε θα επανέλθουμε! ;)","08/Jun/21 1:01 PM;charalampos.thomas;[~ELeodi] H συμπεριφορά που περιγράφεις είναι προβλεπόμενη και συμβαίνει διότι η κατηγορία ICT, στην συγκεκριμμένη περίπτωση (λόγω πολύ μικρού αριθμού), θα έπιανε λιγότερο από 1/2 μοίρα σε μέγεθος και συνεπώς δεν θα μπορούσες να την πατήσεις στο γράφημα.
Σε περιπτώσεις όπου το το νούμερο μίας κατηγορίας ""χωράει"" να εμφανιστεί στο γράφημα δεν εντοπίσαμε κάποιο πρόβλημα.

Εμείς από την πλευρά μας, όπως δοκιμάσαμε και στο dev περιβάλλον, μπορούμε να τροποποιήσουμε το threshold ώστε να έχει ακόμα μικρότερο νούμερο αλλά και πάλι ο χρήστης δεν θα είναι σε θέση να επιλέξει την συγκεκριμμένη κατηγορία ή να κάνει hover ώστε να δει τα ακριβή νούμερα (τα οποία φαίνονται και αναλυτικά ακριβώς από κάτω στην ενότητα product list).
Άρα πιστεύω ότι είναι χρήσιμη λειτουργικότητα, αλλά μπορούμε να χαμηλώσουμε αρκετά το threshold ώστε να είναι πολύ δύσκολο να ενεργοποιηθεί, εφόσον μπορεί να δημιουργήσει σύγχυση.
Να προχωρήσουμε τροποποιώντας το threshold ή as-is?
δεν χρειάζεται να κάνουμε κάτι τέτοιο. αν το θέσουν ως blocking προβλημα οι πωλήσεις θα επανέλθουμε","09/Jun/21 10:53 AM;irene.kampouraki;Καλημέρα σας!
Σας χρωστάω από χτες το threshold *: 0.0014 (0.14%)*

Visibility issue on Events per agent & AM report ,USSFA-5974,159329,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Done/Fixed,tkiritsi,tkiritsi,tkiritsi,07/Jun/21 7:50 PM,16/Jun/21 5:54 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,16/Jun/21 5:54 PM,,,,0,PROD,,,,,,,,"On production i dont see the expected events on this report .

The purpose of this report is for every TS supervisor to see the events  that the agents of his/her team has created for each account manager . the format of the report is ok , but the visibility is wrong.

I realised that that the Show me : my teams activities filter doesn't refer to the creator of the event but to the owner of the event , which is wrong . So currently if i log in as a TS supervisor i only see the events that are assigned to me team members  by ""mistake"" , because they forgot to assigne them to the appropriate account manager and they left them on themselves. So if no such mistake is made by the agent ,this report will retrieve zero !

The same goes for the report Opps per agent & AM , again the filter Show me , refers to the owner and not the creator .",GR production,pdlugosz,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-4770,USSFA-4774,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"15/Jun/21 12:07 PM;pdlugosz;EventPerAgentFixed.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/128996/EventPerAgentFixed.png","14/Jun/21 4:56 PM;pdlugosz;OppPerAgent.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/128885/OppPerAgent.png","15/Jun/21 12:06 PM;pdlugosz;OppPerAgentFixed.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/128995/OppPerAgentFixed.png",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,07/Jun/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,v0.20.1-1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2

* Event is connected to the Opportunity
* User cannot edit this Opportunity as they are not the owner of the Opportunity
* In order to edit event user need to have edit rights to parent record (Opportunity in that case) - rootcause of the issue

contact with id "1-59DM-1355" - errorCode\": \"DUPLICATE_VALUE,USSFA-5963,159012,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Won't Do/Dropped,mgiannat,mgiannat,mgiannat,04/Jun/21 4:49 PM,11/Jun/21 9:43 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,11/Jun/21 9:43 AM,,,,0,GRProd,incident,,,,,,,"!image-2021-06-04-16-45-54-200.png
Another case here where we updated the contact with id ""1-59DM-1355"" the event failed with the following error. The record remains LOCKED, below an extract from Mulesoft logs:
Also the initial event sent to KAFKA TOPIC by NatCo:

Looking at the attached communicate I see different Association Id than generated by Salesforce. SF would not generate '1-59DM-1355', in the same communicate there is also MasterId '1-59DM-1355'. For me it looks like Mulesoft is trying to upsert new record based on the key AssociationId with the MasterId which already exist in Salesforce under the record with Id '0035I00000HZEex'.
Can We check what is after_transform message to SF ?","07/Jun/21 11:50 PM;mczarnecki;[~damkowalski]:
for PROD environment DEBUG logging level is disabled, thus business data (like payload after transform) is not visible to us.
Following event failed with DUPLICATE_VALUE error:
As a result it went to retry (5 times) and locked master Id.
Meanwhile, another event was received (note empty association id):
It was not processed, because earlier one (same masterId, earlier timestamp) was still in retry.
After a while (when initial event exhausted retries and unlocked masterId), it was processed successfully:
","08/Jun/21 12:09 AM;mgiannat;Hello could you please clarify the DUPLICATE_VALUE error? Why this occured?
Now the dirty flag should be cleared from the SF?
If this duplicate of https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-5960? If yes please close this and let's test the change requested by Marek in 5960

in this scenario DUPLICATE_VALUE error was thrown because Mulesoft app received an event from legacy, which contained masterId and associationId. In such situation associationId is taken as identifier to insert new record.
In this example such operation failed, as [~damkowalski] described:
Mulesoft is trying to upsert new record based on the key AssociationId with the MasterId which already exist in Salesforce under the record with Id '0035I00000HZEex'.""
Next event sent from legacy is processed normally, since associationId is empty (null) - thus leading to update operation based on masterId (compound id to be more precise).

_As for Accounts, If you send AssociationId along with MasterId, we use it as 'external identifier' to update object. After initial synchronization, AssociationId is empty in SF and subsequent requests try to create new objects._
Since no change was introduced in GR systems, could you please clarify if any change occured in SF packages delivered the last days?
","08/Jun/21 10:29 AM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat] as far as I know this was not changed - this is a part of original solution architecture.
Association id is always used for creating objects - for updates should be empty.","08/Jun/21 10:31 AM;mgiannat;[~damkowalski] could you please help with this question?
Since no change was introduced in GR systems, could you please clarify if any change occured in SF packages delivered the last days?
It is important to know for new changes introduced that break the flows.","08/Jun/21 10:39 AM;damkowalski;[~mgiannat],

Orders of messages and proceeding those are out of SF control. This would work in the same way in the past if We receive AssociationId and MasterId in the same communicate. From Salesforce perspective I don't see any change in the behavior. ","08/Jun/21 10:56 AM;mgiannat;Not sure, could you please confirm that this is duplicate of https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-5960? in order to close?","08/Jun/21 11:35 AM;damkowalski;[~mgiannat],

Fani","01/Jun/21 11:18 PM;mczarnecki;We are not able to find any lead published from legacy in our log window.
I suspect, that this lead was never published or possibly failed.

Another possibility is that since this topic was used for the first time, there could be no offset committed. Mulesoft Kafka Connector by default is using LATEST offset reset option - if the event was published before our consumer made initial commit, it will not be read.
For further investigation please provide us some data from kafka instance that We listen to:
# Current lags on Kafka Topic: lead_creation_producer for consumer group: CG_PROD_SF_SF-APP_COMMON
# Current committed offset for all partitions of lead_creation_producer topic
# Published lead's topic, partition and offset
Could you please assist with the requested information?

Fani","01/Jun/21 11:45 PM;mgiannat;[~grigorios.stamellos] please check the logs in order to confirm that the specific event reached kafka. In the meantime i will contact kafka admins","02/Jun/21 9:27 AM;mgiannat;feedback from DBAs attached
{color:#de350b}[^KAFKA_TOPIC.docx]{color}","02/Jun/21 9:54 AM;mgiannat;Also we see lag in other topics. please check all consumers and confirm that this is not related with the known mulesoft bug

CC:[~mczarnecki] [~Gabor.Fal]","02/Jun/21 10:00 AM;mjodlowski;Michalis, I tried to check any discrepancy, typo but all looks good. No errors.  Can you double check please? We also continue investigation what is happening...
Please note we use *single listener* for all topics => it would be quite odd that listener is subscribed to account and not to lead topic, can you cross check?
!image-2021-06-02-08-57-54-932.png!","02/Jun/21 10:15 AM;mgiannat;Please see our response, there is no connected consumer on this topic.

What is the action expected from GR Natco on this?","02/Jun/21 10:21 AM;mczarnecki;[~mjodlowski] this is under investigation. Subscription attempt means nothing, We are looking now for successfull assignments. ","02/Jun/21 12:54 PM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat]:
* While analysing kafka protocol communication, metadata response was missing information about the task and lead topics, thus leading to no assignment
* Issue from previous point was resolved by kafka admin, who identified a problem with missing permission for mulesoftadm user

* Based on agreement (verbal) with [~mgiannat], application was started in default connector mode (LATEST) - thus no historic lead events will be synchronised, since there is no committed offset on this topic

* Issue with lag was checked by kafka admin, based on his response there is no lag on customer sync topic - this could be a potential problem in GR monitoring tool","02/Jun/21 12:59 PM;mgiannat;Great thanks, issue resolved, thank you for the assistance [~mczarnecki]

column3: https://ote.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/0055I000002r9tAQAQ/view], on 19/5/2021, 10:57 PM","09/Jun/21 11:06 AM;dmyriounis;Tested on UAT with [~vchristopoulos] and process works fine, even the validation pops up when trying to make two same contact types Active. Looping [~eanagnostou]

column1: On the Other hand, on PROD UI the Validation doesn't work and let's you make both Contacts Active. [~ELeodi]  please assign this ticket to DT for further investigation.

As We agreed I am explaining how it works. By design We are not validating duplicates of records which are mastered in Legacy System and They are coming from integration. In addition System Administrators are also allowed to make duplicates so if You have System Administrator it is not good idea to retest it.
In the shortcut duplicate rule works like this:
1. When record is created by *different* user than System Administrator or Integration User
3. We try to find a contact with a Role
4. If there is more than 1 contact with the same Role We throw an error

5. If there is 0 contacts with a Role We allow to save the record","09/Jun/21 1:54 PM;dmyriounis;[~eanagnostou] [~vchristopoulos] can you please investigate any further? Damian stated that all Legacy Data are accepted on Salesforce, so if UCM sends a duplicate Contact Type Role, Salesforce will accept it.","10/Jun/21 4:49 PM;eanagnostou;A fix is needed at Siebel UCM.  The fix will be UAT ready at 15/06.","16/Jun/21 2:18 PM;ELeodi;[~eanagnostou]

If the first callback does not reach SF, masterId is not yet set and subsequent PATCH operation using MasterId results in Creation of record instead on update in Salesforce",USSFA-5913,157322,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Won't Do/Dropped,mgiannat,mgiannat,mgiannat,29/May/21 11:07 AM,15/Jun/21 12:03 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,15/Jun/21 12:03 PM,,,,0,GR,PostR3_UAT,R3,UAT,,,,,"""If the first callback does not reach SF, masterId is not yet set and subsequent PATCH operation using MasterId results in Creation of record instead on update.""
SF should prohibit dublication of records and if a record with the same association id exists should not create a new one.
We had a case in UAT where the UCM legacy system did not send back a callback due to unavailability.
This resulted in a duplication of account in SF as you may see in this jira ticket.
This is for sure an exceptional case, however even in production we may have an unavailability of UCM and for X reason this callback will never be sent.
The events were the following in this case:
# At Thursday 20 May 2021  an upsert (create) account event with association id SF-GR~0011X00000pcMCJQA2 was received from SF to Legacy.
# An error occured and no callback was send from Legacy to  SF
# An update request from Legacy to SF (Publish) was then sent with the following header:

Wrong format on the "Calls per zip code" report,USSFA-5894,156340,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Done/Fixed,tkiritsi,tkiritsi,tkiritsi,25/May/21 9:29 PM,08/Jun/21 12:23 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,08/Jun/21 12:23 AM,,,,0,PostR3_UAT,,,,,,,,"Please adjust the format of the report according to the following table .
See descriptions of each column to better understand the requirement for each field

column3: Total Count of  accounts that exist on Salesforce on that zip code regardless if they have a response yet or not
column4: unique customers on that zip code that have at least one response
column5: Unique contacted accounts with status existing
column6: Unique contacted accounts with status once existing
column7: Unique contacted accounts with never existing
column8: total responses that were made on the unique contacted accounts

column1: The meaning of the above example table is the following :
1.On zip code 105 64 we have 100 accounts on SF
2.So far we have contacted at least once, 60 unique accounts out of the 100
3.Those 60 accounts are split to : 20 existing + 15 once existed + 25 never existed based on account status.
4. So far we have performed 150 responses related to the 60 unique accounts that were communicated out of the 100 accounts that exist on that zip code in total
5. We still have 40 more accounts that are pending to be called
You're right there's no information about summary of account with or without response.
I suggest to make adjustment like this by changing order of grouping. Would that report cover your needs?
Then information you require is there:
Contacted accounts: Account with responses subtotal: 10
In that case all of the customers are Active
On the format that you are proposing i see that:

a) i get to have the split of the accounts according to status but instead of spliting them to 3 groups (existing, once , never) you split them in 2 groups a. existing & b. once +never  , correct ? If that is so , i am ok with it
b) do the unique accounts refer to the accounts that i have called or to the accounts that exist in SF regardless if i have called them yet or not ? i need to know both

What i need to achieve with this reports , is not only know howe many calls have a made for the unique accounts that i have called so far  , but also know how many accounts are there on the same zip code , that i have never called yet.","01/Jun/21 1:42 PM;jwszolkowski;[~tkiritsi]
a) split to 2 groups is only because there's no record with terminated value, if there will be at least one record with that status it would be visible
b) Record count is summary of all of accounts. Partial information is available on subtotal sections like under Account with responses (20 Account total, 10 are with response)
Information about accounts which are not called yet will be visible on Accounts without response, which is cut on the screen. It's above Accounts with response.
In that terms looks like this report reaches requirements, in that terms I will correct it to the view on the screenshot.","01/Jun/21 8:15 PM;tkiritsi;[~jwszolkowski]
a) lets agree on the terminology
Active account is the one with status = existing
Potential account is the one with status = never existed
Terminated account is the one with status =once existed
If that is so , then we are ok

b) Let me know when i can see it on situat , because the screenshot is not very helpful. I would rather not have a grouping by Accounts with responces & Accounts with no responces. I would rather have the below format if possible
I just need a confirmation regarding the account status.

On situat i see accounts with several values on status : null , active , terminated customers , potential customers , prospect ,terminated . Is that due to wrong values that exist in uat environment ? I guess that is the reason. please confirm

Also on uat i see anonymized  accounts, will they  be distincted on the report , or will they be excluded from the report ?","07/Jun/21 10:48 AM;jwszolkowski;Regarding the first question: it's because of data. Data can be cleared and there's the possibility to cumulate data that doesn't belong to the listed 3 categories to the 'Others' bucket.
Regarding the second question: If the user will have access to it, then it will be available. It can be filtered out. ","07/Jun/21 8:37 PM;tkiritsi;[~jwszolkowski]

Attached the request from mulesoft, which has the following:
So the NoActiveLeadOpptyFlag is correctly mapped to N.
are there any news? we are blocked on SIT Executions. can you please check what is happening with the job execution? it seems that it didn't change the value of hasNoOpenLeadOpp to true as expected.
I believe you used a piece of code that I've shared with you for that anonimization process.
It should be used only for testing purposes, not for the final solution.
Final solution has been described in Manual Steps on Confluence [GR Manual Steps - Sales Force Lead and Opportunity Management - Confluence (telekom.net)
I've checked the job results and it looks like it was run by Myriounis Dionysis, yesterday EOD.

Those jobs always run in context of the user who scheduled them (or forced them to run with piece of code shared by me). This means that the job cannot do any change if the user cannot make a same change using the UI.

Dionysis has HARD Delete profile (I have no idea what profile it is as it is not a part of the solution), because of that he CANNOT edit Accounts that are marked as dirty (for instance new accounts that were created in SF but not in legacy).
The job process accounts in 200 records batches at once, if any of the accounts will fail because of any validation rule it will rollback whole chunk.
For all chunks validation on the Account has fail for at least one Account each. This means that no accounts has been successfully processed by anonimization job.
We can easly solve the issue:

The job should be scheduled (details in Manual steps) and can be triggered manually for testing purpose (if needed and only in UAT) by a User with permissions to omit the validations on the account. This user should have System Admin profile or correct settings assigned.

It is possible to change existing admin user to System Admin or set up special settings for them, but I do not recommend it as it is possible that picked user will leave company and the job won't run anymore as it was scheduled by inactive user.
I would suggest to create one technical user with *System Admin* profile that will be used for those jobs (now and in the future), this will be futureproof solution

","21/May/21 6:13 PM;ethanopoulou;[~ipasialis] , [~ampoura] can you please proceed with the creation of new technical user in SIT/UAT environment with System Admin Profile in order to use it for testing? ","24/May/21 12:07 PM;ampoura;Hello [~milipinski],
We performed the job manually but still the values of  coredt__HasNoOpenLeadOpp__c are false  regardless if the account has lead/opp or not . Please for your assistance.

Industry Occupation Description is missing for 1.6k of the Accounts in UAT (it was introduced in story USSFA-4421).
Can you please run this query in Prod so we can check whenever it is only UAT issue?
Select count(id) from account where IndustryOccupationDescription__c = null","24/May/21 12:44 PM;ampoura;[~milipinski] 1680   is the result in production ","24/May/21 12:54 PM;milipinski;[~ampoura]

column2: i07r4n:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,06/Oct/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,christos.daskalakis,ELeodi,george.menikidis,kwojtczak,mczarnecki,mgiannat,mjodlowski,mreznyk,oana.ene,pdlugosz,pkejna,,,,,,,,,,,,"25/May/21 12:08 PM;mgiannat;Hello [~george.menikidis] as we discussed please share a sample request and response on how this could be filtered on Mulesoft side based on the same HAL API we have in place","26/May/21 3:04 PM;mgiannat;update 26/05: Pending Clarifications from HAL team https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-5907","07/Jun/21 3:11 PM;george.menikidis;Hello [~ELeodi] ,

στην κινητή θα περίμενα να δω μόνο τον κεντρικό κωδικό πελάτη και όχι όλους τους κωδικούς μέχρι και level 40"".

i would expect to see level 10 and level 20 only
cc:[~tkiritsi]","12/Jul/21 3:27 PM;mgiannat;Hello, could you please provide estimation from the above?
# SFA retrieves all levels and then filters only 10 & 20

# Add query parameter in the API to retrieve specific levels","13/Jul/21 9:32 AM;pdlugosz;[~kwojtczak], could You help here ([~mreznyk] can provide some valuable input here). Thanks!","13/Jul/21 10:28 AM;kwojtczak;[~ELeodi] [~mgiannat] [~tkiritsi]

Could you please provide English description of the user story? We see comments which relate to language that we don't understand. ","13/Jul/21 10:35 AM;mgiannat;Hi [~kwojtczak], the change here is that we want to filter the values depicted in 360 view Billing in order only for a subset (level 10 and 40) to be depicted.  For this reason we requested also a HAL change (see here https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-5907).
If needed we can have a short call ","13/Jul/21 3:27 PM;mreznyk;Hi [~mgiannat]
If I understood correctly we are talking about filtering here.

_SFA retrieves all levels and then filters only 10 & 20_ - this approach would take tremendous amount of time, since it requires the development of an entirely new functionality, which is also pointless due to the second much better option.

_Add query parameter in the API to retrieve specific levels_ - this one should do the trick.  According to Interface Agreements all endpoints have the list of URL parameters, which should do exactly what you are requesting - filtering.

The job on SF side would be to add this new parameter to the URL in 360 View config file. But in order to do that, we need you to provide us the expected name of the parameter, its values and its format. For example:
[~mjodlowski] is there any development required on Mule side in case of addition of a new parameter?
cc: [~kwojtczak] [~mgiannat] [~ELeodi] [~mjodlowski]","13/Jul/21 4:05 PM;mgiannat;Thank you, we are fine with approach 2.
could you please share the effort estimation for both SFA and Mulesoft?","13/Jul/21 4:35 PM;kwojtczak;In this case - Salesforce is 4 hours. [~mjodlowski] how about your side?
","14/Jul/21 10:49 AM;mjodlowski;I understand this US is to add some sort of 'query' on Legacy side. There are means to achieve that using HAL API.
Please indicate changes on HAL API side in the User Story Solution Design description.
[~amitkou]- we can only estimate user stories for which Description and DoD is specified along with agreed solution design.
[~oana.ene], [~wnowosad] - FYI","14/Jul/21 11:04 AM;mgiannat;Hi Marek, exactly there will be implementation on our side as per HAL definition. Details above.
The question here is if there is any impact on your side.

If a short call would help please let me know to organize.","14/Jul/21 11:38 AM;mgiannat;[~oana.ene] is there anything pending from GR side on this? Why is this US blocked?","14/Jul/21 11:55 AM;oana.ene;The user story is blocked until we have the final estimation and approval. Blocked means it's not ready to be developed. In case I haven't understood something from the comments, let me know. I don't understand greek to read the description :)","14/Jul/21 12:16 PM;mgiannat;Ok when you are ready and before starting implementation please let me know to organize a call to agree on the technical details of the integration. Thank you","14/Jul/21 2:58 PM;mjodlowski;Please depict all those details in:
We will add SFA design on top.
Please note this change must be done in harmonized way as HAL API is being adjusted and new parameter needs to be exchanged in P-customer360 application which is central for all NatCos.
Formally this change is planned in HAL in release 21-12 which is not live yet. Delivery will be possible only after new swagger is available.
Estimations will contain impact analysis for all changes coming from HAL API update (current version supported is 4.14, new version will be at least 4.19).
Marek","14/Jul/21 3:04 PM;mjodlowski;Content wise: HAL query will be following HAL Enums, as per CM-20 example: {{billingLevel=Large%20Account}}
# Please confirm if HAL was ok for sending list of values (I don't believe so) - I do see such expectation looking at US description.
# Please specific in the US enums for billingLevel field (HAL won't do so)
# Please clarify if you would like to introduce new query param only for filtering only, or possibly extend also 360 view with this additional information
[~pkejna] - please follow up form design perspective

Marek","14/Jul/21 3:33 PM;mgiannat;Hi I will set up a call tommorow with you [~mjodlowski], [~mreznyk] and GR team to discuss any open points. Please FW to anyone else needed","15/Jul/21 11:05 AM;christos.daskalakis;Hello [~mjodlowski] ,
Please find below the url with the query param  (billingLevel) added in the HAL API (https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-5907)
# Swagger is not ready yet (release): Only feature is available: [https://gitlab.dtoneapp.telekom.net/HAL/HAL-core/-/blob/feature/USSFA-5907/public/swagger/customer-management.yaml]
# Following HAL, billing level shall be as below. Please depict meaning for 10, 20 you had mentioned as we need to document it
# AFAIK HAL does not support coma separated list of values in query params - please clarify this with HAL team.
billingLevel: type: ""string"" description: ""Billing Account's BillingLevel (Large Account, Cost Center,\ \ Division, Customer, etc)""{code}","15/Jul/21 11:49 AM;mgiannat;Hi Marek,
# No problem let' s proceed this is not blocking for you to provide estimation and proceed. If this will not be released before our prod deployment we will check.

# 10,20 etc is the level of GR Billing accounts, already discussed with HAL team here https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-5907, If you need any more insights on this you may call me even now to clarify

# We already checked that and it is supported. On the top of that already DLT team proposed that in the comment above _""/billingAccounts?*billingLevel=10,20*&""_  https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-5867?focusedCommentId=382356&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-382356
Please set up a call to speed up with this if needed today.

Cc [~amitkou]","20/Jul/21 12:28 PM;mjodlowski;US is blocked on USSFA-5907. Please follow up with HAL Team, expected solution depicted in this US may not be HAL compliant.","20/Jul/21 12:44 PM;mgiannat;Hi [~mjodlowski] we already discussed this. We do not believe that the solution is non-HAL compliant. If you need to crosscheck with HAL team it is up to you.

From our side we are expecting a solution proposal and estimation from DLT.","28/Jul/21 9:39 AM;oana.ene;[~mczarnecki] - can you pls estimate this story?","09/Aug/21 12:04 PM;mczarnecki;[~oana.ene]: please find updated integration estimation","31/Aug/21 12:09 PM;pdlugosz;[~tkiritsi], estimation for this US was updated by Maciej, please approve it.

first comment is from prod and second one from UAT","19/May/21 11:46 AM;jwszolkowski;Hi [~ELeodi],
Behaviour on Lead Conversion to existing Account is that if there's mapping between Lead and Account field then:
* when Account field is populated, then value from Lead doesn't override it
* when Account field is blank, there's attempt to overwrite it with value from Lead field

Second case is our scenario. You're using Account which has Industry Occupation Description blank, which is data issue. There's validation on that to keep it populated. If Lead Industry Occupation Description will be blank but you would try to convert it into existing Account with populated Industry Occupation, conversion will be successful.

In terms of PROD - it wil be fixed as well and behave just like in SITUAT with next package release","19/May/21 12:16 PM;ELeodi;στην test βάση έκανα το lead LE-000665 ως Μητροπούλου , το σύνδεσα με account DOLITTLE INC vat 813610063 που είχε όλα τα mandatory fields συμπληρωμένα και χωρίς να βάλω κάτι στο lead το έκανα convert σε opportunity O-007053

i can't create a duplicate contact. can you do something about Απόστολος Χελιώτης with contact id CO-1018841 that has not yet synced?
Can you please elaborate on 3 & 5? How can I check if the coredt__ExternalId__c duplicates value ?_
[~mchojnacki] And how can we fix them?(Update) I saw that all records synced, how did this happen??

please be informed, that there was attempt of inserting given record. Insert, because external id of given object does not exist -> there is no such external id in salesforce at the moment of upserting record.

There are some unique fields for Account object. One of them is coredt__ExternalId__c. Considering ""3. CASE"" there was attempt to upload value for coredt__ExternalId__c, whereas this value already exists for other record. In this particular case, this record is id = 0015I00000N2BZ9.
Can You please execute below query on PROD workbench and attach result? I would like to check record that blocked creating new account (the same external id).
if my eyes do not deceive me, value for coredt__ExternalId__c is exactly the same like in case of record that GR were trying to upload. This is the reason of this problem.

How were these accounts (case 3. and 5.) uploaded? I suppose that not manually via GUI by clicking on New Account, correct?","18/May/21 4:33 PM;dmyriounis;[~mchojnacki] there are Migrated Records. They were not created manually. So, it is a mystery how there records synced after some time by themselves.

please be informed, that Account has not been synchronised because of the following error:

Timeout sometimes occurs. It is being checked. We will update You as soon as we get more information.","19/May/21 3:42 PM;ELeodi;[~mchojnacki] you are right. for the same account you can access 360 view 5 times with no problem and on the 6th you will get these errors..
thanks for your help!","19/May/21 5:23 PM;mjodlowski;So this is not High defect.
I would propose to keep this as high priority defect

Given that it is a new application and we all try hard to make a good starting impression to our customers , we need to have a solid and concrete view of the system. It is not good if a feature sometimes is working and sometimes not . It creates uncertainty and ruins both yours and ours effort not only regarding this issue but for the whole system.  It would be much better if we knew what is the defect ( even if it was hard to fix it)  than not knowing what causes it and what other implications exist. We are trying hard for a good start and I am sure you will do your best to support us on this.
Timeout issues. Please verify your side.
Marek","19/May/21 6:29 PM;mchojnacki;Error messages: HTTP GET on resource
I suppose that You will be checking it.

Please be informed, that this problem appears only sometimes, not always. For example, I have performed about ten attempts (_on UAT SF_) and only one time I received error.  Generally it works, but sometimes apparently it does not handle request.","21/May/21 11:49 PM;Despina.Saptelianou1;Hello everyone,
After reviewing the logs, I observed that the timeouts were received in Mulesoft between the interval 05-05-201 - 19-05-2021.

We grabbed the API event data for this period and after checking the response status for each API call, we observed that there are 2 possible values: (1) 200 OK and (2) 422 Unprocessable Entity. Both kind of calls are derived after communication between Datapower of UAT - backend servers.
In case Datapower cannot communicate with the backends or encounters any operation error after communicating with them, the status code that is returned is 500.
I have created a simple API without security on it, that you can also test and check that in that cases status is 500.
*We had zero records in apic analytics data with 500 status code*. That means that the Timeouts are between Mulesoft and Datapower, and not Datapower with the backends.

What I suggest now is that the issue is reproduced, and this time the Datapower team (or me) enable probe in UAT Datapower node, to check if any data is received. Network team can even get involved, to monitor any connection attempts from Mulesoft to UAT Datapower.

","24/May/21 12:02 PM;mjodlowski;Data Power should set timeouts to < 6 sec","24/May/21 12:17 PM;mgiannat;Hi Marek we never agreed to such non-functional requirement. Please share the pertinent agreement.","25/May/21 10:20 AM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat]: As agreed on the call, based on GR requirements We are extending response timeouts to 30 seconds.
As informed on the call, long lasting calls have implications (longer resource allocation, thus less parallel requests served) .
As of now only s-natco was adjusted (hotfix/USSFA-5840).

This change needs to be also applied on top of e-sfdc and p-customer applications.","25/May/21 10:44 AM;mjodlowski;[~mgiannat] this was AGREED timeout set during UAT to fit into 10 sec Salesforce timeouts.
Without changing Salesforce timeouts > 30 sec it's pointless to change Mulesoft configuration.
Bottom line - this is not a defect. There is longish operation on GR side which possibly requires reconfiguration of Salesforce and Mulesoft.

Salesforce timeout is OOTB to prevent hanging threads and it's DIFFICULT to change it.","25/May/21 10:49 AM;mgiannat;Hello Marek the above were never agreed. Please share the pertinent agreement before rejecting.
On the top of that this is contradictory with our agreement at the morning
We are awaiting for the problem resolution the soonest possible","25/May/21 10:57 AM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat]:
As I informed on the call - I was analysing this issue ad hoc without knowledge of any agreements between You guys - especially I was not informed about agreed timeout.
As I informed, the root cause of an error is operation taking longer than timeout on Mulesoft - which is 7 seconds for most operations.

In that case I am reverting s-natco package to old one.","25/May/21 10:57 AM;mczarnecki;[~mjodlowski] please share agreements on the timeouts.","25/May/21 11:04 AM;mgiannat;Hi [~mczarnecki]  I would like to kindly request you to resolve this bug the soonest possible since it causes very bad impression to our business.
During UAT we had longish discussion about timeouts (e.g. USSFA-5583).
Processing logic on mulesoft was adjusted.
# This is NOT HIGH defect. It's not even a defect.
# If you wish to adjust timeouts, created UserStory as this impacts also Salesforce, eg.:
Timeouts were adjusted to fit into Salesforce timeouts taking into account:
* sequential invocation of 2 operations on your side (with custom logic to suppress longish get credit Profiles.
In order to move on I see only one option: please provide GET /customers/\{id} operation returning both credit profiles and billing Accounts to remove enrichment from Mulesoft.
What we are doing here is workaround for longish operation on Legacy side.

","25/May/21 11:19 AM;mgiannat;Hello [~mjodlowski] as stated above please share the pertinent agreement that NatCo GR agreed on those timeouts before rejecting the issue. Currently we identified the bug on DLT's implementation side an we shared the logs with the exceptions. General statement without any previous agreement cannot be accepted by NatCo GR. ","25/May/21 11:32 AM;mjodlowski;Ioannis,
There is no defect in DLT implementation. Such timeouts (6-7 sec) were configured and tested during UAT.
I understand Maciej and Michalis agreed to increase Mulesoft timeouts, but this *won't solve the business problem*.
In case longish operations are expected to be observed in Production environment, we not only need to increase Mulesoft timeouts, but *start with Salesforce timeouts.*
In other words, if  increase maximum processing time in Mulesoft to e.g. 30 sec, and SF has preconfgiured 10 sec, you will still see errors.
In order to overcome the problem we need to change the way data is provided by Legacy (now it's also not HAL compliant) - shall save some seconds.
[~piwanowski], [~mreznyk], [~jkomorowska]  - FYI - we are coming back to timeout discussions...

Hi Marek normally the responses will be very fast. {color:#de350b}But the timeout should be increased to handle even exceptional cases as discussed two days before{color} here https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-5583

As stated above: please share the pertinent agreement that NatCo GR agreed on those timeouts before rejecting the issue. Currently we identified the bug on DLT's implementation side an we shared the logs with the exceptions. General statement without any previous agreement cannot be accepted by NatCo GR","25/May/21 12:44 PM;edimaki;[~mczarnecki] & [~mjodlowski] Hello this morning we +discussed+ & +agreed+ that the timeout will be set to 30 secs on mulesoft side to avoid changing this in the future. This is proposed as a top value. If this requires Salesforce adjustment also then please arrange 30 secs SFA and the corresponding on Mule

[~mjodlowski] Also the remark above if you check the original Jira this is a statement that Marek has made a change when Michalis & Ioannis where requesting 30 secs. No previous agreement or acceptance on our side on any a user story. On both user stories

we strongly request 30 secs and you strongly resist this claiming resource issues. We have certain customers with thousands of records and responses in these rare cases will be more than 8 secs so we need to address this. On legacy side we cannot see any improvment that can be done.
CC:[~wnowosad] Please provide a working solution. we do not wish to go to redesigns for these rare cases.

CC: [~Gabor.Fal] Do we indeed face resourcing issues? we do not expect these exception cases to have such implications.","25/May/21 1:33 PM;mjodlowski;I'm really sorry but all discussion and decisions were taken in USSFA-5609 (including suppressing of longish operation for credit profiles retrieval).
I do not accept High production defect. Moreover, as per problem reported  - it's not deterministic so it must not be related to exceptional cases.
Please create user story/task to adjust timeouts.
Last but not least - we were raising performance risk durign design stage and it looks like this risk is materializing...

","25/May/21 2:37 PM;amitkou;[~wnowosad] [~Gabor.Fal] [~Satish.Channawar1] as requested, please suggest slot for reaching agreement","27/May/21 4:10 PM;mgiannat;+*Technical Solution discussed at 27/5*+
# Temp override timeout in harmonized SF package
# Implement this in harmonized solution of SF (permanent solution)

Back Button not working inside 360Assets iFrame,USSFA-5838,153797,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Done/Fixed,ELeodi,ELeodi,ELeodi,14/May/21 2:14 PM,17/Jun/21 12:36 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,17/Jun/21 12:36 PM,,,,0,360,GR,PostR3_UAT,Release3,,,,,"στο UAT για πελάτη PREPAC AEBE vat 093277931 μπαινω στο 360 assets και ανοίγω την σελίδα Fixed Internet
όταν πατάω το βελάκι για να επιστρέψω στην προηγούμενη σελίδα το σύστημα ξαναφορτώνει την ίδια και μένω στην παρακάτω οθόνη
Δοκιμάσαμε το case που αναφέρεις, και δεν γίνεται reproduce σε εμάς.
Μπορείς να κάνεις hard refresh τη σελίδα δοκιμάζοντας τους παρακάτω συνδυασμού και έπειτα να δοκμιάσεις ξανά;
* Hold down Ctrl & shift and press R.
* Hold down Ctrl and press F5
έκανα refresh Hold down Ctrl and press F5 αλλά το ίδιο παθαίνω.
αν εσένα σου επιστρέφει στην προηγούμενη σελίδα, αν θες να βάλουμε ένα call από Δευτέρα να το κάνουμε reproduce μαζι
Φαίνεται το παραπάνω να εντοπίζεται μόνο μέσω του Salesforce, θα μπορούσες να μας βοηθήσεις με τη διερεύνηση, καθώς δεν έχουμε πρόσβαση στο SFA;
Θα θέλαμε το issue να γίνει simulate:
It appears that “*Back Button*”  inside the *360 Assets iFrame* is now not working. Could you please help us with the investigation? Below our findings:
* This issue occurs only in Production Environment. Everything in UAT works as expected.
* This button seems to work as expected when launching the Web App as a standalone (i.e. [https://pag.ote.gr:577/assetview/093277931]). So the issue occurs only through the iFrame.
* Users mentioned that this button used to work as expected through the iFrame, and no changes have been performed from our side.

Have you recently performed any changes concerning the load of the iFrame? Could you perhaps check the options used to open the iFrame to make sure “Back Button” navigation inside the iFrame is supported?
I understand that the issue occurs only in production.
I'm pretty sure that we didn't change anything related to the iFrame solution.
Production uses different link in iFrame
Are you sure that this wasn't solved in UAT version of *pag.ote.gr* app, but was not deployed to the production.
My feeling is that UAT and Production versions of *pag.ote.gr* app are not aligned","25/May/21 7:01 PM;irene.kampouraki;Hello [~amitkou] & [~ipasialis]
As discussed with Giannis, this issue is not reproducible on our side. Unfortunately, we cannot set a Dfd as we cannot further investigate.

Since the error occurs only in Production Environment, we suggest to check again after deploying the rest of the bugs/fixes to be deployed, to make sure that the code is aligned in both environments (Production deployment date: 6/6).
We redeployed the code in Production, making sure the code is similar with UAT. The issue remainds in the UI through the iFrame.
Since the issue appears only through the iFrame, and not while using the standalone *pag.ote.gr* app, we assume that the issue concerns the loading of the iFrame.

Can we schedule a quick call to check this issue?","08/Jun/21 11:08 AM;irene.kampouraki;[~milipinski] Charalampos Thomas scheduled a meeting yesterday for today. Are you available? It has just started, at the link below:

[https://oracle.zoom.us/j/9523249960?pwd=RElLMmozZGFiY3lyNlNKT0VKeG9qQT09]","08/Jun/21 1:14 PM;charalampos.thomas;[~milipinski] Are you going to be available today for a quick call to investigate the issue?

You may also reach me at my work mobile phone: 6951788372","08/Jun/21 5:00 PM;amitkou;[~milipinski] [~wnowosad] please let us know your availability. we will then organise the call. thank you","08/Jun/21 5:25 PM;milipinski;[~amitkou]
We had a call with [~charalampos.thomas] 30 minutes ago but we were not able to reproduce the issue.

Can we schedule a call with both of us and some end user that can reproduce the issue?","09/Jun/21 9:41 AM;amitkou;[~milipinski] [~irene.kampouraki] please share availability so we do follow up today","09/Jun/21 12:18 PM;milipinski;[~amitkou] I do not have any planed meetings today so I'm quite flexible here","15/Jun/21 8:52 AM;amitkou;[~charalampos.thomas]what is the status here? thanks","15/Jun/21 11:14 AM;irene.kampouraki;Hello [~amitkou] ,
We have prepared a workaround that will be deployed in the production environment tomorrow (Hotfix).
Unfortunately since we cannot reproduce the issue in the UAT environment, we cannot be sure if it will resolve the issue.
We will let you know as soon as we have any feedback.
cc. [~charalampos.thomas]  [~george.menikidis]  [~ipasialis]","16/Jun/21 5:40 PM;irene.kampouraki;Hello [~ELeodi] , the back button seems to work as expected now!

in production back arrow does work and colors are correct (Mobile: Green/Fixed: Blue).

in Uat none of the above apply. arrow does not work and colors are Mobile: Blue /Fixed: Green . is this normal or should i see this fix in UAT also?","17/Jun/21 12:32 PM;charalampos.thomas;Hello [~ELeodi] , it appears there was a mistake in UAT, and one of the two nodes was left with an older deployment version.

Would you mind trying once again and verifying? (In case you see no difference I would suggest opening a new tab and trying again or force refreshing - CTRL+SHIFT+R - cause sometimes browser cache content locally to save bandwidth).

column1: Deloitte to release SF package today eod. cc [~tmichalislis] [~ipasialis] ","20/May/21 9:13 AM;amitkou;FRom Marek:
Run time: 16:26 – 16:41, ca 15 minutes, Items processed: 109504, failed: 263, *Completion: 99,76%,* processing rate – 400k items/hours.
# GR Team – prepare bigger sample (e.g. 0,5M) in less granular manner (we processed files with 10k rows, limit is 50k) – we shall get even better performance

With current performance and throttling settings we would need *at most 6 hours for 2,4M records* which is quite ok especially we can do it without affecting business users. With revised file generation strategy (point 1 above) I suspect we could drop to *2-3 hours for 2,4M record (*not getting into technical details, in theory we increase salesforce processing parallelism 5 times).","20/May/21 9:17 AM;tmichalislis;Current volume of callback items to be migrated is 4.891.428 records. There may be more on 29/5 when we fetch the data.

","12/May/21 5:22 PM;mgiannat;Καλησπέρα Διονύση νομίζω το είχαμε ξανασυναντήσει στο παρελθόν. Και ξαναμιλάμε.","12/May/21 5:36 PM;dmyriounis;το δοκιμάσαμε Μιχάλη κ το επιβεβαιώνουμε , πως θα προχωρήσουμε από δω και πέρα;","12/May/21 5:42 PM;mgiannat;Νομίζω το πιο απλό είναι να μη στέλνετε ποτέ κενό απο το CRM, δείτε το εσωτερικά και να βάλουμε μια 15' συναντηση αυριο να το συζητήσουμε","12/May/21 6:07 PM;vchristopoulos;Καλησπέρα.
Μόλις μας έρθει μια κλήση στο UCM για Create Account τότε έχουμε την εξής λογική.

Partners"" do not exist in UCM. They were migrated from Mobile directly. Partners do not sync with UCM.

Information related to target ,USSFA-5781,152580,,Story,US Blocked,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Low,,oana.ene,kwojtczak,kwojtczak,09/May/21 8:02 PM,18/May/21 2:23 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,Release 4,,,0,CR,GR,June,NewDemand,nocapex,Salesforce,,,"In reports it should be possible to have information related to Targets.
Targets are set up per month, per role and per agent.
Targets should be maintained by Business Adminsitrator. For sales users targets should be read only. Targets are related to Opportunities and Events
TS Manager each month must be able to set manually the ""initial target"" to each agent (few agents may differ with smaller targets because they are new comers).
Targets may differ from month to month .

During the month targets may be split differently among the team than initially (due to absences of agents) so the TS manager should be able to edit the ""Final target"" per agent accordingly when needed.
Notice: This user story potentially might be similar to USSFA-5536

Information from this object will be reused in reports which are related to this US. ",,ELeodi,jkomorowska,kwojtczak,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-5783,USSFA-5782,,,,,,USSFA-5536,USSFA-4634,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"13/May/21 9:08 PM;tkiritsi;TELE APPOINTMENTS example reports.xlsx;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/122059/TELE+APPOINTMENTS+example+reports.xlsx",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10/May/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2

,12/May/21 10:58 AM;amitkou;[~kwojtczak]any news here?","12/May/21 11:55 AM;kwojtczak;Based on the documentation linked above, it is not possible to query all notes like other data from the System Admin perspective. [~milipinski] could you confirm? ","12/May/21 1:31 PM;milipinski;[~kwojtczak] [~pdlugosz]
The only way to query ContentNotes under specified Lead would be something like:
Select ContentDocumentId, ContentDocument.Title, ContentDocument.OwnerId FROM ContentDocumentLink WHERE LinkedEntityId in (SELECT id from LEAD WHERE ID = '00Q1X000003bUnvUAE')
Please note that it doesn't query ContentNote but records that links Content Note with Specified Lead.
ContentDocumentId corresponds to many objects including ContentNotes
Disadvantage of that solution is that you might query documents linked to the Lead as well.

I have checked original input data and found one comment:
matchingPayment - Statuses of the invoice Open/Cosed
[~ipasialis] Does it mean that matchingPayment should show Closed if bill was fully paid, otherwise it should show Open?

In HAL model we have a field called state on the customerBIll API. This can have many values one of this is settled - which means fully paid and many others like partiallyPaid, new (just created, not due yet), sent (sent to customer) etc... If matchingPayment - Closed means fully paid bill then I think this customerBill/state attribute could be mapped here and if value is settled than SalesForce could show Closed.
Other values are a question. Do you need to see Open or are you ok with having more possible values here?
These are the possible values I think:
State that a bill could take during its lifecycle
* {{new}} Bill created as a result of a cycle run
* {{validated}} Bill check ok, ready to sent to customer
* {{onHold}} Check bill not ok, trouble ticket raised
Thanks ","19/May/21 2:16 PM;mgiannat;Please check if the following mapping exists in SF:

# sent ==> Open","20/May/21 7:45 PM;mkropisz;The solution might be to change the matchingPayment column to status and prepare the right mapping so that status shows the value of state. The bigger problem might be to improve the values input in SF, which are returned to MS. The customerBills do not always have the ""state"" field. Another problem is that, when the ""remainingAmount"" shows 0 value, I believe state should have ""settled"" value, It however usually is ""sent"".
[~ELeodi] [~mgiannat] [~Gabor.Fal] [~ipasialis]","21/May/21 12:22 PM;mjodlowski;We need to be sure you will always send state (sent, settled) :).
On top, since this is not a bug but rather design change, please convert this to US, We will to it without scope impact, but originally matchingpayment was from appliedPayments.
[~ipasialis] - I also suggest to change SF UI from MatchingPayment to simple Status on CustomerBill (LoV foreseen so far: Open, Closed):
