column2: https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_MWFjNGYwZDgtNzYxNS00ZTI1LWE2OWEtN2ViNTJmYTNlMTZk%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%225519d029-573e-4566-a181-33c5c225e247%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%221bdd175f-aab6-4cd7-aa56-c73427441bcd%22%7d]","23/Apr/21 6:15 PM;kwojtczak;[~ELeodi] [~tkiritsi] [~ipasialis] the fields from Competitor products are not going to be integrated on HQ level. I will discuss internally on this solution with Global picklist value for local products levels - just to make sure that there are not any dependencies that will block us. ","23/Apr/21 6:19 PM;ipasialis;This is good news and provides us with flexibility. I would still prefer gr-specific value set so that we will be totally independent from the central teams categorization.

column1: I talked to Damian and due to dependencies in the system (synchronization of all Lead fields), we need another approach.

Since GR values are included in the main Value Set we can set it up on Record Type level. In the event of new values coming from the core package, If they will not be changed on Record Type level, they won't be displayed in the fields - so there is no risk that some new values will pop out there in the future in this field.
Your approach looks fine in most times, except the case that we need to add one more GR Specific value. To my understanding , if we go this wat , this would require some effort to make it happen.

Would you like to evaluate the solution of creating a GR value set that will be used for us? This would be an absolute de-couple of our values and this why we tried so hard to create this US. To not have future dependencies on the DT-Level values.
Based on my further conversations yesterday and today, there is one additional topic related to this story.

Since Lead is integrated and values on the field between GR and HARM finally are different - we need to have a mapping between these values. [~tkiritsi]  [~ipasialis] could you please provide it? One 2nd level GR value should correspond to one HARM 2nd level GR value.
I just discovered that actually, we have a bug on what is displayed in this field vs what should be displayed according to story USSFA-4481.
Once we have information on how to map this values we will be able to proceed with correct implementation.
There is no direct mapping between GR 2nd Level and DT 2nd level. Sometimes it is many to many.
This is why in the first place we asked for this User Story , to have our own de-coupled hierarchy, Because there is no way to map directly.
Also this is why I asked you in the previous comment to construct a GR-specific value set for us.

The only common thing here, our baseline unit is 3rd level.  A 3rd level product , in the same time belongs to a GR 2nd level  ( with the help of the new field you implemented) and in harmonized 2nd level( the existing field).
Hope this is clear , if not we would be happy to discuss it in a meeting.
You sent us a new package, can you describe what is it all about?
The new package was send with the changes related to this bug. Based on the architecture alignment, the following changes were implemented:
* We still use harmonized global set value with Product levels. Creating another global picklist value causes complexity in the system.

* You mentioned that you want to control the values based on the greek requirements. You are given this possibility - all values on these picklists are managed on the record type level. On Account Competitor Product and Opportunity Competitor Product default record types were created and assigned to proper profiles. In case of adding/removing values, you are able to do it without having an impact on other natcos.
* Mapping related to multiple entries will be solved on HQ org level using Bucket fields in reporting.
","06/May/21 11:18 AM;ipasialis;2nd point is not very clear to me. Can I now go to my uat env and set any value I want for the the 2nd GR level?

About 3rd point , is there anything we should do on our side?","06/May/21 11:51 AM;kwojtczak;This cannot be done on UAT environment since this change as all other changes need to be marked in the repository. If you would do it then all changes would be overwritten in the next upcoming package. So the change anyway should follow the classic deployment process.

For point number 3 there are no actions on your side. ","06/May/21 12:04 PM;ipasialis;Ok let me rephrase my question. As GR Natco , am I de-coupled from the other Natcos? You mentioned we use the same Value Set and we just ""hide"" the ones we do not need.
If Greece wants a new value on this, what will be the process for this? A new value that does not belong to the harmonized .  We will need to make a harmonized User Story? What will be the process?
As you understand , this is the exact process I need to avoid.
We need to be able to set the values ourselves without impacting the harmonized implementation
[~tkiritsi] ","06/May/21 6:56 PM;kwojtczak;If Greece wants a new field the process is as follows:
* value is added in Harmonized picklist
* value is added in GR Org on record types so that is available for Greek users
The value will not be available for users in other NatCos unless they won't activate it on the Record Type level.

The additional GR global picklist causes big dependencies. First of all, on Lead you would need to have a completely new field to be integrated since Salesforce does not allow to replace global value set in an already existing field. It would add costs on the integration side and would cause bigger problems.

[~ipasialis] what is the number of cases that you will change values in this field? I assume this classification is not changing very often. ","07/May/21 9:26 AM;ipasialis;Ok [~kwojtczak], we agree on this approach. You are right , not many changes are expected.
We will keep on testing on UAT.

[~tkiritsi], [~amitkou]","07/May/21 10:29 AM;kwojtczak;[~ELeodi] so then it should be ready to test. There is only a small typo to be corrected - USSFA-5765 so at this point please take a look on functionality only. ","07/May/21 10:38 AM;ELeodi;hi [~kwojtczak],
when i go to products object through and on create new product view, on Product Area drop down list i expect to see harmonized values.

!image-2021-05-07-10-34-43-205.png!","07/May/21 12:15 PM;kwojtczak;[~ELeodi] I see on Product Area (Harm) we have too many values activated so that we need to deactivate:   Mobile and Fix.
For changing the first level on GR side - I see in all mapping tables that it was decided to have Fix value. Is that correct?
","07/May/21 12:27 PM;ELeodi;[~kwojtczak] for Harm. values yes we need to remove those two
for GR 1st level, yes we gave Fix as value, but it should be fixed. is this name easily changed?

The value ""Fix"" was wrong on all harmonized tables since last year . I did not make a fuss about is since it was harmonized. Now that we are having the GR only values , it would be nice to rename this value properly.

In Greece there is local Beer brand under the name FIX :D ","07/May/21 1:38 PM;kwojtczak;[~tkiritsi] I know I know... however for me Alfa Weiss was better :) Let me put this note under USSFA-5765 (related to Fixed value) ","07/May/21 1:56 PM;kwojtczak;[~tkiritsi], [~ELeodi]  can I close this bug  and create a seperate one for this deactivation of values? It will be more clear to track and easier for developers to understand what needs to be done.  ","07/May/21 1:58 PM;tkiritsi;[~kwojtczak]
sure , you are right","07/May/21 2:11 PM;kwojtczak;Thanks for quick response.
","07/May/21 2:25 PM;ELeodi;[~kwojtczak] , on opportunities when i add products i should see the names Product Family (Level 2) & GR Product Area (Level 1) as mentioned on USSFA-5099
instead i see GR Product Family (Level 1) and GR Product Family (Level 2)
should we open a separate bug for that? ","07/May/21 2:56 PM;kwojtczak;[~ELeodi] in story in acceptance criteria it says:

headers - data sent in HTTP Header. Sadly we don't log actual token.
queryParams - data sent as HTTP query params (after ?, so ?party.id=SF-FB63E529-3F26-11e2-B3E6-000000000000&page=0&size=5)
uriParams - data sent as HTTP uri params (in this case empty, applicable for e.g. /customers/\{id} query)

I cannot agree for such performance defect:
_What is strange here is that Mulesoft does not consume with the same rate all events from all partitions_
Performance issue is when agreed business KPIs are not met. We can analyze as Low priority defect at most (or task).
We are using 4 consumers on GR environment while You are presenting 6 partitions.
Another thing You are using default assignment strategy, so We will be never assigned with 6 assignments, thus You won't be able to scale up.
Also putting 120k of events once  is out of volume estimated initially - thus I would not consider this as typical scenario.
Of course I will try to help with scaling and fine tuning, but I think that We can't accept it as bug with HIGH priority.
Mass updates are subject to migration rather than integration

cc: [~ipasialis] [~ELeodi] [~damkowalski]","19/Apr/21 6:51 PM;ipasialis;I just did the setup and tried myself but the error is there again.
!image-2021-04-19-18-49-43-323.png!","19/Apr/21 6:53 PM;ipasialis;in UAT , the name is adfs.
I changed it to make it same as uat ( = adfs) but again , we have an error.","20/Apr/21 10:47 AM;mreznyk;Hi [~ipasialis]

The name is irrelevant in this case, so no worries on that matter. It is important to have this ""Remote Site"", but as we can see it is not the source of the problem. As I was mentioning before, this is an ADFS error message, so I really think we should be digging in that direction.

First, could you please contact ADFS team and ask them, if in their application, in the list of Redirect URIs, they have your PROD redirect URL? This is the value, that you can find in Setup ->Auth. Providers -> SSO -> ""Salesforce Configuration"" section -> Callback URL. The same value should be in ""Auth. Provider Detail"" section -> Redirect URL. I remember that they have UAT redirect url, which is - https://ote–situat.my.salesforce.com/services/authcallback/SSO
But I don't think, that they have PROD redirect URL. If it is the case, please provide it to them (you can find it in the place I specified above ) and retest with that value added.

In case this value was already there, there will be a need to look into ADFS logs, which probably shouldn't be that complicated, since there is an Activity Id and Timestamp in error message. Yet, I think this step won't be needed, as I suggest the absence of PROD Redirect URL is them most likely scenario here.

column1: As currently there are some issues with Lead, please kindly create new ticket for above problem and assign me.
The situation for this ticket is as follows:
*ERROR*: leads are not connected to accounts.
*SOLUTION*: specification was updated, uploading new/current records with value for ""Account External Id"" header will solve this issue.

Right now, it is being tested on other environment than problem was raised and completely other things will be investigated. Solution for initial problem has been provided. I just would like to have a clear picture of current situation and move this ticket to ""fix deployed on prod"" status as from DTT side it can be tested on PROD anytime :)","22/Apr/21 4:30 PM;tmichalislis;This is a production issue. We are just running the steps to resolve this in any environment before going to production.","22/Apr/21 5:09 PM;mchojnacki;[~tmichalislis],

I agree that this is a problem, however this is other issue than initially raised in this ticket. For the present, the problem is: ""recipientIds must be active to receive a notification"", on migtest. There are probably users that are owners of given Lead, but they are inactive. I would like GR to create new ticket for that. It will be directed to Salesforce team as this is Salesforce error.

Originally, in this ticket, there was migration issue on PROD and it is resolved. Right now, trying to retest solution, GR encountered other problem on MigTest and that's why I would like to have it in another ticket. One issue. one ticket. I do not claim that this problem would not appear on PROD, it could, but this is something completely different than problem depicted in title.
Considering current case, if we had to combine these two issues, we would not know what status there should be set.
DTT In Progress? -> DTT already provided solution.
PROD Fix deployed? -> There is an error.
Once we separate both issues, first one is in ""PROD Fix deployed"" as the solution for particular problem is prepared, the second one is ""DTT In Progress"" as new problem arose and status is clear.

Providing more general example, there could be one ticket: ""Migration does not work"" and within that there would be: Account trigger failed, missing Users, Contact did not start, field for Opportunity is missing and so on.. in that way we could go through the whole migration via one ticket. Hope You agree with me that it would be really difficult to track the progress :) Just to avoid misunderstanding I would like to have all these cases separated. Only then we know what is the current status and which side is responsible for what. Right now, new issue arises and Salesforce team will check it on Their side, but to separate migration issue from Salesforce one I need to have another ticket.

Thank You for understanding!","22/Apr/21 5:12 PM;tmichalislis;[~dmyriounis] can you open a new bug and associate it it with this bug?","22/Apr/21 5:14 PM;tmichalislis;[~mchojnacki] this must become blocked by the other bug. Right?","22/Apr/21 5:16 PM;mchojnacki;[~tmichalislis],

In the development of User Stories we take into consideration only Acceptance Criteria. In the mockups you present the name of the field - Credit Check, which is also presented in the mapping above. However table clearly shows Credit Check linked to  creditScore field on HAL side.
Therefore change of the mapping should be treated as CR, not as a bug.

In the acceptance criteria of the User Story https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-4123 it's stated that field ""Credit Check"" should be mapped to Customer.creditProfiles.CustomerCreditProfile.creditScore.

Could you add more context here about related Account and Contact? Related Account and Contact need to be synchronized in order to trigger Consent Platform Event on status change. We don't mean acquire consents now, it's about generating platform event on Consent?","14/Apr/21 11:49 AM;ethanopoulou;hello [~jwszolkowski],
what we actually wait is that when pressing buttons Accept/Reject the integration flow will be triggered and contact message with consent status will reach legacy systems.
what we have now is that when pressing buttons Accept/Reject the only thing that happens is status is updated with values of Oral consent or Oral Rejection.
In order for the US 3161 to be completed and tested successfully we should be able to trigger the integration flow of oral consent acquisition through buttons Accept/Reject.
before testing consents we always wait the contacts to be synched.

let me know if you need any further clarifications. ","14/Apr/21 9:05 PM;jwszolkowski;Thanks for the clarifications, that helped us understand what's the case. After installing of the new package after clicking Reject or Accept buttons message to Consent Acquisition service will be invoked. In that terms, there's no need for a new button on TeleSales for Consent Acquisition.

Package is deployed with CORE_TAG_NAME = v1.0.0-998   Should we check again ? ","15/Apr/21 1:36 PM;jwszolkowski;Core tag is valid, if natco-related changes are valid as well then we are good to check it again :)
","15/Apr/21 2:28 PM;ethanopoulou;[~ampoura] let's run one more test on new account. VAT id:
create a contact for oral consent and a contact for oral rejection and let us know to check if they reached legacy.","15/Apr/21 4:14 PM;ampoura;Account

Για το τικετ 1-81590669633 παρατηρούμε οτι επιστρεφουμε την ιδια πληροφορια απο Coherence με Siebel Fixed , μπορείς να μας βοηθήσεις με την σχετική πληροφορία που βλέπει η [~ELeodi] στο Siebel σε αντιπαράθεση με το query;
Τα Options βρίσκονται στις κολώνες  Χ_OPTION του S_SRV_REQ ή στον πίνακα S_EVT_ACT στην κολώνα X_OTE_OPT.
Το SR Additional Option είναι άλλο πεδίο και γεμίζει όπως βλέπω μόνο στα Incidents.
Άρα στο query CVGetTickets που έχει κάνει attach ο Γιώργος στο Jira το statement που τραβάει τα Options είναι το
Για το Created By στα Tickets  θα πρέπει στο query να φέρετε την κολώνα LOGIN από S_USER με join από S_SRV_REQ
Σχετικά με τον Owner αν δεις και στο query που παρέθεσα δεν επιστρέφετε όπως αναφέρει και η [~ELeodi].

","09/Apr/21 3:33 PM;ELeodi;[~vzachopoulou] can you give the details mentioned above?","09/Apr/21 6:00 PM;vzachopoulou;σωστά, περάστηκε από αυτό το root (το δικό μου δλδ) στο αφμ 812610065 με position C FRANCHISE","09/Apr/21 6:41 PM;n.bilalis;Hello,
We could not find Position : C FRANCHISE in Siebel.
Please share a screenshot or give us the exact name of the Position you logged in.
Επισυνάπτω 2 οθόνες του position όπως το βλέπω στο UI.","12/Apr/21 2:19 PM;n.bilalis;Καλησπέρα Βάνα,
Βλέπουμε ότι το Position που χρησιμοποίησες ειναι το C_FRANCHISΕ και ανήκει στο Division COSMOTE FR_1 το οποίο περιλαμβάνει μια ομάδα πρόσφατα δημιουργημένων καταστημάτων.
Το Division αυτό  έχει POS Category κενό και συνεπώς δημιουργείται το παραπάνω πρόβλημα.
Στην παραγωγή δεν περιμένουμε να δημιουργηθεί Lead απο Κατάστημα που ανήκει σε Division το οποίο δεν έχει τιμή στο πεδίο POS Category.
Σε περίπτωση που τα καταστήματα αυτά πρέπει να έχουν την δυνατότητα να δημιουργήσουν Leads θα πρέπει να γίνουν οι αντίστοιχες ενέργειες για να μπει τιμή στο παραπάνω πεδίο.
Στην περίπτωση που θα χρειαστεί ενημέρωση το πεδίο παρακαλώ βρείτε το Mapping όπως αυτό έχει συμφωνηθεί.
Τα καταστήματα Dealers πρέπει να έχουν τη δυνατότητα καταχώρησης lead, όπως και τώρα στο epos. Δεν έχει συμφωνηθεί να τους αφαιρεθεί η λειτουργικότητα.","12/Apr/21 5:36 PM;n.bilalis;Καλησπέρα,
Τα σχετικά σενάρια μπορούν να προχωρήσουν καθώς το issue οφείλεται στο ότι το POS Category του Division COSMOTE FR_1 είναι κενό.
Στο περιβαλον της παραγωγής δεν υπάρχει Position  C_FRANCHISΕ αλλά ούτε και Division COSMOTE FR_1.
Βρήκαμε μόνο 2 Divsions σχετικά με FRANCHISE στην παραγωγή:
Και τα 2 έχουν POS Category OTE Shops επομένως το υπάρχον mapping θα λειτουργήσει σωστά.

Lets start with single list, but lets test also on high volumes.
As discussed we have three options here:
# Rely on single call list for all call list items - this is basic option already implemented and delivered

** use ChunkSize 10000 to avoid parallel processing of call list items in single Job (one job 50k items gets split into 10k batches, which are causing Unable to lock row error (retryable but impacting processing speed.
# Introduced another file with Call Lists (containing only basic information about call list along which ExternalId and use those lists for distributing call list items evenly to avoid locks.
I would already go for chunkSize to avoid unable to lock row and use 2 point as plan B.

if migtest environment in in migration mode, please retest above issue and let us know what is the result.","12/May/21 1:42 PM;amitkou;From Krystof:

Currently from the UI perspective when user is generating call list, search will return maximum 2000 accounts.  When creating a call list items, there is a limitation of 300 items per one call list which means that from UI perspective there is no risk of hitting data skew limits.
# *Migration Data – too many Call List Items to one call list*

Dummy Call Lists should be generated per one user / per 10 000 records. So in case if one user has lets say 55k call list items, he should have 6 dummy call lists generated. This approach should not cause problems related to data skew and application performance perspective.

We do not recommend any changes in existing data model since this would require too big effort from both: SF analysis and SF development side.  ** ","12/May/21 4:19 PM;tmichalislis;extended by another Jira task",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

τέλος , στην cognity παίρνω error στο 360 billing και στα SR δεν φοτώνει τα παλιά αλλά μόνο το 1-AF42TJQ που είναι ένα απο τα 2 sr που δημιουργησα χθες και θεωρητικά δεν περνάνε","11/Apr/21 10:59 AM;ipasialis;[~christos.daskalakis] , [~mgiannat] I have also sent you an email about this, to clarify the criteria applied by the service.","11/Apr/21 11:59 AM;george.menikidis;Παρακάτω όσο συνοπτικά μπορέσαμε τα Tickets Fixed που επιστρέφει το Coherence service.
* // CASE 1: SR_CAT_TYPE_CD = 'CSR' AND SSR.SR_AREA IN ('Αιτήματα Εξυπηρέτησης', 'Θέματα Λογαριασμών'))
* // CASE 2: SSR.SR_CAT_TYPE_CD = 'STT' AND SSR.SR_AREA = 'Αίτημα Υποστήριξης' AND SSR.SR_SUB_AREA = 'Παραγγελιοληψία'
* // CASE 5: SSR.SR_CAT_TYPE_CD = 'CTT' AND SSR.SR_AREA IN ('Βλάβη','Γενικευμένη Βλάβη','Εργασίες συντήρησης','Γεν. Βλάβη - Συντήρηση Δικτύου','Αίτημα','Υποστήριξη','Παράπονο')

* // CASE 6: SSR.SR_CAT_TYPE_CD = 'Incident' AND (SSR.X_OTE_ADD_OPTION_1 IN(SELECT SL.VAL FROM SIEBEL.CX_OTE_LOV SL WHERE SL.TYPE = 'INCIDENT_REQUEST' AND SL.ACTIVE_FLG = 'Y') AND SSR.X_OTE_ADD_OPTION_2 IN (SELECT SL.DESC_TEXT FROM SIEBEL.CX_OTE_LOV SL WHERE SL.TYPE = 'INCIDENT_REQUEST' AND SL.ACTIVE_FLG = 'Y'))

* // CASE 8: SSR.X_OTE_ADD_OPTION_1 IN (SELECT SL.VAL FROM SIEBEL.CX_OTE_LOV SL WHERE SL.TYPE = 'INCIDENT_COMPLAINT' AND SL.ACTIVE_FLG = 'Y' AND SSR.X_OTE_ADD_OPTION_2 IN (SELECT SL.DESC_TEXT FROM SIEBEL.CX_OTE_LOV SL WHERE SL.TYPE = 'INCIDENT_COMPLAINT' AND SL.ACTIVE_FLG = 'Y')

","13/Apr/21 11:34 AM;amitkou;[~irene.kampouraki]  please inform Gkini who is our billing contact about the issue and arrange a call with Gkinis, Giorgos <ggkinis@cosmote.gr> and add me in cc and invite also Mihalis/Pasialis if needed. thanks","20/Apr/21 4:09 PM;sofia.kyrkou;Καλησπέρα [~mgiannat]
Θα χρειαστούμε άμεσα το feedback σου στα εξής ερωτήματα:
1. Η procedure BILSYS.COS_MO_LIB.GET_CONTRACT_MO_AMOUNTS καλείται με 3 inputs: v_co_id, v_date_from και v_date_to. Με τι ημ/νίες την καλεί το BUS; Είναι πάντα σταθερές;
2. Όπως αναφέρει και ο Στέφανος στην σχετική αλληλογραφία το BSCS επιστρέφει ποσά και όχι Μ.Ο. Αυτός υπολογίζεται από το BUS που έχει και την business λογική.
Στην λογική αυτή του BUS αναφέρεις παραπάνω "" if({color:#00875a}num_invoices{color}!=0)

{ response = ({color:#00875a}total_amount{color} + {color:#FF0000}logicaRecharges{color} - {color:#00875a}renewal_amount{color} - {color:#00875a}accfee_subsidy_amount{color} - {color:#00875a}cobranded_amount{color} - {color:#00875a}adsl_amount{color}) / {color:#00875a}num_invoices{color}; } "". Aναφέρεται το {color:#FF0000}logicaRecharges{color} το οποίο δεν συμφωνεί σαν ονοματολογία με τις υπόλοιπες out μεταβλητές που επιστρέφει η procedure του BSCS. Μπορείς να μας ενημερώσεις με ποιά out μεταβλητή γίνεται το mapping; Παραθέτω το υπόλοιπο mapping όπως το υποθέσαμε βάσει ονοματολογίας, παρακαλώ για την επιβεβαίωσή σου.

","20/Apr/21 4:36 PM;mgiannat;Καλησπέρα Σοφία, δυστυχώς δεν έχω access στο συγκεκριμένο κώδικα, θα σου στέιλω το τηλέφωνο του Ν. Θεοδωροπουλου να τον καλέσεις. Έχω μιλήσει μαζί του και τον εχω ενημερώσει ότι θα τον καλέσεις.","05/May/21 5:11 PM;irene.kampouraki;Καλησπέρα Ελένη, Χρόνια Πολλά! [~ELeodi]

column1: Σχετικά με το παραπάνω ο λόγος που δεν εμφανίζονται data στο SPR σχετίζεται με το γεγονός οτι δεν βρέθηκε το SalesforceId στο Coherence. Η αντίστοιχη απάντηση έχει επιστραφεί στο  SPR  με το αντίστοιχο μηνυμα λάθους.
Για οποιαδήποτε διευκρίνηση παρακάλώ επικοινωνησαι μαζί μου.
Ευχαριστώ πολύ!","07/Apr/21 11:52 AM;ipasialis;Γρηγόρη , τι σημαίνει δε βρέθηκε στο coherence?

είναι πελάτης που κανονικά έχει ανέβει στο Salesforce .","08/Apr/21 10:27 AM;mgiannat;Γρηγόρη θα έπρεπε να υπάρχει στο coherence? Είναι θέμα data misaligment? ή σωστά δεν υπαρχει; Μίλησες με [~george.menikidis]/[~christos.daskalakis]?","08/Apr/21 10:45 AM;grigorios.stamellos;Καλησπέρα σας,
Στα πλαίσια του regression για το SPR, είχαμε επικοινωνήσει 3 σενάρια για να διασφαλίσουμε ότι δεν θα επηρεαστεί η υφιστάμενη λειτουργικότητα για το SPR.
1)Κλήση για ανάκτηση Opportunities για εναν B2B πελάτη με βάση τον ΑΦΜ – Αναμενόμενο αποτέλεσμα (Λίστα με Opportunities)
2)Κλήση για ανάκτηση Opportunities για εναν B2B πελάτη με βάση τον ΑΦΜ και να μην υπάρχουν Opportunities - Αναμενόμενο αποτέλεσμα (κενή λίστα)
3) Κλήση για ανάκτηση Opportunities για εναν B2B πελάτη με βάση τον ΑΦΜ οποίος δεν υπάρχει στο  Coherence - Αναμενόμενο αποτέλεσμα (Απάντηση με το αντίστοιχο μήνυμα λάθους)
[~christos.daskalakis] μπορείς σε παρακαλώ να μας ενημερώσεις αν για τον ΑΦΜ *090159846*, υπάρχει το αντίστοιχο μοναδικό  SalesforceId;
Παρατηρούμε ότι το συγκεκριμένο ΑΦΜ δεν υπάρχει στο UCM UAT.","08/Apr/21 11:48 AM;ipasialis;Οκ παιδιά θα το ελέγξω πάλι με τους χρήστες.","08/Apr/21 11:51 AM;grigorios.stamellos;Καλησπέρα Γιάννη,

Όπως αναφέρει και Χρήστος ο ΑΦΜ δεν υπάρχει στο UCM, γι' αυτο το λόγο και δεν επιστράφηκε η λίστα με τα Opportunities στο SPR από το microservice, αλλα απάντηση με το αντίστοιχο μήνυμα λάθους. Αυτό ήταν και το αναμενόμενο αποτέλεσμα για το σενάριο 3) που περιγράφεται παραπάνω.
Μπορείς να προσπαθήσεις με τον ΑΦΜ *825310069*, για τον οποίο και αναμένουμε να επιστραφούν Opportunities;
","08/Apr/21 1:26 PM;ipasialis;ανοίξαμε SPR Fixed για αυτό το ΑΦΜ αλλά υπάρχει μήνυμα λάθους , ότι το αφμ δεν υπάρχει. Ενώ υπάρχει και έχει opportunities.

Παιδιά αλλάξατε κάτι ; Πράγματα που έπαιζαν , έχουν σταματήσει να παίζουν και υπάρχει σύγχυση σε όλους σχετικά με το τι έχει συμβεί.","08/Apr/21 1:31 PM;mgiannat;Γιάννη αυτό που καταλαβαίνω είναι οτι το συγκεκριμένο ΑΦΜ για κάποιο λόγο δεν υπάρχει στο UCM, μπορεις να το δεις αν όντως ισχύει;","08/Apr/21 2:37 PM;ipasialis;Έλεγξα αυτό που μου δώσατε εσείς. *825310069*","08/Apr/21 3:09 PM;grigorios.stamellos;Καλησπέρα και πάλι Γιάννη,
Έπειτα απο δοκιμή με τον ΑΦΜ *825310069,* επιστράφηκαν δεδομένα στο SPR;
Ευχαριστώ πολύ!","08/Apr/21 4:08 PM;ipasialis;Θέλετε να ελέγξουμε πάλι για τo *825310069*;
Οι χρήστες όταν το άνοιξαν στο SPR ,  τους έβγαλε μήνυμα λάθους ","08/Apr/21 4:11 PM;mgiannat;[~grigorios.stamellos] please add here the request / response you checked
Then [~ipasialis] please check if there is any issue of handling the response from SPR

Otherwise we have to set up a short call to align","08/Apr/21 4:13 PM;ipasialis;Ας τα πούμε λίγο τηλεφωνικά , χάθηκα",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

(this is low prio not something urgent)","10/May/21 1:52 PM;hkaragioka;Changes are deployed at SIT/UAT BUS environment.
We sent from UCM the Contact with First Name TURIABABABABABABABABABABABABABABABABABABCVVVVV (46 char). (Account Name: LINKEDIN)
This Contact reached in Salesforce with First Name TURIABABABABABABABABABABABABABABABABABAB(40 char).
I believe that this is the expected result.
According to logs from BUS, we received the above First Name (46 char) from UCM and we sent the above First Name (40 char) to Salesforce.
This is the expected result of the above publish call.","18/May/21 11:41 AM;hkaragioka;Changes have been deployed at production.

column1: Change in mapping of the fields on Lead,USSFA-5452,144495,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Won't Do/Dropped,mchojnacki,kwojtczak,kwojtczak,06/Apr/21 12:59 PM,19/Apr/21 12:09 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,16/Apr/21 12:14 PM,,,,0,CR,GR,Integration,Salesforce,,,,,"+Wrong phone mapping from My Cosmoview leads+
In order to complete the create lead process from My cosmoview , we seem to be missing an important field – that is the phone field which is mandatory for lead creation in SF
For that we must asap proceed with the following change.

column2: i060dz:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,06/Apr/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,kwojtczak,mchojnacki,oana.ene,theofani.ntamsa,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"06/Apr/21 2:04 PM;oana.ene;[~tkiritsi] - this is the new story created.

column1: [~amitkou]","06/Apr/21 2:19 PM;kwojtczak;[~tkiritsi] After checking EDA mappings on Lead, field Mobile Phone is mapped to Mobile Phone, and Phone is mapped to Phone. So could you please explain what is the reason for such change?

During lead creation from myCOSMOView, we use the Mulesoft field: *MobilePhone* (path: body/Lead/MobilePhone), which is mapped in the Salesforce field: MobilePhone (label: Mobile Phone), in order to pass the phone number provided by the user.
Business has requested to store the value that is passed from myCOSMOView to the field that is displayed in UI as: *Phone*, and not Mobile Phone.
Based on the below interface, we understand that the correct field is the following:
Initially, we would like Salesforce’s team confirmation about the field.
* Mulesoft team should add the field: Phone in the interface of Create Lead.
* Microservice team should change the mapping in order to pass the value sent from myCOSMOView to the new field.

Is there any specific reason from business on that? The reason why I am asking is that having discussed with Integration team this change can have implications on other natcos who would like to integrate leads in the future and creates inconsistency in mapping.
Maybe the business rationale we can somehow address in other way?
We do not want to change the mapping from your side.
The requirement is for Mulesoft to expose the Phone field in the interface of create lead in order to be used from our side.
Therefore, we will use the newly exposed field (Phone) in order to pass the respective value from our side. The mapping from your side should remain as it.

Fani","07/Apr/21 2:01 PM;oana.ene;[~tkiritsi]","07/Apr/21 2:55 PM;kwojtczak;[~mjodlowski] [~mchojnacki]  - could you please take a look on Fani's comment? ","14/Apr/21 1:45 PM;kwojtczak;[~mjodlowski] [~mchojnacki] - just follow up on this user story  ","15/Apr/21 10:39 AM;mchojnacki;Hello [~theofani.ntamsa],
first of all my apologise for the delay.

Please correct me if I am mistaken, during creation Lead into Salesforce, You want to provide value in input structure for field body/Lead/*Phone* and this value should be uploaded into respective Salesforce field (Phone), correct?","15/Apr/21 11:16 AM;theofani.ntamsa;Hello [~mchojnacki],
I confirm. Currently we use the field body/Lead/*MobilePhone* to pass this information.
We would like to pass our value in the field: body/Lead/*Phone* instead, which will be uploaded in the Salesforce field: Phone.
if I understood correctly the situation is as follows:
# Value for field body/Lead/*MobilePhone* has been exposed so far and it has been uploaded into MobilePhone.
# From now on, body/Lead/*Phone* will be provided and will be uploaded into Phone.
In accordance with specification: [https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/EDA_Lead_v1.1.0] -> above mapping is already done.
Therefore if You expose body/Lead/*Phone* in input structure, this value will be uploaded into Phone field (_Salesforce_).
To check if the solution meets Your requirements, is it possible from Your side to send such Lead request including body/Lead/*Phone* field today?
In case of any question, please do not hesitate to contact me :)","16/Apr/21 11:36 AM;theofani.ntamsa;Hello [~mchojnacki],
We have successfully tested the functionality and the phone number is stored correctly on the field: Phone.
Thank you very much for your actions.
so we ended before we started :) Thank You very much for great news!

as a reporter please kindly close this ticket. Solution was provided earlier, so the whole effort for all Teams is 0 :)",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

DL queue too many messages the last day,USSFA-5447,144356,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Won't Do/Dropped,mgiannat,mgiannat,mgiannat,06/Apr/21 9:33 AM,07/Apr/21 1:34 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,07/Apr/21 1:34 AM,,,,0,GR,PROD,,,,,,,"Hello, mulesoft platform rejects >3000 messages the last day, could you please help identify the root cause?
This looks like the issue that We already faced at least once - accounts incoming from legacy are missing mandatory name attribute.

{code}","06/Apr/21 11:29 AM;mczarnecki;Issue is related to invalid events received from legacy (accounts with missing name attribute - which is mandatory)","06/Apr/21 11:30 AM;mgiannat;Ok thank you [~mczarnecki] for your feedback","06/Apr/21 1:44 PM;mgiannat;Hello [~mczarnecki], after further investigation we found from the DL queue, the below.
The name is missing however according to the IA [https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/Account] the name is mandatory upon creation only.

}","06/Apr/21 2:05 PM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat] According to discussion regarding EDA Approach (with [~Gabor.Fal] and NatCos) We agreed, that each EDA message is treated as a complete object for upsert operation. This means, that if We receive an event without name, We treat it as update and are trying to issue SF composite request.
In this scenario, Mulesoft received and passed empty object (account name) and the update dit not succeed in SF (attribute is mandatory).
[~piwanowski] Could You please answer [~mgiannat] question from SF perspective ?","06/Apr/21 2:16 PM;mgiannat;Hello this statement is not correct

_""_[~mgiannat] _According to discussion regarding EDA Approach (with_ [~Gabor.Fal] _and NatCos) We agreed, that each EDA message is treated as a complete object for upsert operation. This means, that if We receive an event without name, We treat it as update and are trying to issue SF composite request.""_

*Upsert is not update - is like 'merge' that is why in the IA it is mentioned _""SF Mandatory (When creation)""_*","06/Apr/21 2:21 PM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat]: I am afraid it is correct - all events are sent as UPSERT operation in EDA opportunity sync","06/Apr/21 2:22 PM;mgiannat;indeed all events are sent as UPSERT (not update :) )
the only case I see here is if we sent an UPSERT for a non-existing customer","06/Apr/21 3:01 PM;damkowalski;[~mczarnecki], [~mgiannat],

As promised I am sending SF perspective. From SF point of view Name on the Account is mandatory out of the box and I don't have possibility to switch it off. You can't insert account without it or erase name in the update operation.
cc. [~piwanowski]","06/Apr/21 3:03 PM;mgiannat;this is upsert operation, this means  that only the fields with value will be applied.
the only case that this should fail is if we upsert an account with empty name but this account does not exists in SF.
","06/Apr/21 3:06 PM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat]: what do You mean by ""this account does not exists in SF"" ?
If I understand [~damkowalski] correctly, it is impossible to create an account without a name.","06/Apr/21 3:14 PM;mgiannat;[~mczarnecki] as we discussed:
# We agree that an account cannot be created with an empty name
# The case above should succeed in the case that the account with masted id 01624447 exists in SF.

I will check and come back","06/Apr/21 3:30 PM;mgiannat;Hello the account with masted id 01624447 exists in SF, so I do not find any reason the the event I had shared above fails, could you please investigate

column1: [~jwszolkowski] I bet it is related to OOTB functionality of confirmation of email change. I think we have already been discussing this with other NatCo.

[~damkowalski] FYI","06/Apr/21 3:39 PM;jwszolkowski;[~piwanowski], looks like you are right, I checked that on one user on our test org and mail wasn't change before it was confirmed by old mail owner.

[~mczarnecki], do you want to set up test session and confirm that behaviour or can we close this ticket? ","06/Apr/21 3:42 PM;mczarnecki;[~jwszolkowski] it is rather question to [~mgiannat] on behalf of whom I have created this ticket.
[~mgiannat] please get familiar with analysis provided by [~jwszolkowski] and  let us know on next steps.
","06/Apr/21 3:44 PM;mgiannat;Hello all, is this issue now fixed? Sorry it is not clear from the above","06/Apr/21 3:48 PM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat]: it looks it is working as intended.
[~jwszolkowski] could You please elaborate /instruct/ [~mgiannat]  on how this mechanism works.

","06/Apr/21 3:54 PM;jwszolkowski;It's not the issue, this is the standard behaviour of Salesforce which won't change mail until old owner of mail will confirm the change. It can be bypassed when changing mail manually in SF ([reference
column2: https://help.salesforce.com/articleView?id=000340139&type=1&mode=1]) , but updates via API requires it ([reference
column3: https://trailblazer.salesforce.com/ideaView?id=08730000000kvx1AAA]).","06/Apr/21 3:59 PM;mgiannat;So [~jwszolkowski] in this case when we send an updated mail via the API how the user will confirm this afterwards?","06/Apr/21 4:12 PM;jwszolkowski;[~mgiannat] Sorry, I need to correct myself here. Old email owner only receives mail with notification, mail to confirm this change is send to new email and it needs to be verified within 72h. The user will confirm it by clicking a link in the mail. ","06/Apr/21 4:16 PM;mgiannat;Ok thank you we just clarified this as well in the Arch.call","22/Apr/21 9:14 AM;mgiannat;[~amitkou] please close this, it seems we do not have the rights to close this item",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

column1: After fix, for newly Created contact duplicate of the Consent was removed:

In 360 Interactions , TT_Phone_Number field has wrong label. VAT_ID = 999079906,USSFA-5418,143975,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Done/Fixed,ipasialis,ipasialis,ipasialis,02/Apr/21 4:02 PM,08/Apr/21 4:42 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,08/Apr/21 3:05 PM,,,,0,360SRs,GR,Release3,SFR3S3_SIT,,,,,"There is something strange in the label of tt_phone_number , in the detail section

This is not a bug. This is default way ""Detail View"" renders fields. If a field is an object, then by default it puts it in its own section, hence this gray label. But not to overload you with technical details. Do you want to remove this gray label and have ""TT Phone Number"" just like all other fields?
cc: [~mjodlowski]","06/Apr/21 5:02 PM;ipasialis;TT phone number is an object , regarding Salesforce?
It is a field in our Legace represantation of Interactions.
The same grey field applies for Servirce Requests detail section. Field Owner and Created By , have the same ""problem"".
I would prefer if you treat this as a regular field , similar to all others.","06/Apr/21 5:17 PM;mreznyk;Hi [~ipasialis]
No no, it is an object in JSON response, which is structured in its own way. But as I said, I don't want to overload you with technical details of component's backend, since it can be confusing. :)

As I understood, from UI perspective you don't want this gray label. ""TT Phone number"" should look like other fields (without this gray marker). The same should be applied for ""Owner"" and ""Created By"" in Service Requests, right?","06/Apr/21 5:38 PM;ipasialis;Yes please","08/Apr/21 12:14 PM;pdlugosz;Due to the lack of integration with 360 on GR test env. fix should be verified on SIT/UAT.","08/Apr/21 12:18 PM;ipasialis;Are you going to sent a new package or is it something that you did internally and I can now test it in uat ?","08/Apr/21 12:27 PM;mreznyk;Hi [~ipasialis]

The fix will be deployed through packages: harmonized and GR local.  Harmonized package will contain update in component's backend to prevent sections creation and GR package will contain component config file update enabling usage of that functionality.
I've just checked and the solution is actually already deployed to SITUAT org.
So could you please check and confirm if issue is resolved?

column2: i05udj:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"Υπάρχει κάποια πρόβλεψη για τις μεταφράσεις στο πινακάκι του Presales στο αρχικό UI του mcv?

column1: Αναφέρομαι στα λεκτικά events k opportunities, καθώς τα λεκτικά presales και leads έχουμε συμφωνήσει να παραμείνουν ως έχουν σαν ""δόκιμοι όροι"".
Επιπλέον μπορούμε να δούμε και την ενδεχόμενη μετάφραση των λεκτικών teleappointments
Τα λεκτικά των παρακάτω Statuses αποτελούν δεσμευμένες λέξεις στο Salesforce και δεν συνισταται να αλλαξουν.
Στο παράθυρο των ""δυνατότητων"" τα προιόντα εμφανίζονται ως products, ενώ στα leads το λεκτικό=προινότα. Επισυνάπτω οθόνες.
Παρακαλώ κάνε clear cache και ξαναπροσπάθησε.

* /entitlements","28/Apr/21 12:19 PM;mjodlowski;Could you please clarify why /profiles endpoint is not used for reconciliation?
Profiles reconciliation is used but is limited since /profiles operation does not retrieve /roles & /entitlements that are not assigned to a Profile.
","29/Apr/21 11:59 AM;mjodlowski;So in short you expect to get in:
/roles - Salesforce profiles definition? (ootb PROFILE object) along with permissions assigned to that profile
/entitlements - Salesforce PermissionSet definition (ootb PERMISSION SET) object
without user assignation for those, correct?
It would be ideally to Put in the US actual requirements what data you expect to retrieve from Salesforce.
In terms of the entitlements  we confirm that we want the Permission Sets regardless of the profiles that are assigned to.
In Terms of roles please find below the highlighted entities we would like to retrieve.

!image-2021-04-08-08-49-25-571.png!","08/Apr/21 10:39 AM;jwszolkowski;Please create new record and notice what happens. Initially there's greek values. But later on there's synchronization of record from legacy and value is updated to english one. You are updating it to english value from legacy ","08/Apr/21 10:43 AM;ELeodi;[~ethanopoulou] can you check what happens in legacy?","08/Apr/21 12:37 PM;ethanopoulou;Hello [~jwszolkowski],
In Integration, from previous design, we expect Industry Field Value to be sent to legacy with the English Value.
In UI the display value we expect it to be in Greek.
Is this possible to happen? Display in greek and send/receive in English?
If it is not then we have to perform fix from our side, please let us know as soon as possible.
Please notice, that I asked about that in the first comment under this issue and the answer misled me to spend some time and implement it the way it is.
That was originally my intention to use English values and translations, if the user's locale is Greece and there's a translation provided, then it may come in English and display in Greek.
1. Change mapping back to copy English values of Industry from Industry Occupation Description
2. Add all English Industries to Industry picklist
3. Translate values in Translation Workbench in Salesforce - as far as I know, translations should be handled by DT
But I'm not sure what is your current approach to translation and that could have many implications if it would be introduced for this scenario.

In that terms, we can try with an approach that API names of picklist values API names are in English and labels are in Greek which seems a good alternative for that use case. It would be displayed in Greek, but logic and integration would be based on English values

thank you","08/Apr/21 3:00 PM;ethanopoulou;hello [~jwszolkowski], we will perform the fix from our side. Thank you for your immediate response.

IDM Entitlements / Roles Reconciliation,USSFA-5065,140826,,Bug,Rejected,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Won't Do - Requirement Change,amitkou,george.menikidis,george.menikidis,18/Mar/21 5:50 PM,27/Apr/21 5:16 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,24/Mar/21 12:20 AM,,,,0,GR,IDM,Release3,SFR3C3_SIT,,,,,"/entitlements & /roles are not implemented from mulesoft and data cannot be reconciled to OTE IDM.

However following the approach described in the following confluence ([https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/display/SFA/IDM)] document does not seem feasible since the bulk operations reply in a different thread and not synchronously.
For IDM maintenance endpoint (part of e-sfdc application) We are performing action as described on the IA, meaning:
* Orchestrating calls (batches) to push to API GW entitlements and roles based on retrieved SF data
Bulk operations are part of HAL API REST interface, since it is based on HTTP, it can't respond in different thread. Please note, that :
are a part of NatCo implementation - those are not interfaces on our end.
As per  /entitlements & /roles - those endpoint are not a part of agreed IA, however We have /profiles and /permissions endpoint - please check, if the data returned is up to Your expectations.
For Your convenience I am attaching a postman collection (however You can also check it on Exchange).
If there is a need to develop additional endpoint (which is not a part of IA), than in my opinion it should not be a bug, but user story (change request).
Please provide us on what is Your expectation.
","18/Mar/21 10:02 PM;george.menikidis;What we need is to ""retrieve"" all the entitlements and roles when our IDM requests them.

,18/Mar/21 10:04 PM;mczarnecki;[~george.menikidis] - but isn't a  /profiles endpoint  sufficient for You?","18/Mar/21 10:07 PM;george.menikidis;It could be if  entitlements and roles returned are not necessarily bind with the the profiles ","18/Mar/21 10:10 PM;mczarnecki;[~george.menikidis] could You please elaborate on Your last comment? Do I have a correct understanding, that You would like to fetch all possible roles from SF, not only the ones assigned to returned users?","19/Mar/21 9:39 AM;george.menikidis;Hello [~mczarnecki],

Correct , roles and entitlements.","19/Mar/21 9:42 AM;mczarnecki;Assigning to Wojciech, since such interface do not exist.","23/Mar/21 8:53 PM;wnowosad;Dear, such interface was not in scope of the project, thus we treat this as a new requirement. Pls create a new US if you wish this requirement to be implemented. Thanks. ","23/Mar/21 9:23 PM;mgiannat;Hi [~wnowosad] we would like to avoid any new US in the current timeline since this may lead to more delays. Could you please check with your team and come back with a feedback /date for the above?","24/Mar/21 12:19 AM;wnowosad;Hi [~mgiannat], we will estimate the effort and provide the proposed delivery date, but I cannot accept to keep this as a defect if this is a new requirement. Please accept to transform this ticket to a new US for the sake of proper reporting.

[~mjodlowski], [~mczarnecki], [~kwojtczak]  - pls estiamte the effort connected to implementation of this requirement (both Mule and Salesforce side) and provide by when we could deliver it the earliest.

CC. [~mtzouma], [~amitkou], [~oana.ene]","24/Mar/21 10:12 AM;mgiannat;Hello just to clarify. No new business requirement here. This is a design gap. Please focus to resolve this to avoid any impact to the rollout. [~amitkou] please let me know if it is accepted by the manamagent to open new US for a design gap of the solution","24/Mar/21 10:46 AM;Gabor.Fal;[~wnowosad] [~mczarnecki]  [~mgiannat] Let's make sure I understand what is happening.

* We have a sequence for uploading roles, profiles and ""permission sets"" to IDM. This is a manual task triggered from SalesForce.  This is described here: [https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=54116518]
* The current ticket is asking for this functionality to be triggered by IDM system instead of SalesForce user manually.
If my understanding is correct than I feel this is a new requirement.
At the same it does not seem to be a complex requirement as instead of Salesforce User it should be an API.

Do I see it correctly? Thanks. ","24/Mar/21 10:53 AM;mgiannat;Dear all, it is a design gap, we just need to ""retrieve"" all the entitlements and roles when our IDM requests them. No new business requirement here (this is for reconciliation only) and I believe that this would be easy to resolved.

There is already a process to get all users and their profiles / roles / permissions sets. This can be gotten with a GET call exposed by MuleSoft, IDM can make this API call and retrieve users and their roles / profiles / permissions sets.

Also there is a process to upload from SalesForce to IDM all the metadata about possible roles / permissions / permissions sets etc... That is described here: [https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=54116518]

This later process is triggered manually from SalesForce. If you want to trigger it automatically from IDM than it is a new requirement. ","29/Mar/21 5:57 PM;mgiannat;hello https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-5241 just created

column1: Put more technical details (contact Id, when the test took place)?
Attached relevant logs related to business operation executed?
In the logs I only see problem with consents under individual identified by:
message"": ""Foreign key external ID: gr-ote~1-59h8-1840 not found for field coredt__ExternalId__c in entity Individual"",

","05/Mar/21 8:49 AM;amitkou;[~mjodlowski]would a call help to speed this up? ","05/Mar/21 9:36 AM;amitkou;[~mjodlowski] as i discussedwith [~eanagnostou] we believe all info is provided in the previous/current ticket. lets have a call to seed this up. we are available 11-2 GR time.
We do not have access to PROD environment and you need to help us narrow the problem.

Old ticket was resolved on your side. Based on data from that ticket, can you please confirm that currently the problem is around '*inability to propagate 'Direct marketing/sales activities' consent to Salesforce for contact identified by: 1-59H8-1840*?
If Yes, the root cause of the consent propagation is missing Individual entity. [~damkowalski]
Foreign key external ID: gr-ote~1-59h8-1840 not found for field coredt__ExternalId__c in entity Individual{code}

And sadly my job stops here :( - logic for Individual creation is on Salesforce side. Please verify Post deployment/post migration steps, check if contact being altered has Individual entity created. Retest on contact with Individual present and separately follow up issue related to missing Individual under contact (having first confirm severity of the problem - how many Contacts are in fact missing Individual).

Marek","05/Mar/21 10:26 AM;amitkou;[~mjodlowski]we have closed old ticket just because of your sla rules. issue is not resolved","05/Mar/21 10:40 AM;wnowosad;[~amitkou] the old ticket was closed because it was confirmed as legacy system was not available. ","05/Mar/21 12:35 PM;mtzouma;[~amitkou] please schedule a call for 13:00","05/Mar/21 1:28 PM;amitkou;[~wnowosad] please instruct us next time to open new tickets on time. the network issue happened 18.02.that was the date we should open a new ticket based on your slas and rules.thanks","08/Mar/21 3:39 PM;damkowalski;[~mchojnacki] I am reassigning to You as We agreed. There will be needed migration fix.

The root cause of the issue comes from execution of the migrations steps at 16/2/2021 while migration has been proceeded at 17/2/2021, the flow which is responsible for making correlation between Contact->Individual->Consent has been switched off. The flow was bring back to on at 18/2/2021. This caused an issue with missing identifier, in consequence there is a problem with updating consents from Legacy -> SF.
There might be also a problem with volume of the migrated Individual records, it will be further analyzed by Marcin Chojnacki.
please go to workbench (production environment) -> queries -> SOQL query, execute below commands and send me the results for each of them:
4. SELECT count() FROM Individual where coredt__ExternalId__c = null
5. SELECT count() FROM coredt__Consent__c where coredt__ExternalId__c = null
In case of any question, please do not hesitate to contact me.","08/Mar/21 5:08 PM;atornesakis;Hi [~mchojnacki]
Below are the results for the mentioned queries:

Where did the rest come from, how where they created?","09/Mar/21 10:26 AM;tmichalislis;Looping [~ethanopoulou], [~eanagnostou], [~ipasialis], [~dmyriounis], [~calexandrou] on the issue of  277.709 consent records.","10/Mar/21 9:45 AM;mchojnacki;Hi [~tmichalislis],
please be informed, that there are much more records than were migrated because of integration processes that are working in the background.

With regard to the solution, we discussed it and we are currently working on this as it must be applied in the most efficient and safest way. I will keep You updated.","11/Mar/21 10:20 AM;tmichalislis;[~mchojnacki] can the integration processes populate the External Id of the Individuals when they are creating them?
Do we need to migrate one Individual per migrated Contact? Will this solve the problem?
We can prepare and provide new files PROD_00X for ContactIndividual and Individual from legacy data.","11/Mar/21 11:55 AM;mjodlowski;Alex,
Please note we cannot process this issue as Bug. Since you opted for loading Individuals, relevant salesforce automations were selectively disabled to ensure this would be possible.
Commercials aside, this is change which requires unplanned activities on our side. Please convert this Bug to User Story.","11/Mar/21 1:21 PM;tmichalislis;[~mjodlowski]
Do we need to migrate one Individual per migrated Contact? Will this solve the problem?
We can prepare and provide files DRY_00X and PROD_00X for ContactIndividual and Individual from legacy data.
Since there are so many Individuals created automatically in SF for migrated Contacts, should we delete all these Individual records that do not have External Id?

I am afraid that, since there is a M:M relationship with Contacts, there will be 2 Individuals per migrated Contact if we do not delete these records.","12/Mar/21 11:52 AM;dmyriounis;[~mjodlowski] [~mchojnacki] We migrated Individuals with ExternalIDs, now the counts are
SELECT count() FROM Individual where coredt__ExternalId__c<>null
SELECT count()  FROM Individual where coredt__ExternalId__c=nullSELECT count()  FROM Individual where coredt__ExternalId__c=null
So we have two individuals per Contact, we want to delete those that do not have ExternalID(null). What is the best way to do it?

Thank you in advance. ","12/Mar/21 3:49 PM;mjodlowski;Please export Ids of the salesforce objects, and use Hard Delete Data Loader option. ensure PRE steps are executed, *use data migration user and verify procedure on SITUAT)*","12/Mar/21 3:58 PM;dmyriounis;[~mjodlowski] can we schedule a call and guide us step by step? We need to be 100% sure here.

cc [~ampoura] [~amitkou]","12/Mar/21 4:38 PM;tmichalislis;Hi [~mjodlowski], hard delete on Individuals will delete the records in this table but I am afraid that it will create orphans in the intersection table between Contacts and Individuals.
How will we handle these records?","16/Mar/21 5:03 PM;mjodlowski;There is no intersection table between contacts and individuals. You are good to go.","16/Mar/21 5:16 PM;dmyriounis;[~mjodlowski]
can you help us with the steps?
# We run the following query and export all the IDs
SELECT id FROM Individual where coredt__ExternalId__c=null
# We use Data Loader and Hard Delete option
Correct? Do we need something else?
cc [~ampoura]","16/Mar/21 5:27 PM;mjodlowski;[~dmyriounis] - to remove orphan Individuals:
Use Data Loader Export option with the following SOQL query (may take a while):
Select Id, CreatedBy.Name, coredt__ExternalId__c from Individual where Id not in (select IndividualId from Contact)
Once you have CSV file with Ids, *having executed PRE Migration steps,* use Hard Delete functionality for deleting the orphan objects.
Please verify first on SITUAT, confirm no platform events are generated, and afterwards proceed with PROD run.
Afterwards please run one more export to confirm for all contacts, Individuals externalId is equal Contacts externalId
Select Name, Individual.coredt__ExternalId__c, coredt__ContactExternalId__c from Contact
","16/Mar/21 5:37 PM;amitkou;[~wnowosad]","16/Mar/21 5:38 PM;dmyriounis;[~mjodlowski] I believe that you are missing something here.
SELECT id from Individual where coredt__ExternalId__c=null returns 273392 total records. These Individuals have coredt__ExternalId__c = null.
We want to perform a mass delete here. I suggest we schedule a call tomorrow and clarify this.
[~amitkou] [~ampoura]","17/Mar/21 2:58 PM;dmyriounis;Almost the 95% of Individuals was successfully deleted.
We still have some Individuals that cannot be deleted because they are assigned to specific Leads

column1: From the logs i see that the token now seems ok:
Let's retest and investigate together in the call
# Version without token cache successfully tested in PROD (360 view working, content acquisition not working)
# Misconfiguration of API gateway resolved during call (wrong internal endpoint)
# Successful response was observed during retest after reconfiguration of API Gateway. But problem started to appear on other APIs (/customerManagement/v4/customers)
# Deloitte restored Token cache on UAT (release 1.1.0 version) - no change in behavior observed.
# Error was not reproduced sending very same request to IBM API Gateway from different client.
After investigating the issue, we observed that 1 API call reached ICM the last hours, where the response was 401 Unauthorized.
For the other APIs though, we can find the relevant API event records.
For example, for Customer Management API we have
14 successful API calls and 5 API Calls where we get 401 Unauthorized
*We have observed that by comparing the latest 200 OK and latest 401 Unauthorized Events for /cosmote/production/customerManagement/v4/customers endpoint,*
*in the success case the client_id field is autocompleted with the client id that we used to acquire access token, while the client id is empty in the failure case.*
I am attaching the *successful event record*:
In the probe tests, we were not able to catch the 401 unauthorized API calls.
Prior of retrying, and given the fact that while using your token we are able to get 200 OK when we try from Postman,
[~mjodlowski] let me ask you: The communication from Mulesoft to publicservices:6443 is direct, or there is any other system between them?

# Legacy ID – it cannot be loaded into Salesforce, but it’s required for migration purpose.

I assume we will not migrate any history for Notes.","01/Mar/21 4:14 PM;tmichalislis;Hi [~mjodlowski],

How are we going to migrate these Notes? Using the known mulesoft migration tool or through Data Loader? If Mulesoft will be used for migration then we need the exact csv name and column names for the files as they were provided for all the previous entities following the same procedure.

What is the type and length for each of the fields you describe? Which one is optional and whish one is mandatory? Notes in Legacy do not have a Title field. If this is a required field we may need to fabricate it.
elatedEntity"" is a field that we need to populate with one of these values?

A lot of the notes are in blobs that have texts including CR LF that we need to maintain in the format of the migrated text in Salesforce. How do you expect us to escape the text to maintain the document format?
Thank you","01/Mar/21 8:22 PM;tmichalislis;Attached version 0.1 of the mapping document","02/Mar/21 1:47 PM;tmichalislis;Attached version 0.2

[~mjodlowski] Title is required or optional? Is it unique?","03/Mar/21 1:56 PM;amitkou;[~mjodlowski]please give as an indication when we will receive your feedback. [~wnowosad] This is a risk for our GR plan for this US","05/Mar/21 3:23 AM;mjodlowski;[~tmichalislis] - template attached. As I had explained, notes loading is not quite easy process, as there is no External Id of the Note. Migration Tool needs to be extended (estimation pending) as we are still busy with GR CRs. Two objects are created:

* Content Note - actual note, sadly TItle might be needed (since we cannot extend this object with migration Id, only INSERT operation will be possible (not upsert). Please take this into account. Upon Creation, SF ID will be stored by Migration Tool for next action

* Content Document Link - Once Note is created in SF, it needs to be linked to parent object - verify LoV for type of object. We assume relation will be build using Master Id (of course Tenant Id we will handle as in other objects. Sadly this operation is only possible knowing SF ID of the note created - *this complexity was not foreseen.*

[~mtzouma], [~amitkou], [~mchojnacki], [~micsadowski]","05/Mar/21 9:07 AM;tmichalislis;"" Content Note - actual note, sadly TItle might be needed (since we cannot extend this object with migration Id""
So, [~mjodlowski] Title should be considered unique and acts as a record Id?
Sadly this operation is only possible knowing SF ID of the note created - *this complexity was not foreseen.""*

**Hi [~mjodlowski] so how do you propose us to obtain this entity's SF ID from where it is stored and how will we associate it with our records in Legacy? The export file from the migration tool will provide pairs of external Ids and SF Ids for us to post-process?

Finally, [~mjodlowski] you have set the Note's *Body* to be a string of 255 characters. This must be extended. The column from which we fetch data is LONG. For Teleappontments, the Summary column is defined as a *textarea of 32768 chars*. Can we do the same for Body?","05/Mar/21 11:03 AM;mjodlowski;Title would only be used to store Legacy ID info - not as External Id. I propose [ID] Title form - it will be shown in UI too.
We would produce two usual reports:
# Note loading report (with Legacy Id as businessId and SF ID for the note)
# Note linking report (with Note Legacy Id +'~' +  object id as businessId, and SFID of the link from salesforce)
As for Body, *we will adjust it.* Content field of the Note will be used: [https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.object_reference.meta/object_reference/sforce_api_objects_contentnote.htm]

Mobile Device Management (MDM)-Salesforce,USSFA-4709,133541,,Story,US Blocked,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,,ipasialis,alloukas,dmyriounis,23/Feb/21 5:16 PM,22/Apr/21 11:28 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,,,,0,cluster2,Salesforce,,,,,,,"For R3: Access from mobile Salesforce applications (IOS, Android) will be allowed only using our local Mobile Device Management solution. We are currently using VMware AirWatch.

MDM allows us to control the device or the Salesforce application (depending on whether the device is corporate or personal - different policies exist), so that data is deleted in case the Mobile Phone is lost, stolen, etc. and there is a risk of data breach. MDM allows you to install the Salesforce app in the WORK directory, where all the company's apps are available. All apps are automatically deleted from the directory with the employee's unenrollment.

column1: VPN monitoring for GR,USSFA-4697,131991,,Story,US Blocked,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,,mczarnecki,mgiannat,mgiannat,19/Feb/21 10:19 AM,18/Aug/21 11:29 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,,,,0,,,,,,,,,Monitoring notifications for VPN failures as per our email communucation,,mczarnecki,mgiannat,mjodlowski,oana.ene,wnowosad,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"24/Feb/21 1:18 PM;oana.ene;FW RE00280959 - VPN issue - Deutsche Telekom AG MoM.msg;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/105902/FW+RE00280959+-+VPN+issue+-+Deutsche+Telekom+AG+MoM.msg",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,19/Feb/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,36.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2
Unfortunately, due to restrictions related to scheduler functionality, previous approach was not going to work and the overall complexity would raise above current proposal.
My current proposal (already tested and proven to be working) is to introduce SERVER NOTIFICATIONS (internal mule event messaging) and listen to internal connectivity events.

Whenever Mule is loosing connectivity (no matter which component), the notification will be triggered - as the result, Java listener will manually trigger a flow invoking CloudHub connector to produce CH notification.
CH connector will send Platform notifications (based on java generated payload).
*Unfortunately this solution is more complex and overall effort will raise to 2.5MD of development, which gives in total 4,5MD (management/testing).*
Please let me know if it's acceptable.
Complexity justification for the solution can be found here:
Please note, that this is not a OOTB functionality and analysis was a must for such use case.
[~mgiannat] could You please confirm acceptance of effort estimation?
[~wnowosad]: could You please guide me on how to proceed with such change request?

","24/Feb/21 9:46 AM;wnowosad;Changed the inegration estimates according to the comment above","24/Feb/21 10:13 AM;mjodlowski;I do confirm this solution is more robust, not consuming Mule resource (in contrary to scheduler based solution).

column1: As the *next step* I'd suggest start investigation into why the message (ACK or Acknowledgment) from *legacy* was sent +with the old Phone number+ (302541077590) instead of the new phone number (302111111111).
I'd say that the problem is not that 2 messages were sent to SF, but the fact that the 1st message had still the old phone number in it.
This is roughly the overall timeline
# [] - synch event is sent to legacy with phone = 302111111111
# [] - legacy sends ACK message to SF with old phone number
# *[10:13]* - SF receives update request and among other updates changes phone to 302541077590 based on the received old value in the ACK message from legacy
# [] - [~ELeodi]  takes the 1st screenshot of Account History
# [] - synch event is sent to legacy with phone = 302541077590 and most likely ignored because of masterTimestamp (this is correct)
# [] - legacy makes processes the change of phone number from 302541077590 to 302111111111. This triggers sync to SF.
# *[10:17]* - SF receives update request and updates phone to 302111111111
# [10:18] - [~ELeodi] creates this Jira ticket with the screenshot of the state from 10:13
# [10:31] - [~ELeodi] takes and attaches another screenshot where the message/update from 10:17 is already visible
Please continue investigation in legacy.","19/Feb/21 3:58 PM;eanagnostou;[~mgiannat] Phone number is not included in ACK message from legacy.
Could you please check if the ACK message to SF contains phone number and how it is filled?","19/Feb/21 4:04 PM;mgiannat;Christo Evangelia seems to have right, i see

In the ACK from Bus we received the whole structure containing also the contacts for this customer , as you can see from the attached , CIO type contact also has the same number (302541077590) for HomePhone that is why it can be found in the ack we send to mulesoft in that specific contact.
The MainPhoneNumber, the field changed in this specific flow is empty in the callback from BUS (see attached) so it is not propagated to mulesoft

[^ACK_FROM_BUS.xml]","19/Feb/21 4:21 PM;mgiannat;Thanks! Therefore Mulesoft has to find out where the value comes from (perhaps from contact list entry where contacts[relatedParty.role = ""CIO"" and type=""phone""]).

column1: 1. In SFDC go to Contact/Account which was synchronized with Legacy (so it should have *coredt__ExternalAccountId__c/* *coredt__ContactExternalId__c* accordingly).
2. Update any OUT field which should trigger platform event from SFDC.

Remove VAT validation from Account where RT=Competitor.,USSFA-4678,130794,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Done/Fixed,pdlugosz,pdlugosz,pdlugosz,16/Feb/21 6:31 PM,23/Feb/21 9:28 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,23/Feb/21 9:28 AM,,,,0,,,,,,,,,"Tested on: https://ote--grotsptest.lightning.force.com/ as Triantafilia Kiritsi
Validation for VAT number is triggered during creation of Competitor account (on which there's no VAT ID field) so it doesn't have a sense:
After fix, VAT Number isn't validated anymore during creation Account where RT=Competitor:

Authentication/Authorization solution for SFA HAL APIs,USSFA-4676,130739,,Story,US Blocked,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,,mgiannat,mgiannat,mgiannat,16/Feb/21 3:05 PM,12/May/21 7:56 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,,,,0,April,GR,,,,,,,"We had received some comments from COSMOTE IT Architecture regarding the SFA Authentication/Authorization we had implemented so far and the feedback is that we have to proceed to some improvements based on the initial discussions for SFA.
More specifically our IT Architecture proposes to proceed with *+JWT OAuth provider & OpenID+* as per attached.
Although this affects mostly GR implementation, will *+also affect client side+* (in this case Mulesoft). More specifically:

*_The call for accessing HAL APIs, will be the same. The same body, headers, etc. Only the value of the Authorization header will change: until today it is ""Bearer access_token_value"", and this will change to_*
*_""Bearer jwt_value""._* *_On the other hand, the API call for getting the access token and jwt will include +more changes+._*
*_Up to now the API call for OAuth provider has these parameters:_*
*_The scope will change to openid and also the url of the oauth provider endpoint needs to be changed, to point to the new openid provider._*

column2: i03po7:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,16/Feb/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,edimaki,Gabor.Fal,mczarnecki,mgiannat,mjodlowski,mtzouma,oana.ene,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"16/Feb/21 3:08 PM;mtzouma;[~oana.ene] this is a CR

column1: cc:[~amitkou]","16/Feb/21 3:26 PM;Gabor.Fal;[~mtzouma] [~mgiannat] Do you guys need OpneID connect and named credentials for calling the API? ","16/Feb/21 3:31 PM;Gabor.Fal;Also please note HAL auth concept:

","16/Feb/21 3:38 PM;edimaki;[~oana.ene] & [~Gabor.Fal] is there a user story describing the Authentication/Authorization process? Our architecure team insists that the approach we as GR Integration have followed is against a centrally agreed solution. Since we did not have a user story when we were implementing we relied on the Deloitte proposal and followed a simpler authentication process.. now we are expected to change this... could you please share any prev knowledge on the matter ?","16/Feb/21 5:26 PM;mjodlowski;Gabor, can you please have a look?
I see changes mostly on Onboarding API by adding:
For this We need to be supplied with extra params (username, password).
I do not fully understand the change for API GW:
value of the Authorization header will change: until today it is ""Bearer access_token_value"", and this will change to ""Bearer jwt_value"".
Will We be using still the same token returned from Onboarding API? If Yes, than I don't see any differences with HAL auth concept.

","17/Feb/21 10:24 AM;mgiannat;Hello this change mostly affects the internal GR implementation and the way that our endpoints will be accessed be Mulesoft as per Jira description. So I assume that no major impact will be introduced in Mulesoft side.","17/Feb/21 2:34 PM;Gabor.Fal;[~mgiannat] Can you help me here a bit. We already use ClientID and Client secret and they are kept in the updated exmaple also. So I am wondering what is the need for the username / password. (marked in Green). Isn't this redundant? Thanks.
This is what I refer to:
*_response_type: id_token_*","17/Feb/21 2:39 PM;mgiannat;Hi Gabor, this is related with the guidelines from OTE architecture. The username / password will be maintained in our internal LDAP.

For this case this will be a system user, for example ""Mulesoft User"". Indeed maybe this add some overhead in this case but this will help us to have a common approach for our implementation for SFA and for other OTE projects. [~d.sarlanis] please add your comments as well","18/Feb/21 1:34 PM;Gabor.Fal;[~mgiannat]

What API are we talking about? As per HAL guidelines first there should be a call to the onboarding API. This call is to be made using API Key. In body credentials need to be passed. These can be username / password. As a response onboarding API is giving token to access other APIs.

So are you changing something on Onboarding API? Or other APIs? ","18/Feb/21 1:38 PM;mgiannat;Hi Gabor, this change is related with our COSMOTE API Gateway which is common for SFA and other COSMOTE projects.","18/Feb/21 4:55 PM;mgiannat;@Gabor let me check this again internally and I will come back","30/Mar/21 5:59 PM;oana.ene;[~mgiannat] - this story even dough it is cluster 3 it is not estimated. Do you expect anything from deloitte here?
[~Gabor.Fal]","30/Mar/21 6:03 PM;mgiannat;Hello, it is on our side. Please remove it from Cluster 3 - current status is _not planned_

sfa address automatically updated,USSFA-4663,129408,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Done/Fixed,ELeodi,ELeodi,ELeodi,12/Feb/21 5:34 PM,23/Feb/21 2:15 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,23/Feb/21 2:11 PM,,,,0,FUT,GR,PROD,,,,,,"on production, every time i change something on an integrated account, when account syncs, on History i see that changes are made on SFA Address

on account ASSET TRAVEL vat 800813443 external account id SF-77E59CA6-2BC0-11e7-A764-000000000000 i changed phone number 4 times. and every time it synced , a ""-"" was automatically added in sfa address by data integration user
on account ΚΑΡΔΑΡΑΣ ΝΙΚΟΛΑΟΣ ΤΟΥ ΙΩΑΝΝΗ vat 007567129 external account id SF-02545528 i changed phone once and sfa address zip code was automatically changed upon sync by data integration user

column2: i03hin:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,12/Feb/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,eanagnostou,ELeodi,mgiannat,tmichalislis,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"21/Feb/21 11:55 PM;eanagnostou;[~mgiannat] Could you please split address to street name and street number so as not modify logic at legacy systems?","22/Feb/21 12:23 PM;mgiannat;Please provide the rules","22/Feb/21 12:34 PM;tmichalislis;#  When BUS receives an Address from HAL the Street Number field is always empty. (on) Street Number should always be substituted with a dash ""-""

column1: # When HAL receives an *Address* and a *Street Number* from BUS (source UCM), before sending it to SF, two (2) cases may occur:
## Street Num has a value *different from a single dash* ""-"". (on) HAL must concatenate Address and Street Num and sent it to SF
## Street Num *has dash* ""-"" as only value. (on) HAL *must NOT concatenate Address and Address Num. Just* sent Address to SF.
[~mgiannat] [~hkaragioka] [~eanagnostou] Please review and comment.","22/Feb/21 1:54 PM;mgiannat;UAT ready tommorow midday
[~eanagnostou] please organize the testing in order to speed up the prod deployment ","23/Feb/21 10:01 AM;mgiannat;[~hkaragioka] when ready pls assign to [~eanagnostou]  for testing.
Thank you","23/Feb/21 1:00 PM;mgiannat;Ready for testing at uat","23/Feb/21 2:11 PM;ELeodi;For account LONDON CITY vat 855310068 I changed phone number and no dash was added to sfa address
same for account THE OTHERS vat 900310068 I changed phone number and no dash was added to sfa address

For that reason, I am assigning the issue to Deloitte Team, in order to provide feedback and if it is necessary to arrange a follow-up meeting.
Thank you","12/Feb/21 9:58 PM;mczarnecki;Retry logic in fact might slow down synchronisation of events with same masterId.
Let me quickly summarise conclusions from joint meetings with [~Gabor.Fal] (architecture alignment calls) from the beginning of the project:
# When incoming events are not causing errors (they are valid from business perspective) - than synchronisation is working in real time
# When an invalid event is received - than application will put it to retry queue with 1 minute delay, flagging at the same time master id and master version id (for lock purposes)

# From this point, master id is locked for all incoming events having master version id greater than the one noted (this is enforcing right order of processing), so every incoming event will be put directly to retry Q with 1 min delay
# At the same time, retry logic fetches record by record and checks whether current record is not locked (by checking master version id and master id of locked event) :
## if current event have greater master version id as locked event, than it is put to the end of the Q with 1 min delay
## if current event have same version id than it is reprocessed
### if error occurs, than retry count is incremented by one and item goes to the end of the Q with 1 min delay
### if item is reprocessed successfully than lock is removed and retry processes next one
# Retry logic tries to reprocess 5 times
# If there are numerous invalid events, than retry logic will block events with same master id for long period (greater size of the Q -> greater processing)

Summarizing: We should treat invalid events mostly as occasional rather than normal situation, since by going to retry there will be extra latency introduced and events with same master id might wait in the Q while each and every element is reprocessed 5 times. If the Q size is large, than moving from start to end will add extra latency.
[~Gabor.Fal], please correct me if I have missed something.","14/Feb/21 1:00 PM;mgiannat;[~mczarnecki] could you please clafiry the specific case based on the provided logs to [~nfragkomanolis]?
What caused the delay in this specific case? Please share the events list with timestamps as per GR's analysis above.

PS Not sure when the above was discussed but generally sounds normal. However let's further discuss this to have a common understanding about the max delay that could be observed.","15/Feb/21 12:47 PM;mgiannat;related with https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-4666 as well

3. ATTENTION: This step is required after any change to the flow Acquire Consents flow. (for GR it's Account Consents GR flow)
Setup → Flows → Acquire Consents → Localize and click Decision 'Duplicate detected?' (bottom left) → check if second condition is
If it is {!LoopOverConsentSettingsToDetectDuplicates.coredt__IsActive__cNotFound} equals {!$GlobalConstant.False} please correct it to condition above, save &
activate flow without any other changes
I've added information in brackets in the third one as GR uses GR-specific Acquire Consents flow.
In addition please verify if in Setup -> Custom Settings -> Webservice Details: there's Consent Acquisition record populated
