column1: ","29/Jan/21 12:08 PM;marian.grofcik;But this opportunity is already in Agreement status, which means user does not have permission to edit the opportunity -> you can not add products to oportunity in such stage. I know it sounds a bit non-logical, yet by the time the opportunity is created, it will also be immediately be synced -> and immediately locked. Thus you won't be able to e.g. add products to such opportunity, because it is already locked (because this can't be done before, technically the oppty has to be first created, only then you can start adding products...but in this scenario, it would be created as locked). ","29/Jan/21 12:11 PM;lenka.furuczova;This opportunity is in Agreement stage, but as you can see in the attachment, i changed stage into Qualified Lead before saving.

Btw. The same error appears, when i'm trying to clone SK_SFAFFFinancieOpp15 - which is in stage Qualified Lead.","29/Jan/21 12:53 PM;marian.grofcik;[~lenka.furuczova] thanks, I didn't see that, this is indeed strange.
Indeed seems lika a bug, the oppty can not be cloned with related Products (it works fine if I clone without Products)
even as system admin I received an error:
* An error prevented us from saving the new record. Please try again. ","01/Feb/21 5:40 PM;kwojtczak;[~j.karel], [~marian.grofcik],
This error is caused by unique ID on Opporutnity Line Item. Since Clone button is OOTB and was not requested in User Stories, we will take the button off the layout.
* ""Clone with related"" button is not visible on Opportunity. - *{color:#00875a}PASSED{color}*

column2: i02sjr:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"In today call we tried the following in Non-Prod Environment:

column1: We started with both tunnels UP -> Connectivity checked from both sides OK.
* Bring primary (working) tunnel down -> Connectivity checked from both sides OK.

* Bring tunnel UP again -> Connectivity from Cosmote side OK {color:#de350b}Connectivity from MuleSoft side NOT OK traffic does not reach our side (checking with our logging tool when telnet test performed from MuleSoft nothing is logged in our side){color}.
* Reset secondary tunnel -> Connectivity checked from both sides OK.

From our side routing is based in metric (if primary tunnel is down, we use the secondary when the primary is up we prefer this tunnel again) mulesoft have to check that also from their side.",,,,,27/Jan/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,adesiniot,amitkou,edimaki,mczarnecki,mgiannat,tpsallid,tpsallidas,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"27/Jan/21 4:02 PM;amitkou;[~mtzouma] [~wnowosad]","28/Jan/21 4:02 PM;mczarnecki;Ticket has been opened directly to mulesoft since the error is not on application side:
Your Support Case [00280959: Secondary VPN tunnel not accepting traffic while primary goes down
","02/Feb/21 5:25 PM;mczarnecki;[~Gabor.Fal] FYI - it seems that VPN static routing prevents us from utilising backup tunnel

I see you have created Anypoint VPN tunnels with Static routing. When using static routing and you wish to configure both tunnels to be active/UP at the same time, then it is necessary that you enable or allow asymmetric routing on your VPN device.

The reason for this is because the return traffic from our side can return via any of the tunnels. If your device does not allow asymmetric routing it is likely to drop this traffic. I believe this is what is happening here so please check this.
If you create Anypoint VPN with dynamic routing (uses BGP) then you are able to dictate and influence the return path selection by configuring BGP with AS PATH prepending.
Please refer to the documentation link below for more information
Should you have any further questions please let me know.","03/Feb/21 9:08 AM;amitkou;From Thodoro Psallidas:
‘Asymmetric routing is enabled from our side the problem as I described it in the ticket is the following:
When the second tunnel is established, we perform the following tests:
FROM COSMOTE to MuleSoft ping is *successfu*l
FROM MuleSoft to COSMOTE ping *FAILS* (I don’t see any traffic arriving my gateway)

I have to reset the tunnels for the above to work.’","09/Feb/21 6:43 PM;mczarnecki;[~Gabor.Fal]: please decide, whether We move to BGP to have asymmetric routing enabled or if We stay with static routing with restrictions related to primary/secondary tunnels.

Please note that BGP  is fully configured on client side and propagated to CloudHub - thus in case of misconfiguration  it can cause potential conflicts with other static ips in the VPC (causing other Natcos to loose connectivity)","11/Feb/21 9:14 AM;amitkou;for documentation purposes:

# Attempts to reproduce the issue, that originally was tested in the past with Theodoros and happened yesterday on PROD  failed (We tried on both environments UAT/PROD) – VPN connectivity during tests was maintained. Scenario was as follows:
# Traffic is still sent without any problems
# [~tpsallid]  confirmed, that device is supporting and in fact using asymmetric routing

column2: mailto:dtufino@mulesoft.com] presented a chart with VPN1 and VPN2 tunnel states in time period that We were experiencing problems

column1: # There was a period, when both tunnels were down (15 mins or so)
# After mentioned period, both tunnels were UP – but no data visible on the graph
# We have identified, that the application lost completely connectivity yesterday, somewhere around 14:17 CET
# Connectivity was lost till today’s morning, when [~tpsallid] reset the tunnel
# There was no traffic visible after 14:17 CET (while it should – at least kafka heartbeat every 1 min) - [@dtufino@mulesoft.com
column2: mailto:dtufino@mulesoft.com] to raise a case with AWS and update a support ticket with their findings
mailto:mczarnecki@deloittece.com] to attach VPN client logs to the case

column1: # Mulesoft is recommending BGP, which can be a solution not causing potential IP conflicts, if used only by single NatCo (static routes are always preferred over BGP advertising, thus even in case of conflict it will not break  other NatCos connectivity)","16/Feb/21 11:32 AM;mczarnecki;There is a suggestion from Mulesoft, could You please verify:
From our sample config (which you can download from Anypoint portal) you can see it under section:
! Static routing does not allow for failover of traffic between tunnels. If there is a problem with one of the tunnels, we would want to failover the traffic to the second tunnel.
! This is done by using ""gwdetect"" in FortiGate.
! The gwdetect command will ping the other end of the tunnel to check if the tunnel is up.
! If the pings fail, it will remove the static route from the routing table, and the second route in the table will become active.
! NOTE: The command ""config router gwdetect""'"" has been removed in FortiOS 5.2 and replaced with ""config system link-monitor"".
Please verify if that has been already configured.

{code}","25/Feb/21 10:51 AM;tpsallid;After our session where we try to recreate the problem with no luck, we perform a change at 12/2 from our side creating an SD-WAN interface and assign to that both VPN Tunnels (for each PROD & UAT) after that I can see that PROD Tunnel-1 is flapped at 21/2 & 23/2 with no connectivity problems reported.
We have to monitor the activity of VPN connection to be sure that the problem is solved.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

column2: i02pnj:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,25/Jan/21 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,ELeodi,kwojtczak,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"25/Jan/21 11:48 PM;kwojtczak;[~ELeodi] If i will do Type mandatory on global action It will be mandatory also on other objects. Is that ok?

column1: And also do you mind Task field which now is not on the layout or Subject field wich does have the same values as Type
Once answered, please unblock the US ","26/Jan/21 12:49 PM;ELeodi;hi [~kwojtczak]
for your first question yes we agree

for your second question we need to have Type field as mandatory on tasks and have it also available (and mandatory) on the “New task” action on the Activities component. Field Subject should remain as it is right now.
cc:[~mtzouma] ,[~tkiritsi]","26/Jan/21 2:25 PM;kwojtczak;All clear now. Thank you [~ELeodi]

After further investigation I am coming back with another question. I would like to mention that USSFA-789 does only apply to Account changes (even though the excel file markes Task as well). Nevertheless I understand that field _*Type*_ is required based on Confluence on Task layout, however when it comes to adding this field into other objects than Task (e.g. Accounts, Contacts...)  we need to use a feature which is called Global Action. Since it's configured on a harmonized level, if we want to add a field related only to one NatCo it requires the creation of new Global Actions and changes in an assignment in every layout that we have in the org. Finally, it results in at least 5 hours of work.
So the question is if do you really need this field on the New Task section on other objects? I want to mention that field type has the same values as field Summary.
","27/Jan/21 5:12 PM;ELeodi;hi [~kwojtczak] , since it's this complicated we can live without it. thank you!
can you please close this bug? i don't have close button

Custom notifications marked as mobile should be turn on for Mobile Apps,USSFA-4458,123318,92904,Sub-task,New,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,,,milipinski,milipinski,18/Jan/21 3:56 PM,06/Aug/21 5:12 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,,,,0,technical-debt,,,,,,,,"Custom notifications that are marked as mobile (Custom Notifications Section in setup) should be turn on to be used in mobile apps: iOS and Android (Notification Delivery Settings in setup)
Notifications created within coredt package should be tracked in coredt repo, nopkg part.
Notifications created in local package should be tracked in natco specific repo.

GR Security Requirements for Salesforce Mobile Access ,USSFA-4457,123315,,Task,New,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,,alloukas,alloukas,alloukas,18/Jan/21 3:33 PM,02/Mar/21 3:51 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,,,,0,GR,R3,,,,,,,"For R3: Access from mobile Salesforce applications (IOS, Android) will be allowed only using our local Mobile Device Management solution. We are currently using VMware AirWatch.

For R2 Go Live: Until MDM access is enforced, mobile access from unmanaged devices must be allowed only with the addition of 2factor authentication (provided by Salesforce). ",,alloukas,amitkou,damkowalski,dmyriounis,Gabor.Fal,ipasialis,marian.grofcik,oana.ene,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-4601,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,18/Jan/21 11:59 PM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2

column1: - we agreed that until SSO is in place (thus MDM can be enabled), you will restrict IP range of login to those that are within internal network. This by itself also assures that mobile devices can connect within this IP range (so - no need to setup any additional security) ","21/Jan/21 10:34 AM;amitkou;CC [~alloukas]: please review comment from Marian. would that be ok?","21/Jan/21 12:15 PM;alloukas;Ok - if the authentication endpoint for mobile devices is common with browser authentication and maintain the same IP range restrictions.

column1: For these 2 accounts you provided last modified date by integration user is 8/1/2021 and not 14/1/2021 (i was trying things on bonora and now it looks updated by me)","15/Jan/21 1:43 PM;egourdoumpa;Issue, has been assigned to HAL team for further investigation, based on relevant email communication.
As per my knowledge terminated status is mapped to NEVER_EXISTED at Salesforce. Could you please verify / provide feedback?","15/Jan/21 5:49 PM;nfragkomanolis;Hello
The mapping is handled at Salesforce side. Mulesoft maps status 1 to 1.
[~jwszolkowski] Can you please check it on your side?

I can just confirm what was said before - this is a data issue. Those records were created in November 2020, most probably back then values or mapping were different. As now mapping is correct, the new Account will have proper status. Please check the status of fresh Accounts. In those terms can we close the ticket?
[~mtzouma], [~ELeodi]","18/Jan/21 3:27 PM;ELeodi;[~egourdoumpa] please let me know how we will proceed with this.

","18/Jan/21 4:29 PM;jwszolkowski;In meanwhile I realized that I misunderstood situation with mapping, I asked migration team if new records would have proper status. ","19/Jan/21 12:41 PM;jwszolkowski;[~egourdoumpa], [~ELeodi], [~mtzouma],
Could you please help me with understanding that?
What's current values on legacy side? Is that terminated, or NEVER_EXISTED?
If there are only NEVER_EXISTED -> no steps need to be performed, migration and integration will handle that and we just have obsolete data.

If it's terminated and it's expected to map it to NEVER_EXISTED in SF, then migration and integration need to cover that scenario. Is that described in any US in Jira or Confluence, if so could you provide reference?
the bug was raised, because for the two above mentioned accounts the Overall Status value should be 'NEVER_EXISTED' and not 'Terminated'.
Hereby, the relevant confluence links regarding the status information:

I'm aware of it. The question was what is on legacy side. In SF we have only three pointed values, but fields are not restricted, so if anything comes from migration / integration then it's accepted. That's why I'm asking what values are on Legacy side. If there are records with 'terminated' value and you expect to map it to other value, then it should be described in some US. If on legacy there are no records with terminated status anymore, then it's data issue.
Kind regards","20/Jan/21 4:04 PM;egourdoumpa;[~ELeodi], I am assigning the issue to you, in order to verify the case of Once_Existed status value, based on the latest data process.
Thank you","21/Jan/21 8:46 AM;ELeodi;[~egourdoumpa] once_existing status doesn't appear on Salesforce for account SF-FE56E811-8BD6-11e8-B8D4-000C00000000

for account THE SIXTH SENSE , vat 808310060 , external account id SF-7CF74309-518D-11eb-B5D2-000C29210E56 and SFA Contact ΤΖΟΕΛ ΟΣΜΕΝΤ [https://ote--situat.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Contact/0031X00000dLhwKQAS/view] i completed  consent process and Salesforce contact consent status is rejected.
this happened more than 2 hours ago but i still don't see the contact anonymized on Salesforce
first of all I wish you all the best for the New Year!

According to the above contact (ΤΖΟΕΛ ΟΣΜΕΝΤ) for which [~ELeodi] initiated consent (reject) from SF, yesterday, we identified the following, based on BUS logs (please find them [^ICM_getCustomerRequest.xml]attached):
* we received an updateCustomer request from SF at 1/12/2021 11:39:14.173000 AM
* callback from UCM received at 1/12/2021 11:43:30.850000 AM
* callback was sent to Salesforce at 1/12/2021 11:43:31.652000 AM

In the meantime, a getCustomer request from ICM was received at 1/12/2021 11:39:41.599000 AM, in order to get the email address. However, the email address was sent to ICM as empty, because UCM has not been informed by the updateCustomer request from SF, yet.
The conclusion from the above is that SF should not allow the user to initiate consent process for a contact, which has not been synchronized with the legacy systems.
The consent process from SF can be triggered only for those contacts that have been already synchronized with the legacy systems.
Could you please check from your side and keep us informed?

Thank you ","13/Jan/21 12:58 PM;mtzouma;[~jkomorowska] Joanna, please for your input here.","13/Jan/21 6:32 PM;jkomorowska;[~jwszolkowski] can you please help here - user should not be able to start consent process if Contact is not confirmed in legacy first","15/Jan/21 1:09 PM;jwszolkowski;Hi,

It's already implemented like that. In order to trigger Consent Acquisition process, Account related to Contact and Contact itself need to be synchronized. Synchronization is checked on coredt__AccountMasterId__c and coredt__ContactExternalId__c fields -> if both are populated, we assume that Contact is synchronized.

Contact you reference to have these fields populated, that's why Consent Acquisition process was available. If it wasn't synchronized in Legacy before, that would mean that somebody populated that field manually and that's data issue.

When I tried for Contact created by me, which is not synchronized, I got following message while attempt to start Consent Acquisition process. Note that I met other conditions referenced in error message -> I do have communication channel populated.
","15/Jan/21 2:37 PM;ELeodi;[~egourdoumpa] i created contact ΜΙΛΤΟΣ ΚΡΕΜΜΥΔΑΣ [https://ote
column2: https://ote/]–situat.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Contact/0031X00000dSlkgQAC/view about 40 minutes ago and it still isn't synchronized with legacy.

column1: regarding the above mentioned contact we have not received SFCompoundID, could you please check?

SF Compound Id is itself empty, but SF Compound Id is calculated based on Tenant ID and Contact External Id. Contact External Id should be provided on synchronization, so when a request to synchronize record is sent, it shouldn't be populated at this point, therefore SF Compound Id is not populated as well. SF Compound Id will be calculated just after synchronization.

Please correct me if my understanding of process is uncomplete [~damkowalski], [~milipinski]","18/Jan/21 9:37 AM;ELeodi;[~mtzouma] i have the same problem today with ΜΙΛΙ ΒΑΝΙΛΙ https://ote–situat.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Contact/0031X00000dTmfRQAS/view  contact id CO-017966

column1: Because if your user's language is set to English, you should never see the values in greek, so the second behaviour is actually correct (but that means, the first is wrong - unless it has been manually loaded in greek) ","11/Dec/20 1:59 PM;dmyriounis;[~marian.grofcik] these values were pushed via Integration.
Normally these values since it is integration have to be displayed as they are published from Legacy->SF","11/Dec/20 2:01 PM;jkomorowska;[~kwojtczak] please update following picklist values:

Tax Office, Industry (Occupation Description) and Industry (Occupation type) according to the list in the document: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zz6HHEDkFP8DgJ2Yb7zOMUkl4zf4JXBmagEiUW8a09c/edit#gid=585680687]","11/Dec/20 6:00 PM;kwojtczak;[~jkomorowska]
The following fields were inserted without problem:

However there is problem with  Industry (Occupation Description). We exceed the limit of 15k characters. But in the file,[^20201211_Values_Quality.xlsx] there are some duplicated values (marked in yellow)

We may have a problem with the picklist values you have provided. Where are they taken from? They don't seem to be legitimate. In Industry (Occupation Description) there are 40 duplicates, one of the value is ""Represen/ion of NonAgricultural Farmers"" with the ""/"" instead of ""t"" and there are several values that look like duplicates

Are those really the values you have in your legacy system? What we should have in SF should match your legacy. The exercise to have English values was done because these are the values we are using for integration, same values should be used for migration. The option to see them in Greek will be only available because of the Translation Workbench, not because they will be added as values in Salesforce. You can send whatever value you have in legacy, we can also migrate in any language - SF will accept it, but those values will not be available to be selected in SF.","16/Dec/20 5:20 PM;jkomorowska;[~dmyriounis] [~tkiritsi]

Can we agree to close this bug as we have discussed the matter over the calls? The values in English for Tax Office and Industry (Occupation Type) are already there, you can work with translations. For Industry (Occupation description) we need the shortened list of values","16/Dec/20 5:24 PM;dmyriounis;Hi Joanna,

Duplicate Contact External ID found on SF upon rename of Contact on UCM,USSFA-4288,117637,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Won't Do/Dropped,dmyriounis,dmyriounis,dmyriounis,10/Dec/20 5:31 PM,07/Jan/21 10:36 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,11/Dec/20 3:22 PM,,,,0,GR,GR_UAT_R2_bug,UAT,,,,,,"Account

The Business User on UCM renamed Contact ΦΩΤΙΟΣ ΦΩΤΕΙΝΙΑΣ(*Contact External ID 1-7RXSUX*, Mobile Phone Number: 306944435671, Legal Rep ) to ΠΑΝΑΓΙΩΤΑ ΤΖΙΑΝΟΥΜΗ (Contact External ID 1-7RXSUX, Mobile Phone Number: :306930000000,Legal Rep).

As you can notice, on SF we have *+both contacts with the same Contact External ID+*. The correct case is to have *only the one renamed,*  ΠΑΝΑΓΙΩΤΑ ΤΖΙΑΝΟΥΜΗ (*Contact External ID 1-7RXSUX,* Mobile Phone Number: 306930000000

column2: i01ijr:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10/Dec/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,dmyriounis,gkagkas,jwszolkowski,pdlugosz,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"11/Dec/20 1:50 PM;gkagkas;The transformation MS performs seems correct to me, could you please [~jwszolkowski] check it from SF side?

column1: I attach the MS logs.","11/Dec/20 3:09 PM;jwszolkowski;Hi,

As you can see below even if Contact External Id is the same, SFCompoundId is different. Upsert is done based on SFCompoundId field, so logic works as required and designed. If you try to use Contact External Id to do an upsert and you have duplicate value for that record, you will get an error saying that it's not possible.
You shouldn't have records with the same Contact External Id,  looks like data issue.

!image-2020-12-11-14-05-10-561.png!","11/Dec/20 3:22 PM;jwszolkowski;One of the record has wrong coredt__SFCompoundId__c. Based on that field upsert operation is done. Upsert can't be done on contact external id when there are more than one record with the same value.
Most probably two records with the same Contact External Id shouldn't exist in system, looks like data issue.

[https://confluence.dtoneapp.telekom.net/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=SFA&title=12.+Unique+Identifiers+Mapping]  ","11/Dec/20 3:34 PM;dmyriounis;[~jwszolkowski] [~pdlugosz] we will create new Accounts and let you know how it goes, thank you :)",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

Account GR - Address Number,USSFA-4247,117062,,Bug,Closed,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Won't Do/Dropped,tkiritsi,dmyriounis,dmyriounis,08/Dec/20 11:59 AM,07/Jan/21 10:32 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,09/Dec/20 9:11 PM,,,,0,GR,GR_UAT_R2_bug,UAT,,,,,,"The field with the Account Address number is not filled with any value.

column2: i01dzz:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,07/Dec/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,amitkou,egourdoumpa,ELeodi,george.menikidis,gkagkas,mczarnecki,mgiannat,pdlugosz,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"07/Dec/20 1:48 PM;mgiannat;[~eanagnostou] is that sent from legacy to ote-integration layer? if yes pls reassign to george","07/Dec/20 2:00 PM;mgiannat;[~amitkou] i just had a call with Maciej.

column1: this is a known issue and now mulesoft cannot consume messages. Maciej is looking for a solution to this.

[~mczarnecki] pls let us know when this is fixed!","07/Dec/20 3:17 PM;mczarnecki;[~mgiannat] We have deployed our walkaround  solution, but We are facing other problem. The records lying on kafka topic are incorrect (wrong structure, Array instead of Object). Since the app is failing processing on the first record, it is trying to retry 5 times waiting 60 seconds each time.
Please take a look of the kafka events that are causing application to became so slow, since it is trying to reprocess events one by one 5 times waiting 1 minute each time.
{code}","07/Dec/20 3:38 PM;gkagkas;[~mgiannat] the problem that Maciej describes on the previous comment still exists.

Probably the best course of action would be for you to empty your kafka queues from these messages (because they are all going to fail as Maciej explained in the previous comment).  ","07/Dec/20 4:55 PM;mgiannat;[~gkagkas] is it ok now?","07/Dec/20 5:46 PM;mczarnecki;We are still receiving malformed events.","07/Dec/20 5:54 PM;mgiannat;[~george.menikidis] pls check again if we are still sending malformed events","07/Dec/20 6:14 PM;george.menikidis;Hello [~mczarnecki] and [~gkagkas]. We haven't produced any DWH event since  2020 -11:26:4. Additionally , could you please check if it's a poison pill case ?

If it's not the case above (please share the malformed payload) but keep in mind we did not send ArrayList of (header + body).","07/Dec/20 6:15 PM;george.menikidis;A workaround is to ""by pass"" the erroneous offsets.","07/Dec/20 6:20 PM;mczarnecki;[~george.menikidis] We can't bypass without development.
We are able to see many records with arrays.
Maybe You could purge all kafka topics and reset offsets?
{code}","07/Dec/20 10:47 PM;mgiannat;[~gkagkas] [~mczarnecki] the topic is now purged. Reset offset cannot be performed since there are connected consumers.
If you need this reset as well please communicate [adesiniot@cosmote.gr
column2: mailto:with%C2%A0adesiniot@cosmote.gr] (our kafka admin) adding me and [~george.menikidis] in Cc ","08/Dec/20 2:54 PM;gkagkas;We confirmed that the mapping

column1: is already in place in SF

So, when the change on your side is implemented with the HAL values it should work.","08/Dec/20 2:58 PM;george.menikidis;The mapping is hal compliant also from our side","08/Dec/20 5:05 PM;pdlugosz;[~george.menikidis] please check also whether You sent to us: body/Party/customers/status without that Status field on Account won't be updated.

Moreover when there's no value in DWH we should receive empty string or null instead N/A because we have restricted pick-lists for statuses so only HAL compliant values will be accepted. Also for body/Party/name should be sent name of the account or this field shouldn't be sent (null or """" won't be accepted and will trigger issue in MS).
Like George wrote, no development is needed from our side ;).

Especially, there was no access to 'SF Compound Unique Id' that is used as main field in upsert process.
All needed permissions have been added manually on Client environment, so this is not a blocker, but please take it into account in next package.

*EDIT*: As I see there are more granted privileges in ""GR Data Migration User Permissions"". If it is dedicated permission set for GR client, Client should use it and we are sure that all needed privileges from Data Migration User Permission are also in GR Data Migration User Permissions, please let me know :)",,kwojtczak,mchojnacki,wmusiatowicz,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"11/Dec/20 3:58 PM;wmusiatowicz;image-2020-12-11-14-58-37-986.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/94482/image-2020-12-11-14-58-37-986.png",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,04/Dec/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2

column1: So as I understood ""GR Data Migration User Permissions"" is an extension not a replacement.

[~pilaska], can You please update specification document for GR? This particular Client should also assign ""GR Data Migration User Permissions"" to our migration user.","10/Dec/20 12:09 PM;kwojtczak;[~mchojnacki]
Please let me know what can we do on our site in this ticket.
As far as I understand now you need:
* permission on Compound Id on GR Data Migration Permission Set

I would like to ask You for granting access to all possible fields (_including SF Compound Unique Id_) in Event objects to given permission set _(GR Data Migration User Permissions_). For the present, they are added manually on the environment, but I would prefer to have it in package not to add it every time after deployment.
I would not be requiring something complicated, so that's it :)","11/Dec/20 3:58 PM;wmusiatowicz;Tested on: GR sp test
Permission was granted to GR Data Migration User Permissions permission set
can You please tell me if access was granted only to SF Compound Unique Id or to all possible fields within Event object?

In the former case, it may be a problem during updating/inserting values to mentioned entity (or is it solved in other way?). While there should be a possibility to populate also other fields. Please correct me if I am mistaken.
In the latter case, it will be great for sure (such situation takes place right now and it works out well) :)","14/Dec/20 2:40 PM;kwojtczak;Hi [~mchojnacki],

","14/Dec/20 2:49 PM;mchojnacki;[~kwojtczak], perfect! Thank You very much!

column1: User SADMIN has profile Read Only.
The error when performing this change of owner to SADMIN is ‘ TRANSFER_REQUIRES_READ: The new owner must have read permission.’
Read Only profile has Read permision to account object, but it has only Master record type assigned.
The account has record type Draft, so profile of SADMIN has not this rec type assigned.
For more details - see [debug log created for the owner change

Account and Contact Phone Number fields customizations (GR),USSFA-4103,115707,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Won't Do/Dropped,kwojtczak,ethanopoulou,mtzouma,30/Nov/20 7:55 PM,11/Mar/21 11:03 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,03/Mar/21 5:33 PM,Release 3,,,0,CR,GR,Salesforce,,,,,,"As a Salesforce user I need to be able to store phone numbers in a structured and controllable manner, respecting the international formatting. For this reason I need to keep the Prefix Country Code and the actual phone number in separate fields.
Both fields should be populated when it comes to storing phone information into the system.

When I need to capture phone related information, I must be able to choose the country from a picklist which will have the values in the form of <Country (prefix code)> e.g.  ""Greece (30)"" and in a separate field populate the actual number.
The default value for Prefix Country Code picklist should be ""Greece (30)"".

Only if country is Greece: Mobile or phone must be 10 digits and begin  with 69... or  2. (do not differentiate type of the field, please apply logic to all fields)",,amitkou,ampoura,ethanopoulou,ipasialis,jkomorowska,kwojtczak,mgiannat,milipinski,mtzouma,oana.ene,pdedic,tkiritsi,tmichalislis,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-4780,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"21/Jan/21 12:20 AM;jkomorowska;Countries with prefix Updated (1).xlsx;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/99421/Countries+with+prefix+Updated+%281%29.xlsx","25/Feb/21 8:21 PM;jkomorowska;image-2021-02-25-19-21-20-723.png;https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/secure/attachment/106400/image-2021-02-25-19-21-20-723.png",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"# There is a country code picklist field created for each of the phone fields except fax, values of the prefix fields are in attachment

3. Default value for all prefix fields is Greece (30)
4. If one of the phone numbers is provided, the corresponding prefix field needs to be mandatory

_Boura_","09/Feb/21 7:20 PM;jkomorowska;After a call today [~ipasialis] asked to come up with another solution as none of the proposed meet expectations.

After talking this through again in the team I have decided to point out the reasons we have advised against having separate fields for prefixes in the first place, which we have already discussed before on a call and NatCo confirmed they still would like to implement this requirement. The drawbacks of having separate prefix fields for all phone fields:
- the layout of the page gets less user friendly, and more crowded with 3 additional fields (in case of Account)

- A phone field can be clicked in Salesforce and if the user has e.g. Skype installed, Skype will make the call. In case of my Skype for example it adds PL prefix by default if the prefix is not provided. So if you store the prefix in a separate field and you try to call a number in Germany, that won't work

- If you want to use a CTI tool in the future, and call an international client, it would need to read the phone number to call from one field, not 2, you will anyway need to integrate the prefix with phone number into one field. In that case you may need to expose another field to the users, that concatenates prefix with number. In case of Account that's again 3 new fields
- making a separate prefix field is against harmonized approach to have standardize phone numbers
- separate prefix field require data fixes to remove prefixes from all existing phone numbers used and add them into dedicated fields (re-migration of the fields)

- Prefix field with long list of values will require user to scroll, it is not possible to start typing Pol and get only Poland. You can type ""P"" and be forwarded to all countries starting with P, you will still see the other values

With that in mind you also need to be aware that Salesforce has it's limitations, as any system, and uses a defined user interface with defined coding language. Therefore achieving in Salesforce some of the solutions seen on websites is possible but time consuming, expensive and hard to maintain in the future. In this case we would need to override new and edit actions on Lead, Contact, Account with custom components (similar solution to validate addresses only on Account New action for PL/HR took over 1,5 month).

In order for the Natco to have a picklist that includes country name and prefix, which is main NatCo requirement, and keep unique API names for those values, which is a requirement from Salesforce, we will make the same label and API name. Future integration may require an additional field that will ""translate"" the value in the picklist to a number, and possibly concatenate with the phone number. At this point, as integrations are not known and not required, I suggest to not develop this logic as we don't know when and for which purpose will that be required. In order to make it simpler in the future we recommend to make the values in the picklist in the form Canada_1, if you agree.

Just to reminde you, please let me know what will the solution be on this ,after the meeting (and the respective mail i sent you) on 12/02","24/Feb/21 2:59 PM;jkomorowska;Hi [~tkiritsi], thanks for reminding. We're working on a POC for that, will let you know ASAP how are we doing with thes, let me chekc","25/Feb/21 8:39 PM;jkomorowska;[~tkiritsi]  [~ipasialis]  [~ELeodi]

As I have mentioned before, the phone fields we're using in the system are standard fields and they are also harmonized. For those reasons, we're not able to set a default value for those fields in the fields' properties. Damian was looking into the possibilities we have, to add the default value anyway with changing the standard layouts and standard SF user experience. There are 2 possibilities, unfortunately they are not ideal.

Both would require changing the standard way of creating Accounts, Contact and Leads. We would need to re-create the standard pages for record creation, which is maybe not bad for the user, but it's time consuming and making changes would be complicated.
If we use a flow - faster but time consuming if you want to change layouts - that's 130h effort
If we use a custom component - that supports standard page layouts but requires coding - that's 216 h.

I'm sorry I don't have better news, we really tried, that's why it took so long. We will have the same problem for auto-populating Location on the Event, but I will comment it under the relevant User Stories.

With such high estimates I'm afraid we're back to square 1. We can still remove the validation on phone fields, so that users will be able to insert phone numbers without country code, as they were doing before in legacy. We're out of ideas, honestly.
I don’t want to proceed with such complex solutions (time & estimation perspective) as the ones you described.
So I will make a final try to find a solution , with the risk of doing “solution design” which is not in my role😊
Please let me know if we can maybe do the following:
On field  “Mobile” apply the validation of 10 digits and start with 69 in order to make sure I will get the right numbers to use for consent process -  no country code required
On fields “Phone” & “Other phone” apply a validation of 10 digits and start with either 69 or 2 (users may use these fields both for fixed & mobile phones) - no country code required
Create a new field on Account/Contact/Lead called “Foreign phone” ,with no validations .
In the future we can create a foreign consent process (English version of the sms) based on that new field. Does that make sense?
What would the estimation be on that solution ?","02/Mar/21 12:51 PM;kwojtczak;Hello [~tkiritsi]
To sum it up, it would look like as follows:
* Validation rule that fields start with 69 and have 10 digits.  Applies to: Mobile field on object:,Contact, Lead
* Validation rule that field starts with 69 or 2 and have 10 digits. Applies to Phone and Other Phone fields on Account, Contact, Lead
* Removing current validation rules related to numbers on Account, Contact, Lead

* Additional field ""Foreign phone"" with no validations - for now we could do it harmonized and prepare this field for integration in the future. So we would need a separate user story so that we will remember about it to create an integration in the future.  Field should be on Account, Contact, Lead .
When it comes to estimation its going to be 15H (1.8 md)
Please let me know if that is ok

Please create this new user story for the future integration of this new field , so we will not miss it from our backlog for Release 4
Regarding the migrated regords & the fix activities , we see the following tasks:
* Remove the ""30"" from all migrated numbers in all related fields ( Owner Deloitte)
* Refine our synch logic on these fields to not add/remove the ""30"" ( Owner GR )
* Check our consent process about the ""30"" part. ( Owner GR)

In order to integrate any field between legacy and SF, it needs to be added to data model on harmonized level. What I meant that for now we will add just a field on harmonized level, make the field visible on the layout for Greece, then the integration will be covered so that we can build integration on top of it.
Field will be available for other Natcos but visible and used only on GR layouts  (its similar case as we have now for example with PESEL field from PL Natco)
* Remove the ""30"" from all migrated numbers in all related fields ( Owner Deloitte)
Since this is a data fix on prod, I am afraid that this should be executed by GR NatCo.  It can be managed by utilizing Data Loader capabilities.

column2: i00uy7:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"As a tele-appointments agent, when I start working on my query I should also be able to choose the salesperson that the event/lead that might be created to be assigned to him.",,,,,,,,06/Oct/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,ELeodi,jkomorowska,kwojtczak,mtzouma,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"19/Nov/20 3:17 PM;mtzouma;[~jkomorowska] This is the user story we talked about this morning.

column1: ","16/Mar/21 9:13 PM;kwojtczak;[~mtzouma] I need more clarification here.
So If telesales created a Lead, then who should be the Sales Person marked on the Owner field?
If it comes to the Event - then the Owner should be the person who is the owner of related object?
How about Opportunity? Could you give me some more information on these scenarios? ","18/Mar/21 7:25 PM;kwojtczak;Hello,
Please take a look at following points:
# When Teleagent creates a new Lead, it would be helpful if the Owner would be already set to the Sales person for whom the agent creates those records

Currently we have a functionality with a field ""Target Assignee"". Once we put a salesforce user there, then the lead owner is reassigned to this person. Does it correspond to the requirement which is written here?
# Event - In the even we have a field Assigned To where you can assign event to the person that TS Agents wants. Is that enough or you need an automation here?
# Opportunity - to whom should be the owner assigned? Is that the Account Owner of the related to the Opportunity account?
","14/Apr/21 1:09 PM;mtzouma;[~tkiritsi] Could you please check Krzysztof's questions a provide clarifications?
there should be a way for the agent to choose for which sales person is working for while creating a query.
the field Account Owner is a different field and should not be user for that purpose.
the need to create prepopulate owner in leads, opportunities and events created will happen mostly for accounts that have a ""dummy"" account owner and not an actual sales person
so when the agent selects that he is working for a specific sales person the following fields should be auto populated with that user .
the tele appointment agent should be able to change owner even if it is prepopulated so this field needs to be editable to teleappointment profile.
for Lead ""target assignee"" should be prepopulated with sales persons name so upon save, lead owner will change as well
for Opportunity ,"" opportunity owner"" should be prepopulated with sales persons name and editable to tele appointment profile
for Event ""assigned to"" should be prepopulated with sales persons name and editable to tele appointment profile

column1: Change GR Roles for Contact,USSFA-3296,107454,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Won't Do/Dropped,kwojtczak,jkomorowska,jkomorowska,20/Oct/20 8:41 PM,27/Jan/21 4:00 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,20/Oct/20 8:44 PM,,,,0,,,,,,,,,"When creating contact, user should select Role of this contact. which should be populated to AccountContactRelation - field: Roles.
If Role is changed on Contact, it should be updated on AccountContact Relationship
Field: Roles on Account Contact Relationship should be mandatory
Validation that only one role can be chosen in Roles on Account Contact Relationship
On the create contact form we need a new field “Role” that must be mandatory to save the new contact

A “Role” field must also exist on the Lead creation form – not mandatory for the creation of the lead , but  mandatory when converting a Lead to a Contact (the user must get an error message that he cannot convert to contact without setting a value on the Role field)
The list of values for the Role field on Lead & on Contact object will be the same and  as follows:
For contacts : Legal, we need a validation , so that these values will not be available for the SF user to select .

Account check in legacy,USSFA-3106,104571,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Low,Won't Do/Dropped,,oana.ene,jkomorowska,05/Oct/20 11:38 AM,27/Jan/21 3:58 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,14/Dec/20 12:21 PM,,,,0,,,,,,,,,"Accounts are mastered in our local central account system - UCM.
Every time an account is being created in Salesforce  ( either by user action in the accounts screen or automatically by converting a lead ) we want the following functionality.
* Firstly check Salesforce if this VAT_ID already exists and if yes use this account.
* If this is a new Salesforce VAT_ID , ask UCM if there is available there. If yes , fetch this account from UCM to Salesforce and use it in the process.
Example1 : Coca Cola has vat_id 123456789 and exists in Salesforce. If user tries to create an account with this VAT_ID and error message must be presented and not let him create a duplicate.

Example2 : {color:#172b4d}Coca Cola has vat_id 123456789 and exists in Salesforce. {color}If there is a lead with this VAT_ID and this lead finally converts in account , we want Salesforce to automatically use the Coca Cola account that already exists .

Example3 : {color:#172b4d} Coca Cola has vat_id 123456789 and does not exist in Salesforce, but exists in UCM.  If a user tries to create an account , Salesforce must search in UCM and fetch this account and present it to the user.{color}

{color:#172b4d}Example4 : {color} Coca Cola has vat_id 123456789 and does not exist in Salesforce, but exists in UCM.  If a lead is about to be converted  , Salesforce must search in UCM and fetch this account and use it in the conversion process instead of creating a new one.",,Gabor.Fal,ipasialis,jkomorowska,oana.ene,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-969,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Closed,,,,,22/May/20 12:00 AM,,160.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2
column2: hzzchr:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"As a Sales Organization Member I want to create accounts in SFA, so that I can effectively manage my business.",,,,,,,,22/May/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,Deloitte,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Gabor.Fal,ipasialis,jkomorowska,oana.ene,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"05/Oct/20 11:55 AM;jkomorowska;[~ipasialis]  [~tkiritsi]  [~aanagnostopoulos]  [~oana.ene]

column1: This requirement is very complex, as I have already mentioned in https://jira.dtoneapp.telekom.net/browse/USSFA-969. We need to create custom mechanism for Lead conversion, so that VAT from Lead is checked before converting, another custom mechanism to verify VAT in legacy when Account is not created from conversion, we would need to use integration patterns which are against principles of this project.

The question is why would you even need this functionality? When we create Account in SF there should be a mechanism in legacy to check for duplication and in case such an Account exists, link it to the one we have created in Salesforce by one of the many External ID fields we're using.

I have written the User Story for the record, but I believe this requirement should be dropped and handled differently","07/Oct/20 5:33 PM;jkomorowska;[~ipasialis]  [~damkowalski]  [~piwanowski]  [~Gabor.Fal]

Please discuss this requirement on an architecture meeting","07/Oct/20 5:37 PM;Gabor.Fal;[~jkomorowska] I don't understand this requirement. We sync Account data from legacy to SalesForce. There should be no such case where an account already exists in legacy but is not synced to SalesForce, thus there should be no need for any on the fly sync check. Also I would like to avoid such sync checks as they will slow the process down greatly. This is why we go with background sync. ","07/Oct/20 5:39 PM;Gabor.Fal;[~jkomorowska] Also, User Story description already has a proposed solution. This is not correct. This should not be a user story and especially not like this. This has been my comment multiple times, I would appreciate being addressed. ","07/Oct/20 5:43 PM;oana.ene;[~Gabor.Fal] - the user story was written by the Natco, and this is how the request looks like.

This is the reason why we have tagged you as we will need your support on the technical part.","07/Oct/20 5:45 PM;Gabor.Fal;[~oana.ene] May be we would need a new category. This should not be categorized a story. But same happened with Margin story which ended up being an accepted story and this is not right. Solution should not be in the business requirement part. ","07/Oct/20 5:48 PM;ipasialis;[~Gabor.Fal] , [~jkomorowska]
the description was provided by me so you can fully understand the requirement.

By your previous comment I presume you need clarifications, I would be happy to have a meeting to provide further details. For example of course there are cases that an account exists in legacy and not sent to Salesforce as we do not migrate and synchronize our full customer base. ","20/Oct/20 1:38 PM;Gabor.Fal;Hello [~ipasialis]

Sorry for slow reply. Basically the concept of the account sync and initial load was designed in order to make sure that Accounts that are relevant in the lead & opportunity process are synced to SalesForce. With that in mind it should not happen that a B2B customers account is not available in SalesForce. Adding a synchronous API check for a possibility that should not happen is not good practice and would mean a complete change our approach and serious degradation of user experience. The whole architecture approach is to have decoupled systems where SalesForce user can work freely and independently of other systems and only introduce minimal restrictions in SalesForce, especially not to wait for a synchronous calls to succeed (except for 360 view, but even those do not stop the user to do something else why they finish).

It would be very helpful if we could meet for half an hour , together with [~tkiritsi]  , and provide you some examples of how this can happen. It mostly has to do with ""customers crossing the line"" between b2b and retail world. It will be confusing to write down some detailed examples here  , it would be great if we talked on a short meeting on this. ","30/Oct/20 10:15 AM;Gabor.Fal;[~ipasialis] Send me an invite for next week sometime and we can talk about it. Monday and Wednesday still have some empty slots.

In general I am not sure I see the problem with customer moving to the specific segment because that should not happen coming from Salesforce but I would guess it happens thru some re-segmentation that is done in the Master system. When customer get their new segment they should get synced automatically. Also possible way of solving this is when you detect that a new Account is created from slave system (SalesForce) that already exists in your master you don't create a new one but just send back the data of the existing master record. Adding a REST API that synchronously checks every time a new account is created in Salesforce (e.g.: lead conversion) would have tremendous negative impact on user experience as user would have to wait until call is successful and would tightly couple SalesForce to legacy. It would slow down work not only in case a duplicate is about to be created but in all cases when you create a new account. With that in mind I would suggest to enforce some natural key validation on SalesForce (like TaxID) and when Account creation event comes from SalesForce validate if before mentioned natural key already exists or not.  ","14/Dec/20 12:05 PM;tkiritsi;[~jkomorowska] [~oana.ene]

After having several internal discussions we decided to cancel this user story.So please cancel it","14/Dec/20 12:21 PM;oana.ene;Oh wow! Great job guys! :)",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

column2: hzz9lj:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"As a Teleappointment Agent, I need To be able to update clients GDPR Consent fields, so that I know if I have the clients consent to store his personal data

column1: Teleappoitnment Agent should be able to update GDPR Values during the call

Teleappoitnment Agent should be able to send an informative sms/email for GDPR purposes and no reply to this sms/email is necessary . This should be a mandatory & automatic step .",,,"Teleappointment profile should have read/write on Status field on Consent, on Contact field ""Channel""",,,,,30/Sep/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,Deloitte,,,,,,,,,,,,,,jkomorowska,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"02/Oct/20 2:45 PM;tkiritsi;[~pmalicki]
Please see below some comments , on how we think this should work after some discussions with Andreas:

Negative answer to Tele agent -> User presses button “Negative Consent”  , which sets the status field to the value “Consent Rejected”. This action triggers  SF to notify legacy, run the anonymization of the contact in legacy  and then sync it to SF

Positive answer -> User presses button “Positive Consent”  , which sets the status field to the value “Oral Consent”. This action triggers Salesforce to notify our legacy system that an informative message should be sent to the contact.

When this process finishes successfully and the message is sent , legacy informs back Salesforce and status changes to “Consent Given”.  During the stage of “Oral Consent” , status field must not be editable

These 2 buttons should only be editable when status field is in status “Null”","08/Oct/20 11:49 AM;jkomorowska;This is duplicaiton of USSFA-3161, co I'm cancelling",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

GR Opportunity contact CR,USSFA-2609,96514,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Low,Won't Do/Dropped,,jkomorowska,jkomorowska,24/Aug/20 6:08 PM,10/Mar/21 7:18 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,10/Mar/21 7:18 PM,Release 4,,,0,CR,GR,Salesforce,,,,,,"We plan to use the OOTB functionality (Andreas explained that already SF is able to link contacts with Opportunities via Contact Roles - you may inform HU team in case they also missed this)
* To be able to select only one of the related account contacts as the “primary” of each opportunity (like HU) .

While searching the related account’s contacts ,*we want to be able to see the contacts’ role* (instead of the account name that is now available), in order to help the user to select the suitable contact on the opportunity
* To be able to select a related account contact and define his role on the specific opportunity e.g. influencer , decision maker (as implemented now in production)
However , again while the user adds a new contact we need on  *to be able to  see the Role of each contact* in order to help the selection
After saving ,  the user must be able to see both  the “Role” of the contact e.g. I.T. manager , as well as the “Opportunity role” e.g. influencer
So maybe we must *do something with the naming of these 2 fields to avoid confusion* of the users

column1: HU will use the Contact field on Opportunity, because there is one ""main"" contact for the Opporunity and we need to base additional logic with this main contact. So if the case is the same here, they may need to use it.

Additionally we didn't plan to integrate nor migrate Opportunity Contacts, so that would be additional effort for those streams. If there is no integration/migration needed, then no problem, but if that's required, we need to discuss the additional effort","26/Aug/20 8:08 PM;aanagnostopoulos;[~jkomorowska]

The GR team needs to re-evaluate internally with the Sales team that requirement and decide between the standard Opportunity Contact Roles feature vs. a custom Primary Contact lookup field on Opportunity header (like HU).
After aligning with sales , we decided that we need
* To be able to select only one of the related account contacts as the “primary” of each opportunity (like HU) .

While searching the related account’s contacts ,*we want to be able to see the contacts’ role* (instead of the account name that is now available), in order to help the user to select the suitable contact on the opportunity
* To be able to select a related account contact and define his role on the specific opportunity e.g. influencer , decision maker (as implemented now in production)
However , again while the user adds a new contact we need on  *to be able to  see the Role of each contact* in order to help the selection
After saving ,  the user must be able to see both  the “Role” of the contact e.g. I.T. manager , as well as the “Opportunity role” e.g. influencer
So maybe we must *do something with the naming of these 2 fields to avoid confusion* of the users

GR Account status calculation CR,USSFA-2608,96513,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Low,Won't Do/Dropped,,jkomorowska,jkomorowska,24/Aug/20 6:01 PM,27/Jan/21 3:59 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,24/Sep/20 4:22 PM,Release 2 Wave 2,,,0,,,,,,,,,"Regarding the “Status” field of the Account ,the pick list must have the following values : EXISTING , ONCE EXISTED , NEVER EXISTED
This is not an information that will be coming from legacy , but calculated in SF based on the following logic , taking into consideration the values of Status Mobile/Fixed / ICT/ FMCC values
o If an Account has at least one “EXISTING” value on the fields Mobile/Fixed / ICT/ FMCC ,then the Status should also be EXISTING
o If all values of fields  Status Mobile/Fixed / ICT/ FMCC values  is ONCE EXISTED ,then the Status should also be ONCE EXISTED
o If all values of fields  Status Mobile/Fixed / ICT/ FMCC values  is NEVER EXISTED ,then the Status should also be NEVER EXISTED
o If one of the  Status Mobile/Fixed / ICT/ FMCC values  is ONCE EXISTED ,and all the others is NEVER EXISTED , then the Status should  be ONCE EXISTED

CANCEL - [GR] Contact Synchronization,USSFA-2131,88673,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Won't Do/Dropped,,oana.ene,dennguyen,09/Jul/20 5:26 PM,27/Jan/21 3:59 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,28/Sep/20 4:59 PM,Release 2 Wave 2,,28/Jul/20 12:00 AM,0,,,,,,,,,"All changes of contact data in SF will be subsequently synchronized to Legacy CRM systems (e.g. SBL) including Contact Status (e.g. active, inactive) and contact roles.
All changes of contact data in Legacy CRM systems (e.g. SBL) will be subsequently synchronized to SF including Contact Status (e.g. active, inactive) and contact roles.
Newly created contacts in Legacy CRM system will be also created in SF. Newly created contacts in SF will be also created in Legacy CRM system.

In case of parallel modification happening in both SF and Legacy CRM systems, it might result into overwriting with the last update of previous change. Since changes on contact details are not happening often, this limitation is acceptable.",,ipasialis,jkomorowska,kwojtczak,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-970,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"# User who has access to contact records based on sharing model can see contact data including relations to accounts.
1. User who has access to contact records based on sharing model can see same up to date contact data in SF and Legacy CRM systems.
2. User who has access to contact records based on sharing model can edit all contact data in SF.
3. After user changes contact data in Legacy CRM systems, changes are propagated also to SF.
4. After user changes contact data in SF, changes are propagated also to Legacy CRM systems.
5. Newly created contacts in Legacy CRM systems are propagated to SF and are accessible to users according to sharing model rules.

CANCEL Publish opportunity changes to legacy,USSFA-2076,88223,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Low,Won't Do/Dropped,damkowalski,oana.ene,jkomorowska,07/Jul/20 6:54 PM,27/Jan/21 3:59 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,24/Sep/20 4:21 PM,,,14/Jul/20 12:00 AM,0,,,,,,,,,"This user story covers pushing of Opportunities, Opportunity Products, Opportunity Teams towards legacy.
After creation and during stage 1 and 2 data are pushed, from stage 3 no data is pushed, only incoming information

There will be multiple consumers on legacy side (e.g. DWH, ICCM (HU), Siebel (PL, CZSK)), but no confirmation is expected to be received back to SFDC, as the process is asynchronous. Any change on opportunity which is done by user manually in SFDC UI shall trigger update towards legacy in stages 1 and 2.

Actual Probability (%), Amount, Close Date, Created By, Created Date, {color:#FF0000}*Description - cannot be publish because it is a long text field*,{color} Expected Duration of Contract ,Expected Revenue (Or ""Initial Opportunity Value""), Expected start billing Date, Initial One Time Fee, Last Modified By, Last Modified Date, Opportunity ID, Opportunity Owner, Probability (%), Reason for Lost, Stage, Initial recurring revenue, Initial one time margin, Initial recurring margin, Initial total margin.

Expected Contract duration, Expected Value,Initial one time margin, Initial recurring margin, Initial Value, Last Modified By, Last Modified Date, Line Item ID Margin, One-time fee, Opportunity, Product Code, ProductItem, Quantity, Recurring Fee, Total Price.

Send the whole record",,d.sarlanis,damkowalski,dsimonyi,jkomorowska,mreznyk,oana.ene,pdedic,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-2075,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"Opportunity is pushed to legacy after creation. After user changes Opportunity stage to 3 - Proposal, no changes towards legacy, only incoming information.
Opportunity Team is synchronized from SFDC to Legacy in stage 1,2, from Stage 3 Opportunity Team mastered in legacy

Opportunity Products are synchronized from SFDC to Legacy in stage 1,2, from Stage 3 Opportunity Products mastered in legacy",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,15/May/20 12:00 AM,In Progress,"For each natCo there is a different scenario.

column2: hzwvtr:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"As a Product Owner I want to make sure opportunity changes are published towards legacy during the stages when it is managed in SFDC, so that I can make sure the historical records are archived.",,,"New Record Type for stage Closed, all fields read-only

column1: Flow to change Record Type on change of stage to Closed
Push Topic with query to send Opp data,  Opp. Teams, Opportunity Products from SF into other systems
New checkbox field, called PublishEvent__c, was added on such objects:
3 new Flows that make before-save update and decides whether set PublishEvent checkbox field of the corresponding object as true or false:
2 new Platform Event objects were added to store changes in corresponding objects:
2 new Processes to map changes in object to corresponding Platform Event object and publish the event:

Apex script, called PushTopicOpportunityInsertUpdate, was created to create Push Topic for Opportunity.",,,,,01/Jul/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,Deloitte,,,,,,,,,,,,,,d.sarlanis,damkowalski,dsimonyi,jkomorowska,mreznyk,oana.ene,pdedic,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"24/Sep/20 1:48 PM;tkiritsi;This should be canceled .

Events notifications - client notification,USSFA-1491,81918,,Story,New,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Low,,ipasialis,oana.ene,jkomorowska,04/Jun/20 6:37 PM,18/May/21 3:26 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,Release 4,,,0,April,integration,June,NewDemand,nocapex,Salesforce,,,"New field on event to be added, that will specify if notifications should be sent to customer via e-mail, SMS, or none, multipicklist (Notification Method)
Based on value in this field selected by user, notification to event contact is sent via e-mail or SMS 24 hours prior meeting by Email and/or SMS

24 hours is initial parameter that can be configured by Business and System Administrators, but same for whole org. Parameter can differ for different Natco orgs and its value will be finally agreed during implementation.

Note: In later phase for this functionality to work, text of e-mail and SMS will need to be defined by every Natco in their language.",,dmaltezakis,ELeodi,jkomorowska,mjodlowski,morgaz,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,USSFA-1044,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"Default value of field specifying notification method is set to none.
User (any user except for read only user) is able to select value on Event that specifies notification method (none, SMS, email).
In case that value is set to ""SMS"" or ""email"", notification is sent from Salesforce to Contact related to that event 24 hours prior to meeting start.

In case that value is set to ""none"", notification is not sent from Salesforce to contact before meeting.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Closed,,,,,22/May/20 12:00 AM,USSFA-5,,,,,,32.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,14.0,,,,,,,,#03.05,,,GR,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"2

Visibility for records with special flag,USSFA-1070,79370,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Low,Won't Do/Dropped,,oana.ene,dennguyen,22/May/20 6:57 PM,27/Jan/21 4:00 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,06/Nov/20 2:44 PM,,,,0,,,,,,,,,"There are specific flagged accounts, e.g. Army Accounts, EU Accounts. These accounts with related objects (e.g. Opportunities, Leads) are only visible for will have specific account managers as owners (not directors) .{color:#172b4d}The confidential acount's owner and his management hierarchy must have full access to all account's info{color}. System Administrator cannot see these data.

Example: Whole Team for Army Accounts can see all Army Accounts and cannot see EU Accounts and vice versa. All of them can see all other accounts that are not flagged.",,jkomorowska,kwojtczak,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"1. All users within specified team (e.g. Army Accounts) can see and edit special accounts (e.g. Army Accounts) and related records.
2. Users from other specified team (e.g. EU Accounts) cannot see the same special accounts (e.g. Army Accounts) and related records.

column2: hzvgvz:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"As a Sales Manager I want my team to access confidential records (not visible for other users), so that I can work within team with clients having high requirements on confidentiality.",,,"Accounts will be private + Account teams

column1: System admin cannot have ""view all"" for Accounts and needs to be out of role hierarchy too",,,,,22/May/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,Deloitte,,,,,,,,,,,,,,jkomorowska,kwojtczak,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"02/Jun/20 2:21 PM;dennguyen;From orginal excel file: We must be able to flag sepcific customers (no default criteria) as confidential
Confidential means that anyone can search these customers but must not be able to see specific info like asstes,bills,contact info , opportunities ,leads,tasks ,events

In the case that a specific SF user is member of the opprotunity team for that kind of private customer (for example a pre sales engineer) he must be able to see the opportunity and handle the task that will be assigned to him
The confidential acount's owner and his management hierachy must have full access to all account's info
The read only profile user must also have access for reporting reasons
We must define what user will be able to to this flaging - probably the Business admin
Whoever can delete wrong records (mistakes) must also be able to delete these accounts related records

column1: Enhance event creation functionality GR specific,USSFA-1047,79347,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,Won't Do/Dropped,tkiritsi,oana.ene,dennguyen,22/May/20 6:57 PM,12/Mar/21 1:07 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,12/Mar/21 1:07 PM,,,,0,,,,,,,,,"At the creation of Event population of Location field with SFA Address from Account will be done automatically before saving the record.

Note: this functionality exists for Telesales agents already",,ELeodi,jkomorowska,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"# {color:#172b4d}When creating new Event *with Type = meeting{color}*, Location field is prepopulated with an existing address of SFA Address from Account that is related to Event.

column2: hzvgrj:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,29.0,,,,,"As a Product Owner I want to pre-populate field Location during Event creation with existing addresses on Account in SF, so that the work for users is simplified.",,,,,,,,22/May/20 12:00 AM,,,,,,,,,,,Deloitte,,,,,,,36.0,,,,,,,ELeodi,jkomorowska,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"02/Jun/20 2:54 PM;dennguyen;From orginal excel file: Location should not be mandatory as the event can be virtual (e.g. zoom video call)","06/Nov/20 1:40 PM;jkomorowska;[~jkomorowska] to be checked - This functionality will be delivered with teleappointments","01/Feb/21 1:24 PM;jkomorowska;[~tkiritsi]  [~ELeodi]

column1: I have extended Acceptnace criteria with what is marked in bold letters. Can you please verify this is correct?
* When creating new Event *with Type = meeting*, after saving the record, Location field is populated with an existing address of SFA Address from Account that is related to Event.
* Location field can be updated/filled manually by user.
* *If during Event creation there is already a value added by the user, it should not be overridden*
No this is not quite what we have in mind.
The requirement is ,once the user starts the creation of a new event , as soon as he  he relates it to an Account , the sfa address must be copied to the location field (before he saves the record).
When the users sees the prepopulated address ,he verifies it with the customer and if needed he changes it for the specific event. Then he saves the record .

Idealy this should be applied only for events of type Meeting (location is not needed in other types)  as you described.","16/Feb/21 5:53 PM;jkomorowska;[~tkiritsi] i have changed the AC, please review now:
# {color:#172b4d}When creating new Event *with Type = meeting{color}*, Location field is prepopulated with an existing address of SFA Address from Account that is related to Event.
# Location field can be updated/filled manually by user.","17/Feb/21 8:51 AM;ELeodi;[~jkomorowska] i talked about it with Fillio and i am answering this on her behalf.

I understand your requirement, but here we have the same problem as with phone number that we wanted to pre-populate with the prefix ""30"". It is possible but very time consuming. This works already for teleappointments, because in this case the user is redirected to creation of Task from another page. We would need to copy this kind of behavior - create custom ""Event"" page, which would be basically re-building the out of the box functionality. What I can propose is to fill in the location after saving, if it has not been provided by the user, so at least when user checks his Events later, they will contain the Location from Account. What do you think?","12/Mar/21 12:36 PM;tkiritsi;[~jkomorowska]

Product Information goes further into CPQ system (for Quote), deeper levels of product are defined in CPQ system later and later in the process information about products in case of change (aggregated real amount - new field not overwrite the original amount (it will stay as estimated amount in the beginning by KAM) , products to 3rd Level) is updated back into SF. Mapping will be done in Natco Legacy system and SF will receive only SF acceptable values (3rd Level of Product as it is in SF).",,jkomorowska,oana.ene,tkiritsi,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,1. column2: hzvdin:",,,1970-01-01 01:00:00.0,2020-09-01 23:59:59.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"As a Sales Organization Member I want to view and update tasks and events in Outlook that were originally created in Salesforce (and vice versa), so that I don't need to switch to Salesforce app while working in Outlook app (and vice versa).",,,"Assign Permission set to users ""Standard Einstein Activity Capture""

column1: Authentication of users through AD - GR,USSFA-824,78776,,Story,Cancelled,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,High,Won't Do/Dropped,pdlugosz,oana.ene,frigojozsef,20/May/20 7:15 PM,27/Jan/21 4:00 PM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,07/Oct/20 4:11 PM,Release 2 Wave 1,,16/Jun/20 12:00 AM,0,,,,,,,,,"Authentication functionality is provided by external active directory based on email account.
Two factor authentication is only considered when users do not login to Salesforce from their local corporate network (or channeled through VPN to use the local AD).

Optional extension: Two factor authentication will be enabled in SF based on mobile app Salesforce Authenticator in case of mobile users - not having access to corporate network or VPN on their mobile.

OneMail AD is preferable to create a harmonized central Single Sign On solution to remove the complexity of creating Authentication configurations for each natco. In case OneMail AD is not feasible, Natco specific solution with Local AD will be implemented.",,damkowalski,jkomorowska,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"� User is authenticated through active directory after login.
� Two factor authentication should be enabled for users outside internal network (when AD is not used to authenticate directly).

VPN endpoint information - Non Prod - GR,USSFA-329,75989,,Task,New,USSFA,Salesforce Automation ,software,dragos.jijau,,,Medium,,tpsallid,jvelasco,jvelasco,06/May/20 1:39 PM,23/Oct/20 12:28 AM,07/Feb/22 1:45 AM,,Release 2 Wave 1,,25/Aug/20 12:00 AM,0,INR1S2,integration,Salesforce,SFR2S4,,,,,"*Remote IP Address*: The public IP address of the VPN endpoint (the customer gateway public IP).
*Routing Type*: Static or BGP. If your device supports BGP, please select BGP routing as thats the preferred routing type.
* If Static: Provide Static routes (at least one) in CIDR notation.
* Device Platform (if Cisco was selected): ISR Series, ASR 1000, ASA 5500...
